81fefbc3a4021c5bc4dd8c67a7b7c6157460bf5d.summary: Donald Trump has filed a $5 billion lawsuit against JPMorgan Chase and CEO Jamie Dimon, alleging that the bank stopped providing him services following the January 6 Capitol riot. The complaint accuses the bank of trade libel and breach of implied covenant of good faith and fair dealing.
81fefbc3a4021c5bc4dd8c67a7b7c6157460bf5d.headline: Trump Sues JPMorgan and CEO Jamie Dimon for $5 Billion Over Debanking

ed317dcc5d8e2a164f9310a76e4893d2f9d53416.summary: France's navy intercepted and boarded the oil tanker Grinch in the Mediterranean on suspicion of violating international sanctions. President Emmanuel Macron stated the vessel was suspected of being part of a Russian 'shadow fleet' attempting to bypass western sanctions. The interception occurred between Spain and Morocco.
ed317dcc5d8e2a164f9310a76e4893d2f9d53416.headline: France Intercepts Suspected Sanctions Busting Russian Oil Tanker

37c9c95dee39820d84a9dbd0728c196a08ffcfb1.summary: President Trump announced at Davos that he and NATO Secretary-General Mark Rutte have agreed on a framework for a future deal regarding Greenland, which may include U.S. mineral rights and sovereignty over military bases. Denmark and Greenland have rejected any transfer of sovereignty, and negotiations are ongoing. Planned U.S. tariffs on European goods have been put on hold.
37c9c95dee39820d84a9dbd0728c196a08ffcfb1.headline: Trump Announces Greenland Deal Framework

b449b2558750e87036bd89441e5cd456bb4f37f0.summary: Ryan Coogler's horror film 'Sinners' received a record 16 Oscar nominations for the 2026 Academy Awards, the most ever for a single film. 'One Battle After Another' followed with 13 nominations. Notable actors including Paul Mescal, George Clooney, and Gwyneth Paltrow were not nominated. 'Sinners' leads the nominations, making Oscars history.
b449b2558750e87036bd89441e5cd456bb4f37f0.headline: Sinners Sets Record With 16 Oscar Nominations for 2026

eb48cb1789b639e0fb0aaa00a6b8c2211071e215.summary: Donald Trump launched the 'Board of Peace' at the World Economic Forum in Davos, aiming to rebuild Gaza and promote disarmament of Hamas. The board's initial membership remains unclear, with many top US allies, including European nations and Britain, declining to join. The initiative has drawn criticism for its resemblance to the UN and for limited international participation.
eb48cb1789b639e0fb0aaa00a6b8c2211071e215.headline: Trump Launches Board of Peace at Davos With Limited Allied Support

d480cc8a77e3e5f3f0b4a2064fd6eee8fdab2ac2.summary: The Tampa Bay Buccaneers are hiring Zac Robinson as their offensive coordinator. Robinson previously served as the Atlanta Falcons' offensive coordinator for the past two seasons and was previously their pass game coordinator and quarterbacks coach.
d480cc8a77e3e5f3f0b4a2064fd6eee8fdab2ac2.headline: Buccaneers Hire Zac Robinson as Offensive Coordinator

e387b98eacdc450e0fb9c0235e3e79c42da6920b.summary: Christian McCaffrey is a finalist for three AP NFL awards in the same year, including the 2025 NFL Most Valuable Player, Offensive Player of the Year, and Comeback Player of the Year. Other MVP finalists are Josh Allen, Trevor Lawrence, Drake Maye, and Matthew Stafford. Winners will be announced at NFL Honors on February 5.
e387b98eacdc450e0fb9c0235e3e79c42da6920b.headline: McCaffrey Named Finalist for Three AP NFL Awards

211d38b062e42841a1e828ab4b433bec145a6008.summary: Jack Smith testified before the House Judiciary Committee, stating he found proof beyond a reasonable doubt that President Trump engaged in criminal activity. Smith defended his decision to charge Trump in Florida and Washington, D.C., and criticized false narratives about his investigation. The cases did not go to trial.
211d38b062e42841a1e828ab4b433bec145a6008.headline: Jack Smith Defends Charging Trump

b21c96d0ace42522221e8bc1701b8b2413bc9fc7.summary: Attorney General Pam Bondi announced the arrest of Nekima Levy Armstrong and at least one other person following a protest at Cities Church in St. Paul, where a local U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement official is a pastor.
b21c96d0ace42522221e8bc1701b8b2413bc9fc7.headline: Two Arrested After Protest at St. Paul Church Involving ICE Official

43fd9a8ed51b78e35a38650f2a1aec43df2d12e3.summary: Gold prices fell and Asian stocks rose after Donald Trump announced a deal with NATO that he says gives the US 'total access' to Greenland for mining and military purposes. Greenland's prime minister responded that the island's sovereignty is non-negotiable, demanding respect for its red lines. European allies are reacting to Trump's reversal on US tariffs and Greenland policy.
43fd9a8ed51b78e35a38650f2a1aec43df2d12e3.headline: Trump Announces Greenland Access Deal

cbac04cc9c2327f69ed5ac216d92b30727515d76.summary: The NBA and Abu Dhabi's Department of Culture and Tourism have extended their partnership, agreeing to continue holding NBA preseason games in the Middle East and finalizing plans to launch a new global basketball academy in Abu Dhabi.
cbac04cc9c2327f69ed5ac216d92b30727515d76.headline: NBA Extends Abu Dhabi Partnership

b4de9b3040e6f3b6b68aec615ff372d6a4fa2e8e.summary: Sri Lanka defeated England by 19 runs in the first one-day international in Colombo, with Kusal Mendis scoring an unbeaten 93. England were all out for 252 in response to Sri Lanka's 271-6, continuing their recent poor form.
b4de9b3040e6f3b6b68aec615ff372d6a4fa2e8e.headline: Sri Lanka Beat England by 19 Runs in Colombo ODI Series Opener

489ceed74e845383a391dbb4e1f82d05b065ebbd.summary: US Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) detained four children from a Minnesota school district, including five-year-old Liam Ramos and his father, according to school officials. ICE stated it was not targeting the boy. The individuals were transported to a detention center in Texas. Tensions have risen in the area following the detentions.
489ceed74e845383a391dbb4e1f82d05b065ebbd.headline: ICE Detains Four Minnesota Schoolchildren and Parent

e01c9e266157605bc510a3bc66179ecb6499ae90.summary: Kyle Tucker, rated the top free agent of the offseason, has signed with the Los Angeles Dodgers. Tucker chose the Dodgers over offers from the Mets and Blue Jays, citing the team's championship pedigree. He was introduced by the Dodgers on Wednesday as part of their efforts to strengthen outfield production for the upcoming season.
e01c9e266157605bc510a3bc66179ecb6499ae90.headline: Kyle Tucker Signs With Dodgers

7ce3aaa9c6eb52af0f0e2cb1fdf3ec45ff3c921c.summary: Jack Smith told the House Judiciary Committee that Donald Trump broke the law during the 2020 election effort but said he did not charge Trump with insurrection. Smith testified about his investigations as the committee held a hearing.
7ce3aaa9c6eb52af0f0e2cb1fdf3ec45ff3c921c.headline: Jack Smith Testifies Trump Broke Law but Was Not Charged With

fa1abe59b0fcc1a7f4bab29f62d32b22e7cc164d.summary: Naomi Osaka defeated Sorana Cirstea 6-3, 4-6, 6-2 in the Australian Open second round. After the match, the two exchanged a brief, tense handshake. Osaka later apologized for any perceived disrespect toward Cirstea following their interaction.
fa1abe59b0fcc1a7f4bab29f62d32b22e7cc164d.headline: Naomi Osaka Apologizes After Tense Handshake With Sorana Cirstea

bbd6b5d7be27d5e85832e54dff371951c67b2a69.summary: SpaceX has selected Bank of America, Goldman Sachs, JPMorgan Chase, and Morgan Stanley to lead its planned initial public offering, according to reports on January 22, 2026.
bbd6b5d7be27d5e85832e54dff371951c67b2a69.headline: SpaceX Chooses Major Banks to Lead Planned IPO

9b8d554dec99c5e51a1b072dbdc5a803e1e08c2d.summary: Giannis Antetokounmpo publicly criticized his Milwaukee Bucks teammates after a blowout loss to the Oklahoma City Thunder, saying the team is not playing hard or together and accusing players of being selfish.
9b8d554dec99c5e51a1b072dbdc5a803e1e08c2d.headline: Antetokounmpo Criticizes Bucks Teammates After Loss to Thunder

72a16b2f077d2403fe9020ddd5e60cf193a28790.summary: A Texas jury has acquitted a former Uvalde school police officer of charges related to his response during the 2022 Robb Elementary school shooting, where 19 students and two adults were killed.
72a16b2f077d2403fe9020ddd5e60cf193a28790.headline: Former Uvalde Officer Acquitted in Robb Elementary Shooting Trial

10085420b5b56334cdc09de50c0c045e6a73b42e.summary: Manchester United have confirmed that midfielder Casemiro will leave the club when his contract expires at the end of the current season, as the club has decided not to trigger a one-year extension.
10085420b5b56334cdc09de50c0c045e6a73b42e.headline: Manchester United Confirms Casemiro to Leave at Seasons End

f6b1f913be41827d348734b1178754d37158e08b.summary: Iraq has announced it will begin legal proceedings against Islamic State detainees who have been transferred from Syria, according to official statements on January 22, 2026.
f6b1f913be41827d348734b1178754d37158e08b.headline: Iraq to Prosecute Islamic State Detainees Transferred from Syria

7f583de725ccfd1eb5d4f0b36a34b8369a6ff1b2.summary: US prosecutor Jack Smith told Congress that Donald Trump 'willfully' broke laws. Smith also stated that Trump is seeking revenge over the charges brought against him.
7f583de725ccfd1eb5d4f0b36a34b8369a6ff1b2.headline: Jack Smith Tells Congress Trump Willfully Broke Laws

3cd7f55de45fe671d98413e552c2da32f295d823.summary: Elon Musk announced that Tesla plans to begin selling its humanoid Optimus robots to the public by the end of 2027. Musk also stated that these robots could significantly increase Tesla's valuation.
3cd7f55de45fe671d98413e552c2da32f295d823.headline: Elon Musk Says Tesla Will Sell Humanoid Robots by 2027

1cef466bb817c884a5a38bcf7b22c1c8031b7b9c.summary: The New York Mets have acquired pitchers Freddy Peralta and Tobias Myers from the Milwaukee Brewers in exchange for prospects Brandon Sproat and Jett Williams. The trade ends the Mets' search for a top starting pitcher ahead of the MLB season.
1cef466bb817c884a5a38bcf7b22c1c8031b7b9c.headline: Mets Acquire Freddy Peralta and Tobias Myers From Brewers in Trade

fe9d81c99c5ed74f53a88bc4b65a7cb2174e6363.summary: Andrew Gwynne has announced he will resign as MP for Gorton and Denton due to significant ill health, triggering a byelection. Andy Burnham may seek to stand for the seat, though the Prime Minister has declined to comment on whether he supports Burnham's potential candidacy.
fe9d81c99c5ed74f53a88bc4b65a7cb2174e6363.headline: Andrew Gwynne to Resign as MP

4f665beae4bc960fe03e860de505dc5ae6c9e887.summary: After talks with Trump, Zelenskiy stated that the issue of territorial disputes remains unresolved.
4f665beae4bc960fe03e860de505dc5ae6c9e887.headline: Zelenskiy Says Territorial Dispute Unresolved After Trump Talks

435242db91bd5338ce08229b9b03934f68c38e55.summary: Three people were shot dead in an eastern Australian town, leading to a lockdown. The incident occurred as Australia was commemorating the Bondi Beach massacre victims and shortly after new gun laws were enacted.
435242db91bd5338ce08229b9b03934f68c38e55.headline: Three Killed in Eastern Australia Shooting Amid Town Lockdown

06b84b778c483ab80c12452a0a7c5f5c0e4fb86e.summary: Giannis Antetokounmpo has expressed concerns about the Milwaukee Bucks' recent poor performance, attributing their lopsided losses to chemistry issues and accusing some teammates of selfish play.
06b84b778c483ab80c12452a0a7c5f5c0e4fb86e.headline: Antetokounmpo Cites Chemistry and Selfishness in Bucks Struggles

0667139526ac508a8dd632d7307b0986463e1bc8.summary: Nora the cat, who requires heart medication and was taken from her family's home in Elland by an Amazon delivery driver, has been safely returned, according to her owners.
0667139526ac508a8dd632d7307b0986463e1bc8.headline: Nora the Cat Safely Returned After Being Taken by Delivery Driver

4e2e5eefbcbe8936050e86130bd0965c57ea1360.summary: SpaceX is preparing for a major IPO in 2026, with four Wall Street banks involved in the process. Existing shares are being sold at a valuation of $800 billion, according to sources.
4e2e5eefbcbe8936050e86130bd0965c57ea1360.headline: SpaceX Plans 2026 IPO With $800 Billion Valuation

c49297b3a125cf723c339cbd867f3f6792646b92.summary: European leaders are reassessing their relationship with the United States after recent threats from Donald Trump. Ukraine’s Volodymyr Zelenskyy has criticized European countries for not taking a stronger leadership role in defending freedom.
c49297b3a125cf723c339cbd867f3f6792646b92.headline: Europe Reconsiders US Ties Amid Trump Threats and Zelenskyy Criticism

45ed972c1f982be4e644c7f767c49b53af37a5fd.summary: General Motors announced it will shift production of a Buick compact SUV for U.S. sales from China to the United States.
45ed972c1f982be4e644c7f767c49b53af37a5fd.headline: GM to Move Buick SUV Production for U.S. Market from China to

26e0717191e684fabeef35c0d2ae25fff396eb44.summary: Donald Trump has filed a $5 billion lawsuit against JPMorgan Chase and CEO Jamie Dimon, alleging that the bank engaged in 'debanking' for political reasons. The suit marks an escalation in ongoing disputes between Trump and JPMorgan Chase.
26e0717191e684fabeef35c0d2ae25fff396eb44.headline: Trump Sues JPMorgan Chase and CEO Jamie Dimon for $5 Billion

b099a2a88117109370484825e2efaa4ee3d4e9f2.summary: The Baltimore Ravens have hired Jesse Minter, formerly the Los Angeles Chargers defensive coordinator, as their new head coach on a reported five-year contract. Minter replaces John Harbaugh and becomes the fourth head coach in the franchise's history.
b099a2a88117109370484825e2efaa4ee3d4e9f2.headline: Ravens Hire Jesse Minter as New Head Coach on Five Year Deal

7a74ed85a47766d1e6db03b3e0c1fa69f38e1d2a.summary: TikTok has finalized a deal to establish TikTok USDS Joint Venture LLC, a majority American-owned company, to secure U.S. user data and prevent a ban in the United States. The agreement includes measures for data privacy and cybersecurity, addressing national security concerns raised by U.S. officials.
7a74ed85a47766d1e6db03b3e0c1fa69f38e1d2a.headline: TikTok Forms U.S. Joint Venture to Prevent Ban and Secure User Data

6313573737f1c96a79eb5c2530e2935ded83c13d.summary: Donald Trump announced that a large group of US warships is heading toward Iran, stating the deployment aims to prevent Tehran from restarting its nuclear program or executing protesters. The announcement has contributed to increased tensions and affected oil prices.
6313573737f1c96a79eb5c2530e2935ded83c13d.headline: Trump Announces US Warships Heading Toward Iran Amid Rising Tensions

f9d7edb6b74f4034bcfa82a6f2ed5b9dd404e1a0.summary: The US House of Representatives voted 215-215 on a resolution to limit Trump's military actions in Venezuela, resulting in the measure's failure. This marks the third time the House has rejected similar efforts to restrict Trump's war powers regarding Venezuela.
f9d7edb6b74f4034bcfa82a6f2ed5b9dd404e1a0.headline: House Rejects Resolution to Limit Trumps Venezuela War Powers

0a8909b5e384b8b152719c9b089021b2ffa91196.summary: The Florida Panthers defeated the Winnipeg Jets 2-1 in a shootout on Thursday. Anton Lundell and Sam Reinhart scored in the shootout, while Sam Bennett scored in regulation for Florida. Daniil Tarasov made 17 saves for the Panthers, who have won four of their last six games. Cole Perfetti scored the only goal for Winnipeg.
0a8909b5e384b8b152719c9b089021b2ffa91196.headline: Panthers Defeat Jets 2 1 in Shootout for Fourth Win in Six

b7c0d561b8c77e50e741f953c4c21e5cc34851da.summary: Mark Carney responded to Donald Trump's foreign policy during his speech at the Davos forum, directly addressing the impact of Trump's presidency. The event saw record attendance, but tensions and walkouts occurred over US policy.
b7c0d561b8c77e50e741f953c4c21e5cc34851da.headline: Carney Criticizes Trumps Foreign Policy in Davos Speech

2957c6834eee7ae4bf969cfe584e243b427388cb.summary: Donald Trump launched the 'Board of Peace' at the World Economic Forum in Davos, signing it into existence. The board's final membership is not yet confirmed, and European nations did not attend the signing. Invitations to join have received mixed responses from global leaders.
2957c6834eee7ae4bf969cfe584e243b427388cb.headline: Trump Launches Board of Peace at Davos Without European Participation

3c84d7c5b5a40bb851cd60de924c303e9fd9b781.summary: Rescue teams in New Zealand continue searching for at least six missing people after landslides struck a house and campground, resulting in two deaths. Officials warn the search may take several days, with no progress reported overnight.
3c84d7c5b5a40bb851cd60de924c303e9fd9b781.headline: Search Continues for Six Missing After New Zealand Landslides

3c0de78680459564edb6b916c3e8517a7800c0a0.summary: Manchester United are preparing to begin contract negotiations with midfielder Kobbie Mainoo, aiming to offer terms similar to those of other senior players.
3c0de78680459564edb6b916c3e8517a7800c0a0.headline: Manchester United Set to Start Contract Talks With Kobbie Mainoo

43e857be2f4e68506357ed2b8b0c36a54cb32377.summary: UK retail sales volumes rose by 0.4% in December 2025, surpassing forecasts. The increase was driven by higher demand for gold and silver, and accompanied by a notable rebound in consumer confidence, despite ongoing challenges for many retailers.
43e857be2f4e68506357ed2b8b0c36a54cb32377.headline: UK Retail Sales Beat Expectations With December Volume Increase

234032b170691b41e8027faeafa395774abf0861.summary: Donald Trump's envoys met with Vladimir Putin for four hours to discuss the Ukraine conflict. The Kremlin stated that any settlement depends on agreements regarding Ukrainian territory.
234032b170691b41e8027faeafa395774abf0861.headline: Trump Envoys Hold Four Hour Ukraine Talks With Putin

f279088062fd61815a38db51251f53cf2f71ac29.summary: Three people, including a civil rights attorney, were arrested after an anti-ICE protest disrupted a Minnesota church service. No charges were filed against journalist Don Lemon, who was present at the protest.
f279088062fd61815a38db51251f53cf2f71ac29.headline: Three Arrested After Anti ICE Protest at Minnesota Church

a6d7220aeed8a5975724dcc93f28de004cc074ef.summary: Amazon is set to cut thousands more corporate jobs next week, according to reports. The planned layoffs follow a previous round of job reductions in October.
a6d7220aeed8a5975724dcc93f28de004cc074ef.headline: Amazon to Cut Thousands More Corporate Jobs Next Week

bc9e1da9c17e4d7e0c7c38c0b71c989b5a1483bd.summary: The US health secretary and secretary of state announced that Washington has completed its withdrawal from the World Health Organization, following an order issued by Trump a year ago over concerns about the agency's pandemic response.
bc9e1da9c17e4d7e0c7c38c0b71c989b5a1483bd.headline: US Completes Withdrawal from World Health Organization

271dc4362ae04b3bc4a01fb92d17d960b1bffca2.summary: LeBron James addressed reports of a strained relationship with Lakers team governor Jeanie Buss, stating he was not concerned about the recent ESPN story and that he does not care about how others feel about him.
271dc4362ae04b3bc4a01fb92d17d960b1bffca2.headline: LeBron James Dismisses Reported Strain With Lakers Jeanie Buss

0b5cc05b0b0086437aee7487a3e9ccfe0eab8d90.summary: Trinity Rodman has signed a new three-year contract with the Washington Spirit, ending speculation about her future in the National Women's Soccer League. The agreement follows recent league changes to roster and salary rules aimed at retaining top players.
0b5cc05b0b0086437aee7487a3e9ccfe0eab8d90.headline: Trinity Rodman Signs Three Year Deal to Stay With Washington Spirit

651b14fd391b87e3a0d82b37e76c3cc70a1a5342.summary: The Texas Rangers have acquired All-Star left-hander MacKenzie Gore from the Washington Nationals in exchange for five prospects, including recent draft pick Gavin Fien. The trade is part of the Nationals' roster rebuild under new president Paul Toboni and gives the Rangers a key addition to their starting rotation.
651b14fd391b87e3a0d82b37e76c3cc70a1a5342.headline: Rangers Acquire All Star Pitcher MacKenzie Gore From Nationals

3516a6e753cb09dd6edb3d6f556203705cc0afcf.summary: Scottie Scheffler, the world number one, shot a nine-under 63 in the first round of The American Express in La Quinta, California, marking a strong start to his 2026 PGA Tour season.
3516a6e753cb09dd6edb3d6f556203705cc0afcf.headline: Scottie Scheffler Opens 2026 PGA Tour With Nine Under 63 at American

665de73edd848e7f7ff9528243be7105a93acecf.summary: A statewide economic blackout against ICE is planned in Minnesota on Friday. In Davos, Zelenskyy delivered a strong critique of Europe. Meanwhile, millions of Americans are preparing for a major winter storm.
665de73edd848e7f7ff9528243be7105a93acecf.headline: Minnesota Plans ICE Blackout as U.S. Braces for Major Winter Storm

e023f48e73f981aaaeca73810c542c526184ccef.summary: The Pittsburgh Penguins defeated the Edmonton Oilers 6-2, with Anthony Mantha scoring twice. The Penguins scored three goals in 37 seconds early in the game, setting a franchise record for the fastest three goals and marking the quickest three goals allowed by the Oilers.
e023f48e73f981aaaeca73810c542c526184ccef.headline: Penguins Set Record in 6 2 Win Over Oilers With Three Quick

106cfbb47a470bdf8becc0c2a8d6dd2ba3c7c5ee.summary: Aaliyah Chavez scored 15 of her 26 points in overtime, setting a school record, as No. 16 Oklahoma defeated No. 2 South Carolina 94-82. The victory marks Oklahoma's win over a highest-ranked opponent, with Chavez's performance leading the Sooners to the upset on Thursday night.
106cfbb47a470bdf8becc0c2a8d6dd2ba3c7c5ee.headline: Oklahoma Upsets No. 2 South Carolina 94 82 Behind Chavezs Record

c78825f58fe9240f8554a487934da1defa986967.summary: Federal investigators and the FBI are examining the death of Indianapolis Colts owner Jim Irsay, focusing on a California doctor who reportedly prescribed him pain medication and ketamine.
c78825f58fe9240f8554a487934da1defa986967.headline: FBI Investigates Death of Colts Owner Jim Irsay and Doctors Role

d3c1d9e87408c24a69936e2d2760cd77558cac63.summary: TikTok has finalized a deal to sell its U.S. operations, meeting a requirement set by authorities to avoid a ban related to its Chinese ownership.
d3c1d9e87408c24a69936e2d2760cd77558cac63.headline: TikTok Sells U.S. Operations to Comply With Divestment Requirement

9dabc34e78b41a233a16d3a0fdd5e09be9ade7a5.summary: Harry Styles has announced 50 shows in seven cities for his Together Together residency world tour, including six performances at London's Wembley Stadium. The tour coincides with the release of his new song 'Aperture,' which launches his 'Kiss All the Time. Disco, Occasionally' album era.
9dabc34e78b41a233a16d3a0fdd5e09be9ade7a5.headline: Harry Styles Announces 50 Show Tour and Releases New Song Aperture

af8d79880f79bbd7281306af267c341c50522b1a.summary: Federal officers detained a 5-year-old boy at a school after a school official reported the child was used to help apprehend his father, who is seeking asylum. The school superintendent stated the child was 'essentially' used 'as bait' during the operation.
af8d79880f79bbd7281306af267c341c50522b1a.headline: Federal Officers Detain Child to Apprehend Asylum Seeking Father

da09fbfd5a02c39ac3777231d30c2fede4468060.summary: To Lam has secured a new five-year term as leader of Vietnam's Communist Party and has pledged to continue economic reforms.
da09fbfd5a02c39ac3777231d30c2fede4468060.headline: To Lam Wins New Five Year Term as Leader of Vietnams Communist

c078d283d7223256a3598ccdafca0bbcb753c81a.summary: A major winter storm is expected to bring heavy snow, sleet, and ice from Texas to Boston, with Pittsburgh and Atlanta preparing for significant snowfall and icy conditions. Authorities are warning of possible travel disruptions and urging residents to take precautions.
c078d283d7223256a3598ccdafca0bbcb753c81a.headline: Major Winter Storm Threatens Snow and Ice Across Central and Eastern

4718c777307c7e5d4e09a7899eaf98e945e8241b.summary: 'Sinners,' a vampire thriller, has set a new record by receiving 16 nominations for the Oscars, the most ever for a single film.
4718c777307c7e5d4e09a7899eaf98e945e8241b.headline: Sinners Breaks Oscars Record With 16 Nominations

4a2e3bf09cf623c81fe15f4a2494d540fb25a3f0.summary: On January 22, 2026, NASA held a wreath laying ceremony at Arlington National Cemetery as part of its Day of Remembrance. The event honored the men and women who lost their lives in the pursuit of space exploration, including those commemorated at the Space Shuttle Challenger Memorial.
4a2e3bf09cf623c81fe15f4a2494d540fb25a3f0.headline: NASA Holds Day of Remembrance Ceremony at Arlington National Cemetery

691f523c49bb67f47eae76d9245a230d653e5afd.summary: Donald Trump has launched a new Board of Peace initiative and has withdrawn Canada's invitation to join it, following public disagreements with Canadian leader Mark Carney. The Board has received mixed reactions from world leaders, with some accepting and others expressing uncertainty.
691f523c49bb67f47eae76d9245a230d653e5afd.headline: Trump Withdraws Canadas Invitation to Join Board of Peace

fa4e217d35845e0ff883f4234347c7ac2fdff542.summary: Ryan Wedding, a Canadian Olympic snowboarder and former member of the FBI's Ten Most Wanted Fugitives list, has been arrested after turning himself in at the U.S. embassy in Mexico City. Wedding faces charges of murder and smuggling cocaine into the United States. He is scheduled to appear in court in California on Monday.
fa4e217d35845e0ff883f4234347c7ac2fdff542.headline: Olympic Snowboarder Ryan Wedding Arrested on Murder

0fa6ef36d2b9e1ebd5c0386ca5f03dcdd6480b55.summary: Former Philadelphia Eagles and Raiders defensive lineman Kevin Johnson was found dead at a homeless encampment in Willowbrook, Los Angeles, on Wednesday. The Los Angeles County Medical Examiner reported the cause of death as blunt head trauma and stab wounds. Johnson, 55, was pronounced dead at the scene. Authorities are investigating his death as a homicide.
0fa6ef36d2b9e1ebd5c0386ca5f03dcdd6480b55.headline: Kevin Johnson Found Dead at Los Angeles Encampment

7ac72f6ecdba4dacd050d6e49adeeecfaebc47c5.summary: LeBron James responded to an ESPN article about his reportedly strained relationship with Lakers governor Jeanie Buss by saying he is not concerned about media stories or others' opinions of him. Walker's attorney stated the firearm was legally licensed in Wisconsin and called the incident a misunderstanding.
725940d2237b49516651c0a66fcb2318e0add0ef.headline: Packers Rasheed Walker Arrested at LaGuardia Airport on Firearm

d4e68653314a7aa6c5e2302d9b7905eef9353480.summary: Syrian diplomatic sources say the Syrian government and Kurdish forces have agreed to extend their ceasefire for one month to allow the transfer of suspected Islamic State members from Syria to Iraq. However, Syria's foreign ministry denies that an agreement to extend the deadline has been reached, leaving the status of the ceasefire uncertain.
d4e68653314a7aa6c5e2302d9b7905eef9353480.headline: Status of Syria Kurdish Ceasefire Extension Remains Unclear

211a6f5fdcdce0959f0a867f12aeb02473c36e55.summary: Giannis Antetokounmpo left Friday's game against the Denver Nuggets with a right calf injury and will undergo an MRI on Saturday. He stated he expects to be sidelined for at least four to six weeks. This follows a previous calf injury that caused him to miss eight games earlier in the season.
211a6f5fdcdce0959f0a867f12aeb02473c36e55.headline: Giannis Antetokounmpo Expects Four to Six Weeks Out With Calf Injury

7c1f06a1c11bef3da2fea0b41b2a0a7d91f740b1.summary: Justin Gaethje and Paddy Pimblett are set to compete for the interim UFC lightweight title in Las Vegas at UFC 324. The event marks the UFC's debut on Paramount+, with the title fight headlining the card on Saturday.
7c1f06a1c11bef3da2fea0b41b2a0a7d91f740b1.headline: Gaethje and Pimblett Meet for Interim UFC Lightweight Title at UFC 324

03313ff83da3605b844b6136f7197faa9fe9ddc5.summary: Russia launched a large-scale drone and missile attack on Kyiv and Kharkiv during ongoing talks with the US and Ukraine in the UAE. Ukrainian officials report 396 drones and missiles were used. The talks ended without a breakthrough, and Russian attacks continue.
03313ff83da3605b844b6136f7197faa9fe9ddc5.headline: Russia Strikes Kyiv and Kharkiv as UAE Talks End Without Breakthrough

7a8dcab2969bb8e69fa55e24ab02d335e7815229.summary: Kansas freshman Darryn Peterson will miss Saturday's game against Kansas State due to an ankle injury. Coach Bill Self will return to coach the team for the Sunflower Showdown.
7a8dcab2969bb8e69fa55e24ab02d335e7815229.headline: Kansas Darryn Peterson Out vs. Kansas State With Ankle Injury

2f63ea08244e1549febf67e5b78e3ff27472246e.summary: Cristian Romero scored a 90th-minute equalizer to secure a 2-2 draw for Tottenham Hotspur against Burnley. The result leaves Tottenham with only two wins in their last 14 Premier League matches, increasing pressure on head coach Thomas Frank amid calls for his dismissal from supporters.
2f63ea08244e1549febf67e5b78e3ff27472246e.headline: Romeros Late Goal Secures Draw for Tottenham

b49f86ecac906bf8ed882e57065dab6dde807fab.summary: US-brokered peace talks in Abu Dhabi ended without an agreement after Russian air strikes targeted Ukraine overnight.
b49f86ecac906bf8ed882e57065dab6dde807fab.headline: US Brokered Ukraine Peace Talks End With No Deal After Russian Strikes

4ac06e2417023a991d2b6f5007401a61f152a943.summary: Leon Draisaitl has used his time away from the Edmonton Oilers to reflect on his priorities and what is most important to him.
4ac06e2417023a991d2b6f5007401a61f152a943.headline: Leon Draisaitl Reflects on Priorities During Time Away from Oilers

df6f68b8fc90c1811fcec999cf9556868fcb65da.summary: England defeated Sri Lanka by five wickets in the second one-day international in Colombo, chasing down 219 with Joe Root scoring 75. The win levels the three-match ODI series at 1-1, setting up a decider.
df6f68b8fc90c1811fcec999cf9556868fcb65da.headline: England Beat Sri Lanka to Level ODI Series Ahead of Decider

6236cae1dfd7493062042ccd5284ebd10a7d558e.summary: The US is in discussions with Chevron, other oil producers, and major oilfield service companies to rapidly increase Venezuela's oil output through targeted repairs, aiming to boost production without the full $100 billion needed for a complete overhaul.
6236cae1dfd7493062042ccd5284ebd10a7d558e.headline: US Seeks Rapid Repairs to Increase Venezuela Oil Production

aaf739be22cd19bf299311b86e95752f395c5127.summary: Bournemouth defeated Liverpool 3-2 with a stoppage-time goal by Amine Adli, ending Liverpool's 13-game unbeaten run. Liverpool are now winless in their last five league matches.
aaf739be22cd19bf299311b86e95752f395c5127.headline: Bournemouth End Liverpools 13 Game Unbeaten Run With 3 2 Win

6c553df0bb0798367ca7c71e5ef03530bc46b7fc.summary: The Greater Manchester mayor has announced plans to run in the Gorton and Denton by-election, stating his intention to support the Labour government rather than challenge it.
6c553df0bb0798367ca7c71e5ef03530bc46b7fc.headline: Greater Manchester Mayor to Run in Gorton and Denton By Election

c08585d4e006809063885b5a06669931c77db218.summary: A gas explosion and fire on the top floors of a New York City apartment building killed one person and injured 14 others on January 24, 2026.
c08585d4e006809063885b5a06669931c77db218.headline: New York City Apartment Explosion Kills 1

5dd4bcb856cef6e0979769cd06cc7a95aeee9686.summary: Donald Trump announced that a US naval force is being sent to the Middle East and stated that the United States is closely monitoring Iran. He also claimed his threats have stopped executions in Iran, as reports continue of a crackdown on protests.
5dd4bcb856cef6e0979769cd06cc7a95aeee9686.headline: Trump Sends US Naval Force to Middle East

c13a84536f47c64af7c7a49adbf1fd5c9544a14a.summary: The Pentagon released a new National Defense Strategy prioritizing U.S. dominance in the Western Hemisphere and urging allies to take greater responsibility for their own security, moving away from a focus on countering China.
c13a84536f47c64af7c7a49adbf1fd5c9544a14a.headline: Pentagon Unveils Strategy Urging Allies to Boost Their Own Security

2d7bc9a42a283f43a802880bc842e5a12620c7ec.summary: US special envoys are in Israel to discuss the future of Gaza, according to sources cited by Reuters and Al Arabiya English. The talks focus on the situation in Gaza and possible next steps.
2d7bc9a42a283f43a802880bc842e5a12620c7ec.headline: US Envoys in Israel for Talks on Gazas Future

f70c3be32a5449f4a24d79014f6bd345290cfd74.summary: Donald Trump stated that the US has taken oil from Venezuelan tankers that were seized. This information was reported in interviews with major news outlets.
f70c3be32a5449f4a24d79014f6bd345290cfd74.headline: Trump Says US Took Oil From Seized Venezuelan Tankers

6e74f42d4b556bf89d122f89c5c213f9170bc588.summary: New Zealand police have ended rescue efforts after a landslide and begun a recovery operation, stating it is unlikely any of the missing individuals are still alive. Authorities are working to identify the victims.
6e74f42d4b556bf89d122f89c5c213f9170bc588.headline: New Zealand Shifts to Recovery After Landslide

5d8757dffb284603972af8f7a7248f0dcd3aa026.summary: Nico Antic died in a hospital after being bitten by a shark in Sydney Harbour, marking the first of several recent shark attacks along Australia's southeastern coast. Australia averages about 20 shark attacks annually, with fewer than three resulting in fatalities.
5d8757dffb284603972af8f7a7248f0dcd3aa026.headline: Nico Antic Dies After Shark Attack in Sydney Harbour

b34ae8ab5dfd0494cfb855e3273b9dd5871d8568.summary: A 37-year-old Minneapolis man was fatally shot by a federal agent outside a donut shop. Video from Saturday shows federal agents wrestling the man to the ground before gunfire occurred. Police confirmed the man's death.
b34ae8ab5dfd0494cfb855e3273b9dd5871d8568.headline: Minneapolis Man Killed by Federal Agent Outside Donut Shop

d2c1885d547427cf593a22b8258bd3bca4c4f758.summary: Donald Trump praised the UK's military after Prime Minister Keir Starmer called on him to apologize for minimizing NATO troops' role in the Afghanistan war.
d2c1885d547427cf593a22b8258bd3bca4c4f758.headline: Trump Praises UK Troops After Starmer Requests Apology Over NATO

3cbbafcc6d883f0da236179d94be2d0d857aa5d9.summary: The Pittsburgh Steelers have reached a verbal agreement with Mike McCarthy to become their next head coach, replacing Mike Tomlin after 19 years. McCarthy, a Pittsburgh native and former Cowboys and Packers coach, is set to lead the team following the official announcement on Saturday.
3cbbafcc6d883f0da236179d94be2d0d857aa5d9.headline: Steelers Reach Verbal Agreement With Mike McCarthy as Head Coach

0462ee471b867707085b04ae33199399d1bd9bdd.summary: American climber Alex Honnold scaled the 1,667-foot Taipei 101 skyscraper in Taiwan without ropes or protective equipment, becoming the first person to do so. The climb was broadcast live after a rain delay and drew crowds and international attention.
0462ee471b867707085b04ae33199399d1bd9bdd.headline: Alex Honnold Becomes First to Climb Taipei 101 Without Ropes

93c38caa5293c166df328585be9fafead7ee501c.summary: Justin Gaethje defeated Paddy Pimblett by unanimous decision at UFC 324 in Las Vegas to win the interim lightweight title. Gaethje scored multiple knockdowns, ending Pimblett's nine-fight winning streak. The victory sets up a potential title unification bout for Gaethje.
93c38caa5293c166df328585be9fafead7ee501c.headline: Justin Gaethje Wins UFC Interim Lightweight Title Over Paddy Pimblett

ce3c0e4aff99a7c591f324d58e1fdcb9e5fa2cf9.summary: Donald Trump has threatened to impose a 100% tariff on all Canadian imports if Canada makes a trade deal with China. The warning follows Mark Carney's speech at Davos, which criticized the state of the U.S.-led world order. There is currently no indication that Canada and China are negotiating a broad trade agreement.
ce3c0e4aff99a7c591f324d58e1fdcb9e5fa2cf9.headline: Trump Threatens 100% Tariff on Canada Over Potential China Trade Deal

41d8a89dc1b5a93727dde37e810a26828e57bdf3.summary: Luka Doncic scored 33 points with 8 rebounds and 11 assists as the Los Angeles Lakers overcame a 15-point deficit in the final seven minutes to defeat the Dallas Mavericks 116-110 on Saturday night. The game marked Doncic's second visit to Dallas since his trade to the Lakers nearly a year ago.
41d8a89dc1b5a93727dde37e810a26828e57bdf3.headline: Doncic Leads Lakers to 116 110 Comeback Win Over Mavericks in Dallas

b0a3b12a38a59b99d41e51df594b80f4a0b8b948.summary: Syria's government and Kurdish-led SDF have extended their ceasefire by 15 days to facilitate the transfer of suspected Islamic State members from facilities previously held by the SDF. The agreement temporarily averts renewed conflict between the two sides.
b0a3b12a38a59b99d41e51df594b80f4a0b8b948.headline: Syria and Kurdish Forces Extend Ceasefire for 15 Days

0ae1f720deed84fa8c463d4dfd887a9f280c92f8.summary: Evan Bouchard scored his first NHL hat trick and added three assists for a six-point game as the Edmonton Oilers defeated the Washington Capitals 6-5 in overtime. Connor McDavid scored the overtime winner and finished with five points. The Oilers' win was among several NHL games Saturday, including victories for the Blue Jackets, Mammoth, Hurricanes, Red Wings, Sabres, Kings, Bruins, and Panthers.
0ae1f720deed84fa8c463d4dfd887a9f280c92f8.headline: Bouchards Six Point Night Leads Oilers to 6 5 Overtime Win Over

4cb0cc370b20816b1e446732126aafe88f9a54b4.summary: Federal agents fatally shot 37-year-old ICU nurse Alex Pretti during a raid in Minneapolis, sparking protests. Videos and witness statements indicate Pretti was holding a phone, not a weapon. The incident, the second fatal shooting by federal officers in Minneapolis within a month, led to the postponement of a major basketball game and widespread demonstrations.
4cb0cc370b20816b1e446732126aafe88f9a54b4.headline: Federal Agents Fatally Shoot ICU Nurse in Minneapolis

2cf2ac718e05aa01e688d32684911a297c63e906.summary: A massive winter storm affecting two-thirds of the U.S. has led to the cancellation of over 13,000 flights, with airlines issuing travel waivers and advising passengers on refunds and rebooking. More than 180 million people are under weather alerts as the storm brings dangerous ice and snow from New Mexico to Maine.
2cf2ac718e05aa01e688d32684911a297c63e906.headline: Over 13000 Flights Canceled as Major Winter Storm Hits U.S

9991bbec3178c5069a38bc5406fab9da3edbe895.summary: The Chicago Bulls retired Derrick Rose's No. 1 jersey in an emotional ceremony following their 114-111 win over the Boston Celtics on Saturday night. Rose joined a select group of Bulls players whose numbers have been retired by the team.
9991bbec3178c5069a38bc5406fab9da3edbe895.headline: Chicago Bulls Retire Derrick Roses No. 1 Jersey After Win Over Celtics

5439a278f5793dc2c4b6646b73f29ac94828738e.summary: Memphis Grizzlies star guard Ja Morant will be out for approximately three weeks with a UCL sprain in his left elbow, keeping him sidelined through the February 5 trade deadline.
5439a278f5793dc2c4b6646b73f29ac94828738e.headline: Ja Morant Out Three Weeks With Elbow Injury

92e20488b3082a7c884739af016b9154b7146b09.summary: The lightweight fight between Alexander Hernandez and Michael Johnson at UFC 324 was canceled hours before the event due to suspicious betting activity, according to UFC CEO Dana White.
92e20488b3082a7c884739af016b9154b7146b09.headline: UFC 324 Fight Canceled Over Suspicious Betting Activity

afacf7a4370bbc96e73fb7ecb703f795647bb0a6.summary: Si Woo Kim leads the American Express golf tournament by one shot after the third round, with Scottie Scheffler and 18-year-old Blades Brown tied for second place.
afacf7a4370bbc96e73fb7ecb703f795647bb0a6.headline: Si Woo Kim Leads American Express After Three Rounds

966a07983746416ef494e951ad83bb8082c1defd.summary: Aryna Sabalenka defeated Victoria Mboko in the fourth round of the Australian Open, advancing to the tournament's quarterfinals. Mboko's singles run ended with the loss in Melbourne.
966a07983746416ef494e951ad83bb8082c1defd.headline: Sabalenka Advances to Australian Open Quarterfinals Over Mboko

e1625b7927722b230f8056fc85b2668d6b9807cc.summary: The mayor of Greater Manchester is seeking to stand in the Gorton and Denton by-election, but allies of the prime minister may attempt to block this move.
e1625b7927722b230f8056fc85b2668d6b9807cc.headline: Greater Manchester Mayor Faces Possible Block in By Election Bid

f27b44984e006a7ec059c17583270456c0354e1e.summary: Metropolitan police arrested 86 people for suspected aggravated trespass after they breached the grounds of HMP Wormwood Scrubs during a protest supporting Umer Khalid, a Palestine Action prisoner on hunger strike.
f27b44984e006a7ec059c17583270456c0354e1e.headline: 86 Arrested After Protest Breaches HMP Wormwood Scrubs Grounds

d73fcab2386efff9f25c4ce6cfbbceaf0069d35e.summary: Myanmar held the final phase of its general election, with voting taking place under military control and ongoing civil conflict. The UN called the monthlong polls 'illegitimate,' and ASEAN announced it will not certify the results.
d73fcab2386efff9f25c4ce6cfbbceaf0069d35e.headline: Myanmar Concludes Election as UN and ASEAN Reject Legitimacy

4dd0d5bd983f7b5f7368b65afda32b44da5597da.summary: Japanese Prime Minister Kishida and Takaichi have stated that they are prepared to take action in response to recent speculative moves in the market following a sharp rise in the yen.
4dd0d5bd983f7b5f7368b65afda32b44da5597da.headline: Japan Leaders Signal Readiness to Respond to Speculative Yen Moves

2f1f350774e4045a9794144788ee34e466aba9cf.summary: A major winter storm has caused widespread power outages, grid emergencies, and significant travel disruptions across the US, grounding thousands of flights. The National Weather Service warns of heavy snow and catastrophic ice from east Texas to North Carolina, with up to a foot of snow expected in New York City and the Northeast.
2f1f350774e4045a9794144788ee34e466aba9cf.headline: US Winter Storm Causes Power Outages and Major Travel Disruptions

85fbd94f9a2e09e14b98ad1d0e979efe7fa7f2e9.summary: A severe winter storm in the US has left 230,000 people without power and caused thousands of flight cancellations. Over 40 percent of the country is under a winter storm warning, with emergency orders issued in affected areas.
85fbd94f9a2e09e14b98ad1d0e979efe7fa7f2e9.headline: US Winter Storm Cuts Power to 230

11c90689f2c9c6e93c4dda0b8f297b4c953df825.summary: The Federal Reserve and three other central banks plan to keep interest rates unchanged, as policymakers remain cautious amid global economic uncertainty.
11c90689f2c9c6e93c4dda0b8f297b4c953df825.headline: Federal Reserve and Peers to Maintain Interest Rates

003c4bd499d2b0e397a3d1ffdb753577b7ac009a.summary: A man was shot and killed by a federal immigration officer during an immigration crackdown in Minneapolis. In response, Walz activated the National Guard to address the situation.
003c4bd499d2b0e397a3d1ffdb753577b7ac009a.headline: National Guard Activated After Fatal Shooting by Immigration Officer

69d06203e57af24b42fdcba621942a4e8c904b5c.summary: Dominick Cruz has been announced as the first inductee into the UFC Hall of Fame Class of 2026, according to the UFC's statement during UFC 324.
69d06203e57af24b42fdcba621942a4e8c904b5c.headline: Dominick Cruz Named First Inductee for UFC Hall of Fame Class of

38973fc3927a0b8c06edb6ae8164193c23c197ec.summary: Iraq's Shi'ite alliance has nominated Nouri al-Maliki for the position of prime minister. Al-Maliki, who has faced criticism over his previous leadership, remains a significant figure in Iraqi politics.
38973fc3927a0b8c06edb6ae8164193c23c197ec.headline: Shiite Alliance Nominates Nouri al Maliki for Iraqi Prime Minister

b9e6b5dae8edfced958d782a259fd767e55bf907.summary: The US Energy Department declared a power emergency in Texas as a severe winter storm increased electricity demand, raising concerns about the state's electric grid amid freezing temperatures.
b9e6b5dae8edfced958d782a259fd767e55bf907.headline: US Declares Power Emergency in Texas Amid Winter Storm

420bd380ce7577a0a9f8ba2a6c6a32aefaddc844.summary: Donald Trump stated that the US has taken oil from seized Venezuelan tankers and will gain sovereignty over American bases in Greenland, according to his comments to the New York Post.
420bd380ce7577a0a9f8ba2a6c6a32aefaddc844.headline: Trump Says US Took Oil From Venezuelan Tankers

6362fe7d738ba239313f85a541f1e886a137fa28.summary: Gen. Zhang Youxia has been removed from his position, and Liu Zhenli is under investigation, as part of a broader purge in China's military leadership reportedly aimed at consolidating loyalty to Xi Jinping.
6362fe7d738ba239313f85a541f1e886a137fa28.headline: Gen. Zhang Youxia Removed Amid Broad Military Purge in China

566060a0d0d6a961f3f4226a9294b8262d7ff12e.summary: Democrats are threatening a government shutdown and considering deploying the National Guard in response to a recent police shooting in Minneapolis and ongoing disputes over ICE funding.
566060a0d0d6a961f3f4226a9294b8262d7ff12e.headline: Democrats Threaten Shutdown and National Guard Over Minneapolis

8eae43ec6d1f1d5d56f01a1c759aaecfb3fa9377.summary: The Pittsburgh Steelers have reached a verbal agreement with Mike McCarthy to become their next head coach, replacing Tomlin after his 19-year tenure. McCarthy, a Pittsburgh native and former coach of the Cowboys and Packers, will lead the team as they address key roster questions.
8eae43ec6d1f1d5d56f01a1c759aaecfb3fa9377.headline: Steelers Reach Agreement With Mike McCarthy to Be Next Head Coach

da57d1c18fb642ae3f3e3733cd81b832e6c1d947.summary: The New England Patriots and Denver Broncos faced off in the 2026 AFC Championship Game on Sunday, with a spot in Super Bowl LX at stake. The game featured Drake Maye leading the Patriots against the Broncos, who played without Bo Nix. Live coverage and updates tracked the action, but the final outcome is not specified in the available sources.
da57d1c18fb642ae3f3e3733cd81b832e6c1d947.headline: Patriots and Broncos Compete for Super Bowl LX Berth in AFC

bc27786d9c9c0ff5c8f4c36d85c903cadd7da72b.summary: The Green Bay Packers have hired Jonathan Gannon, previously with the Arizona Cardinals, as their new defensive coordinator. Head coach Matt LaFleur selected Gannon for the position, and the team has agreed to terms with him, according to multiple sources.
bc27786d9c9c0ff5c8f4c36d85c903cadd7da72b.headline: Packers Hire Jonathan Gannon as Defensive Coordinator

b82143a768cbe1a4bb69eac803c77df195dbc36b.summary: Federal immigration agents fatally shot 37-year-old Alex Pretti in Minneapolis during a confrontation on Saturday. Video and witness accounts contradict federal claims of self-defense, stating Pretti did not brandish a weapon. Protests have erupted in response, prompting the NBA to postpone the Timberwolves-Warriors game in Minneapolis due to safety concerns.
b82143a768cbe1a4bb69eac803c77df195dbc36b.headline: Federal Agents Fatally Shoot Man in Minneapolis

74b5b99ef6477c87642539ff2b9f118a9f59a90f.summary: Alex Honnold became the first person to climb Taipei 101 without ropes or safety equipment, reaching the top of the 508-meter skyscraper in about 90 minutes on January 25, 2026. The climb was broadcast live and drew cheers from a crowd gathered below.
74b5b99ef6477c87642539ff2b9f118a9f59a90f.headline: Alex Honnold Scales Taipei 101 Without Ropes in Historic Climb

bbcfd031adfc88f4bc38f6962d5ce0b9e85e9306.summary: Matheus Cunha scored an 87th-minute winner as Manchester United defeated Arsenal 3-2 at Emirates Stadium. The victory moves Manchester United above Chelsea and Liverpool into fourth place in the Premier League and reduces Arsenal's lead at the top of the table to four points.
bbcfd031adfc88f4bc38f6962d5ce0b9e85e9306.headline: Cunhas Late Goal Secures 3 2 Win for Manchester United Over Arsenal

57583a82a7f1b244e63f53b1e90c46aa8ad668ed.summary: Justin Gaethje defeated Paddy Pimblett by unanimous decision at UFC 324, winning the interim lightweight title. The judges scored the fight 49-46, 49-46, and 48-47 in Gaethje's favor.
57583a82a7f1b244e63f53b1e90c46aa8ad668ed.headline: Justin Gaethje Wins Interim Lightweight Title at UFC 324

2c40e380b9be07e1e4704c65421055affa2c6833.summary: Australian authorities have decided to euthanize dingoes found near the body of a young Canadian woman, despite initial autopsy findings suggesting dingo bites were likely not the immediate cause of death. The Ministry of Environment and Tourism confirmed awareness of the autopsy results.
2c40e380b9be07e1e4704c65421055affa2c6833.headline: Australia to Euthanize Dingoes Found Near Canadian Womans Body

3a8f93932b09bf1640363ac34d9489628959bcf1.summary: Donald Trump has threatened to impose a 100% tariff on Canadian imports over a pending trade deal with China. Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney stated that Canada is not seeking a free trade agreement with China and that a recent agreement only reduces tariffs in a few sectors.
3a8f93932b09bf1640363ac34d9489628959bcf1.headline: Trump Threatens 100% Tariff on Canada

73e33f10b3cd202478be862400b6430c6e9143a2.summary: Cole Palmer missed Chelsea's match against Crystal Palace due to injury. Estêvão Willian started in his place, scoring the opening goal and assisting another as Chelsea secured a comfortable win at Selhurst Park.
73e33f10b3cd202478be862400b6430c6e9143a2.headline: Estêvão Shines as Chelsea Defeat Crystal Palace Without Palmer

efb8bcc49bf9b478629d1ca659d46860b9b4a095.summary: J.B. Bickerstaff has been named a coach for the 2026 NBA All-Star Game after the Pistons secured the No. 1 seed in the Eastern Conference as of February 1.
efb8bcc49bf9b478629d1ca659d46860b9b4a095.headline: J.B. Bickerstaff Named 2026 NBA All Star Game Coach for Pistons

6a7bdeb50599724b6546326ff3c774e9f7f1105b.summary: Since Bruno Guimaraes joined Newcastle United in 2022, the team has not won any league matches in his absence.
6a7bdeb50599724b6546326ff3c774e9f7f1105b.headline: Newcastle Winless in League Without Bruno Guimaraes Since 2022

a6dacd0cc608e86b708f33f6f3d667a22ea7552e.summary: Manchester United defeated Arsenal with second-half goals from Patrick Dorgu and Matheus Cunha. Aston Villa moved level on points with Manchester City in second place after a 2-0 win over Newcastle, with goals from Emiliano Buendia and Ollie Watkins.
a6dacd0cc608e86b708f33f6f3d667a22ea7552e.headline: Manchester United Beat Arsenal

d1308d598ee2416df2e0eab078b6933afe42127f.summary: A major winter storm reached the US Atlantic Coast, bringing heavy snow and ice that strained power grids, triggered a federal power emergency in Texas, and caused widespread power outages and flight disruptions across multiple states.
d1308d598ee2416df2e0eab078b6933afe42127f.headline: Winter Storm Triggers Power Emergency and Widespread Disruptions in US

3fab3fe5a6f2fe944454d9331a3667b9ba55193a.summary: A massive winter storm has swept across two-thirds of the U.S., bringing heavy snow, ice, and dangerously low temperatures from Texas to New England. Airlines have canceled nearly 15,000 flights, especially in Dallas and Atlanta, and issued travel waivers. At least seven people have died as a result of the storm, and over 180 million people remain under weather alerts.
3fab3fe5a6f2fe944454d9331a3667b9ba55193a.headline: Severe Winter Storm Cancels Flights and Causes Fatalities Across U.S

9af1ebb832ec8678a6a53d912273211ac80779a3.summary: French authorities detained the Indian captain of the tanker Grinch after seizing the vessel in the Mediterranean Sea on Thursday. The tanker is suspected of being part of a shadow fleet.
9af1ebb832ec8678a6a53d912273211ac80779a3.headline: France Detains Indian Captain After Seizing Suspected Shadow Tanker

1d0035f024226f413b7e0e5082ebf2c2eea6b954.summary: Eighty-six protesters were arrested for aggravated trespass after breaching the grounds of HMP Wormwood Scrubs, where Umer Khalid is being held. Videos show police officers removing demonstrators who were protesting in support of a Palestine Action prisoner on hunger strike.
1d0035f024226f413b7e0e5082ebf2c2eea6b954.headline: Eighty Six Arrested After Protest at Wormwood Scrubs Prison

3e8d84ceccc8120967783fc0c54366ac75c5f2b8.summary: Some Republicans have distanced themselves from Trump's immigration policies following a recent killing in Minneapolis, while Democrats are threatening a government shutdown in response to the incident.

edab1c2d16c80dfcd8ffcbddecbe29d0c9c8903e.summary: Donald Trump praised UK troops as brave warriors after facing widespread criticism in Britain for comments that downplayed the role of NATO allies in Afghanistan, where the UK lost 457 soldiers.
edab1c2d16c80dfcd8ffcbddecbe29d0c9c8903e.headline: Trump Praises UK Troops After Criticism Over Afghanistan Remarks

4fee9798a223e5aff7f96c425bba6dc479f35523.summary: Christian Horner is part of a group interested in buying a minority stake in Alpine, as confirmed by the French team. Talks are ongoing regarding the potential investment and Horner's possible return to Formula 1.
4fee9798a223e5aff7f96c425bba6dc479f35523.headline: Christian Horner Leads Group Interested in Buying Stake in Alpine

500be3f84ba5f83e4ae246cdfdd17692b179e740.summary: BBC correspondent and author Mark Tully, known for his extensive reporting on India's history and his respected work in the subcontinent, has died. Tully's career included coverage of major events such as the 70th anniversary of India's partition.

0e8cb80a735835cb1b56d0db0aa225aa1c0083c5.summary: Japan's Prime Minister Takaichi stated that the government is prepared to take action against speculative movements in financial markets following a recent spike in the yen.
0e8cb80a735835cb1b56d0db0aa225aa1c0083c5.headline: Japan PM Takaichi Signals Readiness to Address Market Speculation

7c640bf811f5f054e72d1a3e7e08f131d8ef1302.summary: The UK government has announced plans to establish a new national police force, referred to as a 'British FBI', which will consolidate national investigations under a single agency.
7c640bf811f5f054e72d1a3e7e08f131d8ef1302.headline: UK Announces Plan to Create National British FBI Police Force

3225622ebb08124c52a5852788c02cb1c3113f92.summary: A man was shot and killed by a Border Patrol agent during an immigration crackdown in Minneapolis. In response, the National Guard has been activated in the city.

115962628f0e23cbd0712bf5ae280343ff264353.summary: The Seattle Seahawks defeated the Los Angeles Rams 31-27 to win the NFC Championship, while the New England Patriots beat the Denver Broncos 10-7 in the AFC Championship. The Seahawks and Patriots will meet in Super Bowl 60 on February 8, 2026, at Levi's Stadium in Santa Clara, California. Seattle opened as the betting favorite for the matchup, which is a rematch of Super Bowl XLIX.
115962628f0e23cbd0712bf5ae280343ff264353.headline: Seahawks and Patriots Set for Super Bowl 60 Rematch in Santa Clara

98dcaf1780e48cfb7181214a5c07834dc0249e08.summary: Ukrainian President Zelenskiy announced that a security guarantees document from the US is fully prepared. He also stated that Ukraine and Russia remain far apart on territorial concessions. Russia acknowledged recent trilateral talks but cautioned against expecting major outcomes.

c10508de96d991df296de049d4f5b515774987e0.summary: Video evidence from multiple sources contradicts federal officials' claims that the fatal shooting of 37-year-old Alex Pretti by a federal agent in Minneapolis was self-defense. The footage appears to show Pretti being disarmed before being shot. Calls for a deeper investigation are increasing, and public protests have followed the incident.

453107d8b3652e167167e2ebb0bd02ca4951a521.summary: Manchester City are monitoring Real Madrid's Trent Alexander-Arnold for a possible Premier League return. Liverpool have received a positive response after approaching Xabi Alonso. Chelsea have recalled Aaron Anselmino from his loan at Borussia Dortmund. Andy Robertson's potential move from Liverpool to Tottenham is reportedly off.
453107d8b3652e167167e2ebb0bd02ca4951a521.headline: Manchester City Eye Alexander Arnold

5f9267abd711bf6bc61b09a332c6b2c2310abaef.summary: Pretti, a 37-year-old nurse, was shot and killed by federal law enforcement agents in Minneapolis on Saturday. In response, the National Basketball Players Association issued a statement supporting protesters rallying against the actions of U.S. federal immigration authorities.
5f9267abd711bf6bc61b09a332c6b2c2310abaef.headline: NBA Players Association Supports Minneapolis Protesters After Fatal

31e8044ec96e908921d625e44b07f2d642927448.summary: The Japanese yen rose to a more than two-month high against the dollar, gaining up to 1.2%, as markets anticipated possible intervention by Japanese authorities. Japan's top currency officials said they are closely coordinating with US counterparts, following recent market checks, amid growing concerns over the yen's previous decline.
31e8044ec96e908921d625e44b07f2d642927448.headline: Yen Rises Sharply as Japan Signals Possible Market Intervention

014282d8b62dbe1efb1a025d999de327ccac996d.summary: Anaheim Ducks rookie Beckett Sennecke scored his first NHL hat trick, including the overtime winner, to secure a 4-3 victory over the Calgary Flames on Sunday. Sennecke's third goal came at 2:54 of overtime, helping the Ducks rally for the win.
014282d8b62dbe1efb1a025d999de327ccac996d.headline: Senneckes Hat Trick Lifts Ducks to 4 3 Overtime Win Over Flames

f354ffc76deb031e0797d8c5d2eff64e6c12e5b0.summary: Israel has launched a large-scale operation in Gaza to locate Ran Gvili, the last remaining hostage. The return of Gvili is viewed as the final step needed to advance to the second phase of the U.S.-brokered ceasefire.
f354ffc76deb031e0797d8c5d2eff64e6c12e5b0.headline: Israel Begins Major Operation to Find Last Gaza Hostage

e9309833f16a88b695d5a6189e743fcb160e8074.summary: A severe winter storm has led to the cancellation of about 20,000 flights across the U.S., with major disruptions at Dallas and Atlanta airports. Airlines have issued travel waivers and are advising passengers on refunds and rebooking. The storm is expected to bring snow, sleet, freezing rain, and extremely cold temperatures to the eastern two-thirds of the country through the weekend and into the week.
e9309833f16a88b695d5a6189e743fcb160e8074.headline: Winter Storm Cancels 20

5cfec297a7b26dbde4fd4b6effd2f527a55f09d9.summary: ICE agents shot and killed Pretti, a 37-year-old nurse, in Minneapolis on Saturday. The Trump administration defended the agents' actions, while Barack and Michelle Obama criticized the federal response following the incident. This is the second shooting death by immigration law enforcement officers in Minneapolis.
5cfec297a7b26dbde4fd4b6effd2f527a55f09d9.headline: ICE Agents Kill Nurse in Minneapolis

6d8574096175b82575273b8a7d31659c15d983ee.summary: Donald Trump threatened Mark Carney with a 100% tariff over Canada's trade relations with China. Carney stated that Canada is not seeking a free-trade deal with China and is focusing on domestic policy. Trump's recent remarks on Truth Social differ from his earlier comments encouraging a China deal.
6d8574096175b82575273b8a7d31659c15d983ee.headline: Trump Threatens Carney With Tariff as Canada Shifts Focus From China

74c5781c55ad0533c64a3a0254442dc1f3cb77f5.summary: Israel will reopen the Rafah crossing with Egypt in a limited manner after completing a search for the last hostage's body in Gaza, according to Netanyahu's office. The crossing's reopening is part of a US-brokered ceasefire arrangement.
74c5781c55ad0533c64a3a0254442dc1f3cb77f5.headline: Israel to Reopen Rafah Crossing After Hostage Search Concludes

fad3e384d9052fe0a3e3897af779d9180e5350d6.summary: Jessica Pegula defeated defending champion Madison Keys 6-3, 6-4 in the fourth round of the Australian Open, ending Keys' title defense and advancing to the quarter-finals for the fourth time.
fad3e384d9052fe0a3e3897af779d9180e5350d6.headline: Jessica Pegula Defeats Madison Keys to Reach Australian Open Quarter

796f1644749c1126e32b2607c1f0687a41c0b25b.summary: China's defence ministry has confirmed that Zhang Youxia, the country's most senior general and second-in-command under Xi Jinping as chairman of the Central Military Commission, is under investigation. Taiwan is monitoring what it describes as 'abnormal' changes in China's military leadership following this development.
796f1644749c1126e32b2607c1f0687a41c0b25b.headline: Chinas Top General Zhang Youxia Under Investigation

a4e528c91b72e7c3be3db97edaae3e716600cc77.summary: A major winter storm has killed at least 10 people, caused mass flight cancellations, and left hundreds of thousands without power across the US. Nearly half of US states have declared emergencies, with officials warning of hazardous, life-threatening conditions as freezing weather and snowfall continue.
a4e528c91b72e7c3be3db97edaae3e716600cc77.headline: Winter Storm Kills 10

d24f4197ab65dfcd081986fd063b4b3469128e70.summary: Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer announced he will oppose DHS funding following the fatal shooting of Alex Pretti by federal agents in Minneapolis. Senators Tina Smith and Thom Tillis called for a full investigation into the incident, with Smith alleging a cover-up and Tillis warning against interference in the probe.
d24f4197ab65dfcd081986fd063b4b3469128e70.headline: Senators Demand Investigation After Federal Agents Kill Alex Pretti

f87c751e80d96db4471202e9024b09592fa7ec94.summary: The New England Patriots defeated the Denver Broncos 10-7 in the AFC Championship, securing a spot in Super Bowl LX. Quarterback Drake Maye scored the team's only touchdown and led the Patriots in challenging snowy conditions. This marks the Patriots' 12th Super Bowl appearance and their first under coach Mike Vrabel.
f87c751e80d96db4471202e9024b09592fa7ec94.headline: Patriots Defeat Broncos to Reach Super Bowl LX Under Coach Vrabel

7e63cec18ba1b1b736a57082f8a0339a6648e41f.summary: At least 15 people have died and 24 remain missing after the MV Trisha Kerstin ferry sank near Jolo island in the southern Philippines. Rescuers have saved at least 300 people, and the local coast guard continues search operations.
7e63cec18ba1b1b736a57082f8a0339a6648e41f.headline: Ferry Sinks Near Jolo Island

8ad6345079746f4e97f0fde68b79256dbbe9e8c9.summary: Phoenix Suns guard Devin Booker will miss at least a week after spraining his right ankle during Friday's game against the Atlanta Hawks. Booker, who leads the team with 25.4 points and 6.2 assists per game, will be re-evaluated in one week, according to the Suns.
8ad6345079746f4e97f0fde68b79256dbbe9e8c9.headline: Devin Booker to Miss at Least a Week With Sprained Ankle

693d1c4ce2b9a0c50f7ad43d2e05186baa14582b.summary: Andy Burnham has been blocked by the Labour Party's National Executive Committee from standing as a candidate in a by-election. Burnham expressed disappointment, stating he intended to counter Reform's politics in the contest.
693d1c4ce2b9a0c50f7ad43d2e05186baa14582b.headline: Labour NEC Blocks Andy Burnham From By Election Candidacy

bc0c94bee092059f6e5efec7b41d786cac1b2ab1.summary: The Denver Broncos lost 10-7 to the New England Patriots in the AFC Championship Game. Broncos kicker Andres Borregales missed a 63-yard field goal before halftime, tying an NFL postseason record. Sean Payton said he regrets not attempting an easier field goal earlier in the game.
bc0c94bee092059f6e5efec7b41d786cac1b2ab1.headline: Broncos Fall to Patriots 10 7 After Missed Opportunities in AFC Title

42415603a1b7439ade37666a61ffcf01dddef113.summary: CEOs from Minnesota companies, including Target, 3M, and Cargill, have called for calm and de-escalation following fatal shootings by federal agents in Minneapolis. At least two U.S. citizens have been killed by federal agents since a major operation began in the state.
42415603a1b7439ade37666a61ffcf01dddef113.headline: Minnesota CEOs Urge Calm After Fatal Federal Agent Shootings

fe3274c60192033ed6ea2c38b4c2213618b0426a.summary: Japan's Prime Minister Takaichi's approval ratings have declined as the country begins its election campaign, according to recent reports.
fe3274c60192033ed6ea2c38b4c2213618b0426a.headline: PM Takaichis Approval Ratings Fall as Japan Starts Election Campaign

ff5c7432d2572565578cafbf58e3ed0f1d873d7d.summary: A London-based AI video company specializing in realistic avatars has raised $200 million in new funding.
ff5c7432d2572565578cafbf58e3ed0f1d873d7d.headline: London AI Video Company Raises $200 Million in Funding

dca0f9f122e5a61607f6b376de83e856dc154199.summary: Gold prices reached $5,100 per troy ounce on Monday, marking the strongest monthly performance for bullion in 40 years. The surge is attributed to investors seeking safe assets amid rising geopolitical tensions and fiscal uncertainties worldwide.
dca0f9f122e5a61607f6b376de83e856dc154199.headline: Gold Hits $5100 Posts Strongest Monthly Gain in Four Decades

2ad5e4fc538fb1fae5647d204780a115eac33b58.headline: Private Jet with Eight Aboard Crashes at Maine Airport

3917336c20fe1610e26de7e748508495bb5fb838.summary: Federal immigration agents shot and killed another US citizen in Minneapolis, leading to public protests. The incident has raised questions about whether ICE agents can be prosecuted for their actions.

dd92415a6860bebd89d5386aab2692fe7fb9fca8.summary: Israel has recovered the remains of Ran Gvili, the last hostage held in Gaza, fulfilling a key condition of the initial phase of the U.S.-brokered ceasefire plan. Sanders, who started seven games in his rookie season, finished with 1,400 passing yards, seven touchdowns, 10 interceptions, and one rushing touchdown. The Browns have not yet named a head coach for the 2026 season.

38e509a2c71820b844d8277f64fb8b9b2856676f.summary: A 37-year-old Minneapolis man was shot and killed by a federal agent. Following the incident, Trump stated he is on a 'similar wavelength' with Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz, despite prior disagreements between the two over recent protests related to ICE operations.

941d7acd341f2f08b321ffff6d65659ced041723.summary: The Seattle Seahawks defeated the Los Angeles Rams 31-27 to advance to Super Bowl LX, where they will face the New England Patriots on February 8 at Levi's Stadium in Santa Clara, California. This marks a rematch of Super Bowl XLIX. The Seahawks are favored over the Patriots in the opening odds.
941d7acd341f2f08b321ffff6d65659ced041723.headline: Seahawks to Face Patriots in Super Bowl LX After NFC Championship Win

d80bc9ef995a656a3a90b68f75552f9c48416047.summary: Nvidia has invested $2 billion in CoreWeave by purchasing Class A common stock at $87.20 per share. The deal aims to strengthen Nvidia's partnership with CoreWeave and support the company's data center expansion amid growing competition in AI infrastructure.
d80bc9ef995a656a3a90b68f75552f9c48416047.headline: Nvidia Invests $2 Billion in CoreWeave to Support Data Center Growth

ae4b6834ed1d97e10c2c73aee91dbc6798464c5a.summary: The Los Angeles Chargers have hired Mike McDaniel as their offensive coordinator. McDaniel, who was recently fired after four seasons as the Dolphins' head coach, was officially announced by the Chargers on Monday.

df440d3e6ff3e0adb43eb7f3c35d28f568b79e5c.summary: A ferry carrying over 350 people sank early Monday near Basilan Province in the southern Philippines, resulting in at least 18 deaths. Rescuers saved at least 316 people, while about two dozen remain missing. Search and rescue operations by coast guard and naval ships are ongoing.
df440d3e6ff3e0adb43eb7f3c35d28f568b79e5c.headline: Ferry Sinks in Southern Philippines

3a50d51410a7dc089dce02aaf99aa0f0315ca4f3.summary: The San Francisco Giants have agreed to a two-year, $20.5 million contract with free agent center fielder Harrison Bader, according to sources. The move is expected to strengthen the team's outfield defense.

3c3dde650fbcec698d2b330ee6aa4a50534a6434.summary: Giannis Antetokounmpo's return date is still uncertain as he recovers from a calf strain. The Milwaukee Bucks forward previously estimated he could be sidelined for four to six weeks, but no official timeline has been set.
3c3dde650fbcec698d2b330ee6aa4a50534a6434.headline: Giannis Antetokounmpos Return Remains Uncertain Amid Calf Injury

f40b85991342fe6bc43e543d15492d232d594da4.summary: The Southeastern Conference set a record with 10 teams ranked in the Associated Press women's Top 25 basketball poll released January 26, with Georgia entering at No. 23. UConn remains the only undefeated team in women's college basketball after South Carolina defeated Vanderbilt.
f40b85991342fe6bc43e543d15492d232d594da4.headline: SEC Sets Record With 10 Teams in AP Womens Top 25

a77324eeb7ec39baa7b3911baf2342c63ab49e88.summary: A powerful winter storm has affected much of the US, causing at least 18 deaths and leaving nearly a million people without power, especially in the South. The storm has brought heavy snow, ice, and freezing rain from Texas to Maine, leading to thousands of flight cancellations.
a77324eeb7ec39baa7b3911baf2342c63ab49e88.headline: Winter Storm Causes 18 Deaths and Widespread Power Outages Across US

07c55394dca46a327b63cbd819a4bbd6755c3a84.summary: Minnesota has reported its second fatal shooting this month. Separately, legal proceedings are set between Minnesota and the Trump administration regarding immigration operations.
07c55394dca46a327b63cbd819a4bbd6755c3a84.headline: Minnesota Reports Second Fatal Shooting

46c847fc3b8460d9f2430eeaaee3c86bba5321bd.summary: The US government will provide $1.6 billion in funding to USA Rare Earth, with the Commerce Department taking an equity stake. USA Rare Earth's shares rose 20% following the announcement. The funding will support a magnet manufacturing plant and mining operations at the Round Top deposit in Texas.
46c847fc3b8460d9f2430eeaaee3c86bba5321bd.headline: USA Rare Earth Receives $1.6 Billion US Funding

52190b073152aeff48fe045ff1bdbb7e513e9dd0.summary: Gunmen opened fire at a soccer field in Guanajuato state, central Mexico, killing at least 11 people and wounding 12 others. Authorities report the attack occurred during a match and is part of ongoing violence in the region. Local officials have appealed for federal assistance following the incident.
52190b073152aeff48fe045ff1bdbb7e513e9dd0.headline: Gunmen Kill 11 Wound 12 at Soccer Field in Guanajuato Mexico

528f1b1677860de479c12afe1f31cb3613e893bf.summary: Actor Sadie Frost testified that journalists working for Associated Newspapers Ltd allegedly accessed her private calls and personal information through phone hacking. Frost claimed in court that the publisher repeatedly used information obtained from her phone and described feeling violated by the actions.
528f1b1677860de479c12afe1f31cb3613e893bf.headline: Sadie Frost Testifies Against Associated Newspapers in Phone Hacking

da824128c1c55634b9bae1d8cb9d6ddc790bd4e1.summary: The USS Abraham Lincoln aircraft carrier has entered the Middle East region as part of a continued U.S. military buildup near Iran. Officials say the deployment comes as the White House considers further military action.
da824128c1c55634b9bae1d8cb9d6ddc790bd4e1.headline: USS Abraham Lincoln Arrives in Middle East Amid U.S. Buildup Near Iran

91bfef0f82870509ae515450fa65d3fe6293e3e4.summary: A landslide in Indonesia's West Java has killed at least 17 people. At least 80 people are missing, including 19 members of Indonesia’s elite marine force.
91bfef0f82870509ae515450fa65d3fe6293e3e4.headline: Landslide in West Java Kills 17

7ed0f96403c73d6b167bb719921538494041355e.summary: Labour has blocked Manchester mayor Andy Burnham from standing as a candidate in the upcoming Gorton and Denton parliamentary by-election, citing concerns about diverting resources. The decision has led to significant backlash against Prime Minister Keir Starmer from some party members.
7ed0f96403c73d6b167bb719921538494041355e.headline: Labour Blocks Andy Burnham From Gorton and Denton By Election

2c66052c543567355f2326521cd182d4cdc0eba8.summary: Israel has announced it will reopen Gaza's Rafah crossing after the remains of the last Israeli captive in Gaza are recovered. The crossing remains closed until the search is completed.

58fff424d2a5d387383f1ad9c8aa3c64af28b8af.headline: Seven Killed One Survivor in Private Jet Crash at Maine Airport
