This achievement may support future efforts to track plastic and other debris using space-based technology.
6f91675a857d66e97033597fb5d71f68a3b6ece8.headline: NASA EMIT Sensor Detects Land Based Plastic Pollution for First Time

0deeceed44ac1a64308deeaaaf69480acca6532b.summary: Senate Democrats have announced they will not support a bill to fund the Department of Homeland Security after a deadly ICE shooting, raising the risk of a government shutdown. Odds of a shutdown by January 31 have risen to 78% following another civilian death in Minnesota.
0deeceed44ac1a64308deeaaaf69480acca6532b.headline: Senate Democrats Withhold DHS Funding

796f1d7ab4f15d015039a72e8f38cba1cec0bb68.summary: A winter storm has caused widespread travel disruptions across the US, with at least 819,000 homes and businesses losing power and mass flight cancellations reported.
796f1d7ab4f15d015039a72e8f38cba1cec0bb68.headline: Winter Storm Causes Power Outages and Flight Cancellations Across US

5f2ef12d683e91923b145e307e386eadb187bcc6.summary: Over 60 Minnesota business leaders, including Michael Fiddelke of Target, signed a letter on Sunday urging an immediate deescalation of tensions. Fiddelke also addressed staff in a video message, expressing concern about violence and loss of life in the community.
5f2ef12d683e91923b145e307e386eadb187bcc6.headline: Minnesota Business Leaders Call for Immediate Deescalation Amid

029e5e9414c233b2fb868f3b7ae8a3a0cdfb6b2f.summary: An MP was introduced as Reform's latest member by Nigel Farage at a rally, increasing the party's number of sitting MPs to eight. The former home secretary criticized the Conservatives for failing to act in the best interests of the British people.
029e5e9414c233b2fb868f3b7ae8a3a0cdfb6b2f.headline: Reform Welcomes New MP as Party Reaches Eight in Parliament

9543917a36467c967f35edb283e6407137e6c8b3.summary: Once Upon a Farm, co-founded by Jennifer Garner, is seeking a $209 million US IPO, aiming for a $764 million company valuation.
9543917a36467c967f35edb283e6407137e6c8b3.headline: Once Upon a Farm Seeks $209 Million IPO at $764 Million Valuation

1932bc9051075bb7a20eca0ee35b8f26b448b7ed.summary: Bill Ackman donated $10,000 to the family of Alex Pretti, who was fatally shot by a Border Patrol agent in Minneapolis, according to reports.
1932bc9051075bb7a20eca0ee35b8f26b448b7ed.headline: Bill Ackman Donates $10

6de7d8aeac1331c89a4dab27fb85cdb0b94d9f76.summary: Astronomers using NASA’s James Webb Space Telescope have created one of the most detailed and high-resolution maps of dark matter to date, providing new insights into how dark matter shapes stars, galaxies, and planets.
6de7d8aeac1331c89a4dab27fb85cdb0b94d9f76.headline: Astronomers Release Detailed Dark Matter Map Using Webb Telescope

470003ef7a144e36d9c938b11b4988cedfea9f6e.summary: Nigella Lawson has been announced as the new judge on The Great British Bake Off, replacing Prue Leith, who stepped down after nine seasons. Lawson will join Paul Hollywood on the Channel 4 show.
470003ef7a144e36d9c938b11b4988cedfea9f6e.headline: Nigella Lawson Named New Judge on The Great British Bake Off

ed54ffa69f6c5a6202d7984ebf9ab541bed01ae8.summary: NASA's Hubble Space Telescope captured an image of Lupus 3, a star-forming cloud about 500 light-years away in the constellation Scorpius. The region features swirling gas and a dark dust cloud, indicating active star formation.
ed54ffa69f6c5a6202d7984ebf9ab541bed01ae8.headline: Hubble Captures Star Formation in Lupus 3 Cloud

fbdafd189b8aa3aadd928157ab766875408b0e78.summary: Israel has recovered the remains of the last hostage held in Gaza, Master Sgt. Ran Gvili, fulfilling a key condition for progressing to the next phase of the Gaza cease-fire plan. This development allows for the potential reopening of the border crossing and further steps in the cease-fire process.
fbdafd189b8aa3aadd928157ab766875408b0e78.headline: Israel Recovers Last Hostage Remains

ffc00f803286c27c9273475965eb025560db6fc8.summary: President Trump announced that tariffs on South Korean goods, including automobiles, lumber, and pharmaceuticals, will increase to 25%, citing South Korea's delay in ratifying a trade deal and implementing a $350 billion investment pledge. South Korean automaker and pharmaceutical stocks fell following the announcement.
ffc00f803286c27c9273475965eb025560db6fc8.headline: Trump Raises Tariffs on South Korean Goods to 25% Over Trade Deal

715d4fcb2cdad37f3b61ab818d6a575e0b7d6f5c.summary: India and the EU have finalized a landmark free trade agreement after two decades of negotiations. The deal will create a free trade zone covering two billion people and a quarter of global GDP, slashing or phasing out tariffs on most goods over seven years. The agreement is expected to boost trade in cars, alcohol, machinery, textiles, gems, and pharmaceuticals, and has contributed to a rise in European stocks.
715d4fcb2cdad37f3b61ab818d6a575e0b7d6f5c.headline: India and EU Finalize Landmark Free Trade Agreement After 20 Years

961a4676d69639e51d66320332ea4dc2ffd66698.summary: NATO Secretary-General Mark Rutte told the European Parliament that Europe cannot defend itself without U.S. military support and would need to more than double its current military spending to do so.
961a4676d69639e51d66320332ea4dc2ffd66698.headline: NATOs Rutte Says Europe Needs U.S. Support for Defense

81692581a75df7e84bdd8e7ebbf1bbfb3edaa584.summary: Bovino is set to leave Minneapolis as Trump reshuffles the leadership of his immigration crackdown. Tom Homan, described as the border tsar, is being sent to Minneapolis as part of this change.
81692581a75df7e84bdd8e7ebbf1bbfb3edaa584.headline: Trump Sends Tom Homan to Minneapolis as Bovino Departs

619d1345878d1bfbecd8a31559da56e0dfe80dd3.summary: Mattias Ekholm scored his first NHL hat trick as the Edmonton Oilers defeated the Anaheim Ducks 7-4 on Monday. Zach Hyman and Connor McDavid each had a goal and an assist for Edmonton, while Spencer Stastney scored his first goal with the team. Mikael Granlund recorded a hat trick for Anaheim.
619d1345878d1bfbecd8a31559da56e0dfe80dd3.headline: Ekholm Granlund Record Hat Tricks as Oilers Beat Ducks 7 4

0a2ba67443d68367e6903e0292fbe051d6c74998.summary: The remains of Israeli police sergeant Ran Gvili, killed on October 7, 2023, were returned to Israel from Gaza. Israeli police held a ceremony for Gvili, marking the return of the last hostage's remains and concluding the efforts to recover captives taken during the conflict.
0a2ba67443d68367e6903e0292fbe051d6c74998.headline: Remains of Last Hostage Ran Gvili Returned to Israel From Gaza

b0dda77efa867699f7edaa0a87f804bc096e76ad.summary: Cleveland Browns quarterback Shedeur Sanders has been added to the 2026 Pro Bowl Games roster as a replacement. Sanders, a rookie, played eight games this season, recording 1,400 passing yards, seven touchdowns, and ten interceptions, along with 169 rushing yards and one rushing touchdown.
b0dda77efa867699f7edaa0a87f804bc096e76ad.headline: Shedeur Sanders Added to 2026 Pro Bowl Games as Replacement

0d83cffe85ee9963f2fe24c130199cb0dd884f42.summary: Gregory Bovino has been removed from his role as US Border Patrol commander-at-large and is returning to El Centro, California, to resume duties as chief of that sector. Some Border Patrol agents are also expected to leave Minneapolis, according to multiple sources.
0d83cffe85ee9963f2fe24c130199cb0dd884f42.headline: Gregory Bovino Removed as Border Patrol Commander at Large

542130841ca1fe1b137f350746f4c4ac382c3290.summary: Keir Starmer has announced that ground rents for leaseholders in England and Wales will be capped at £250 a year. The government also proposed banning the sale of new leasehold flats as part of reforms. These changes aim to address housing costs and leasehold practices.
542130841ca1fe1b137f350746f4c4ac382c3290.headline: Keir Starmer Announces £250 Cap on Ground Rents and Ban on New

d66032e888d25b21d59bd523d683d721a0b3ec73.summary: The US Treasury Department has canceled all contracts with Booz Allen Hamilton after a contractor, Charles Edward Littlejohn, leaked confidential tax records of Donald Trump, Elon Musk, and Jeff Bezos. The company's stock fell following the announcement.
d66032e888d25b21d59bd523d683d721a0b3ec73.headline: US Treasury Cancels Booz Allen Contracts After Tax Records Leak

a36530c38f834acac24ff105113557ee72b27c23.summary: Anta Sports has agreed to acquire a 29% stake in Puma for $1.8 billion (1.5 billion euros). The deal caused Puma shares to rise, and Anta Sports stated it does not plan a full takeover.
a36530c38f834acac24ff105113557ee72b27c23.headline: Anta Sports Buys 29% Stake in Puma for $1.8 Billion

dbe4b4aefd9542a73649798e658e4f6c44fe908c.summary: French lawmakers have passed a bill banning social media use by children under 15 and restricting mobile phone use in high schools. President Emmanuel Macron praised the measure as a significant step to protect children and teenagers. France becomes the second country after Australia to enact such a law.
dbe4b4aefd9542a73649798e658e4f6c44fe908c.headline: France Passes Bill Banning Social Media for Children Under 15

246d3475a081cb41bfdaf3cf0c892480c672d6df.summary: Chris Madel, a Republican candidate for governor of Minnesota, has ended his campaign, citing concerns over the ongoing immigration crackdown in Minneapolis. The move follows a series of shootings in Minnesota, with a nurse becoming the sixth person to die during the crackdown. The events have increased divisions within the GOP regarding immigration policy.
246d3475a081cb41bfdaf3cf0c892480c672d6df.headline: Minnesota GOP Candidate Drops Out Amid Immigration Crackdown

88aed4ae0cbdce75eaa8a9452f6e792d66713595.summary: The Washington Commanders are hiring Daronte Jones, previously the Vikings' defensive passing game coordinator and defensive backs coach, as their new defensive coordinator. Jones replaces Joe Whitt, who was fired after the 2025 season.
88aed4ae0cbdce75eaa8a9452f6e792d66713595.headline: Commanders Hire Daronte Jones as Defensive Coordinator

670090973e4e37598a6757a340d1e2fea2179f85.summary: Luka Doncic scored 46 points, along with 11 assists and seven rebounds, as the Los Angeles Lakers defeated the Chicago Bulls 129-118. Doncic became the fastest Lakers player to reach 2,000 NBA points. LeBron James added 24 points, helping the Lakers secure their fourth win in five games and improve to 3-1 on their current road trip.
670090973e4e37598a6757a340d1e2fea2179f85.headline: Luka Doncic Leads Lakers Past Bulls

ea8745a9406a958558616df66008eed3aab2d267.summary: The Seattle Seahawks and New England Patriots will play in Super Bowl LX at Levi's Stadium on February 8, 2026. The Seahawks are favored by 4.5 points over the Patriots. A bettor has placed a $1.1 million wager on the Patriots to win. The referee will be officiating their first Super Bowl game.
ea8745a9406a958558616df66008eed3aab2d267.headline: Seahawks Favored Over Patriots in Super Bowl LX at Levis Stadium

258fc9857f7815eba8a5cc441ba998450863f935.summary: Philip Rivers has withdrawn from consideration for the Buffalo Bills head coaching position, according to reports. Rivers stated it is not the right time for him to pursue the role.
258fc9857f7815eba8a5cc441ba998450863f935.headline: Philip Rivers Withdraws from Bills Head Coach Consideration

915f49dc2086fbc7a5086a0013dce3c157922cc6.summary: The Los Angeles Chargers have hired Mike McDaniel, previously the Dolphins' head coach, as their new offensive coordinator. The team confirmed the appointment, marking a new phase for the Chargers' coaching staff.
915f49dc2086fbc7a5086a0013dce3c157922cc6.headline: Chargers Hire Mike McDaniel as Offensive Coordinator

61d78dd0d5f9249f4901e9224753e73cff9fb5d3.summary: A new Reuters/Ipsos poll shows that only 39 percent of Americans approve of Donald Trump's handling of immigration, marking a record low for his approval on this issue.
61d78dd0d5f9249f4901e9224753e73cff9fb5d3.headline: Trumps Immigration Approval Falls to Record Low in New Poll

081002491bc690dbd748d543a2c83145ba7c4105.summary: The USS Abraham Lincoln aircraft carrier has entered the Middle East as part of a U.S. military buildup near Iran, according to officials. The deployment comes amid ongoing tensions with Iran and as the White House considers further actions.
081002491bc690dbd748d543a2c83145ba7c4105.headline: USS Abraham Lincoln Arrives in Middle East Amid Tensions With Iran

beef9a9d746badba07bdfcab2ff0dc4a1ec312d8.summary: International Criminal Court judges have ruled that Rodrigo Duterte is fit to stand trial, following a previous postponement due to health concerns. The decision clears the way for legal proceedings to continue.
beef9a9d746badba07bdfcab2ff0dc4a1ec312d8.headline: ICC Rules Rodrigo Duterte Fit to Stand Trial

55498afc57c49fd9a878ab4fb8e47b80a447b0d3.summary: Donald Trump threatened South Korea with increased tariffs, citing delays in Seoul's legislature approving a trade deal with Washington. Following the tariff threats, South Korea's Kospi stock index recorded its sharpest rise in three weeks as investors responded to the news.
55498afc57c49fd9a878ab4fb8e47b80a447b0d3.headline: Trump Threatens Tariffs South Koreas Kospi Rises Sharply

3c050c65139e2216be93205a7003edf117cfd299.summary: Protesters in Minnesota demonstrated outside a secured hotel, raising questions about whether the state can prosecute federal agents for alleged excessive force. The legal authority for Minnesota to pursue such cases against federal personnel remains under discussion.
3c050c65139e2216be93205a7003edf117cfd299.headline: Minnesota Protest Spurs Debate on Prosecuting Federal Agents

6f726b9030c066f5b4ae4494ea2586a61ad2d891.summary: A boat carrying 25 French tourists capsized off the coast of Oman, resulting in three deaths, according to Reuters. Authorities are responding to the incident.
6f726b9030c066f5b4ae4494ea2586a61ad2d891.headline: Boat Carrying French Tourists Capsizes Off Oman

ae9d0cbc772029feabda791e6e010ce377510ad5.summary: Bayern Munich have confirmed they are in talks with Harry Kane about extending his contract. Kane, who joined from Tottenham in 2023, is under contract until the end of next season. The club's sporting director and CEO both indicated discussions are ongoing.
ae9d0cbc772029feabda791e6e010ce377510ad5.headline: Bayern Munich in Talks to Extend Harry Kanes Contract

0f8206977ece4de28612c3a93f1518d2534f5a07.summary: A ferry carrying over 350 people sank near Basilan Province in the southern Philippines, killing at least 18 people. Rescuers saved at least 316 passengers, while about two dozen remain missing. The incident occurred early Monday as the vessel was traveling from Zamboanga to Jolo island. Search operations are ongoing.
0f8206977ece4de28612c3a93f1518d2534f5a07.headline: At Least 18 Dead

5a096b5f7cde9f6ad9de49d09196fef32a9d5c29.summary: Gold and silver prices rose sharply, with silver jumping 8% and both metals reaching near record highs due to increased safe-haven demand.
5a096b5f7cde9f6ad9de49d09196fef32a9d5c29.headline: Gold and Silver Prices Surge to Near Record Highs on Safe Haven

89316c74bf09d468cea0b46563864e13b9e37c01.summary: China's Zijin Gold shares rose 19% after announcing a $5.5 billion agreement to acquire Canadian miner Allied Gold, which includes a $4 billion Africa mine deal.
89316c74bf09d468cea0b46563864e13b9e37c01.headline: Zijin Gold Shares Surge After $5.5 Billion Allied Gold Acquisition

589d0040aa87d1d720ee6263822c88822b5ed1ca.summary: A severe winter storm has caused at least 30 deaths across the US, with states from Texas to Maine experiencing heavy snow, ice, and freezing temperatures. Thousands of flights have been canceled as the storm continues to impact large areas of the country.
589d0040aa87d1d720ee6263822c88822b5ed1ca.headline: Winter Storm Causes 30 Deaths and Major Disruptions Across US

3adc75db63690b086eab90c2a845b3fba0acef61.summary: Toronto is recovering after a record snowfall left parts of the city under nearly 60 cm of snow. Over 500 flights were cancelled on Sunday. Officials say clearing the snow will take several days.
3adc75db63690b086eab90c2a845b3fba0acef61.headline: Toronto Begins Cleanup After Record Snowfall and Flight Cancellations

ec92fc711936c4515e16f379fd525d395ee72cb8.summary: Storm Chandra has brought heavy rain and strong winds to the UK, leading to over 100 flood warnings across England. A red flood warning, indicating danger to life, is in effect for Ottery St Mary on the River Otter in south-west England after rainfall totals in the region nearly matched the monthly average in 24 hours.
ec92fc711936c4515e16f379fd525d395ee72cb8.headline: Storm Chandra Triggers Over 100 Flood Warnings Across England

67c72982d9aadff7d88cba201f32ad3dcc2612a2.summary: The Buffalo Bills have promoted offensive coordinator Joe Brady to head coach on a five-year contract, replacing Sean McDermott. Brady, who joined the organization in 2022 as quarterbacks coach, was officially announced as head coach on January 27, 2026.
67c72982d9aadff7d88cba201f32ad3dcc2612a2.headline: Buffalo Bills Promote Joe Brady to Head Coach on Five Year Deal

6c7d27d67e84ef8117969e90314c5cd29fc7f557.summary: The Tennessee Titans plan to hire Brian Daboll as offensive coordinator, contingent on him not being hired as head coach by the Las Vegas Raiders. Multiple reports indicate Daboll will join the Titans' staff if the Raiders select another candidate.
6c7d27d67e84ef8117969e90314c5cd29fc7f557.headline: Titans Plan to Hire Brian Daboll as Offensive Coordinator Pending

3a96e1a675721d219b8519dc0fa3129e07ec01fb.summary: A unit of US Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) will assist with security for the US Olympic delegation at the February Winter Games in Milan-Cortina. The announcement has sparked concern and confusion in Italy, with the Italian government seeking clarification from US diplomats and local officials expressing opposition to the deployment.
3a96e1a675721d219b8519dc0fa3129e07ec01fb.headline: ICE Agents to Assist US Delegation Security at Milan Winter Olympics

dbd06b7e3a30651ca6679834fa2c99cccbefc167.summary: A federal judge in Minnesota has ordered the head of Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) to appear in court and explain why he should not be held in contempt for failing to comply with orders to hold bond hearings for detained immigrants. The judge cited ongoing denials of due process and set a court appearance for Friday.
dbd06b7e3a30651ca6679834fa2c99cccbefc167.headline: Minnesota Judge Orders ICE Chief to Court Over Bond Hearing Compliance

ce7b39539d65d49ebb23c475a05ca7cfabb2b4a5.summary: Aaron Judge has been announced as the cover athlete for MLB The Show 26, making him the second player to appear on the game's cover twice, alongside Joe Mauer. The announcement was made with a new trailer revealing the release date.
ce7b39539d65d49ebb23c475a05ca7cfabb2b4a5.headline: Aaron Judge Named MLB The Show 26 Cover Athlete for Second Time

0eb79c70b7a53f7ae758d98a62eeafb608f1bfc6.summary: President Trump announced that tariffs on South Korean goods, including automobiles, lumber, and pharmaceuticals, will increase to 25%. He stated the move is due to South Korea not fulfilling commitments under a previous trade agreement. Hyundai shares declined following the announcement.
0eb79c70b7a53f7ae758d98a62eeafb608f1bfc6.headline: Trump Announces 25% Tariffs on South Korean Goods

cdac2e08adc32dbae2b31f04670674dca04359ed.summary: TikTok has agreed to settle a lawsuit alleging its app contributed to a user's depression and suicidal thoughts. The settlement removes TikTok from a high-profile social media addiction trial, which will now proceed against Meta and Google, the parent companies of Instagram, Facebook, and YouTube.
cdac2e08adc32dbae2b31f04670674dca04359ed.headline: TikTok Settles Addiction Lawsuit as Trial Proceeds Against Meta

a238a63c3e251cf7da245427ed83bb160ccd32ed.summary: The European Union and India have reached a free trade agreement after nearly 20 years of negotiations. The deal was announced amid ongoing tensions with the United States, which recently imposed steep tariffs on both parties. The agreement is viewed as a significant step in strengthening economic ties between the EU and India.
a238a63c3e251cf7da245427ed83bb160ccd32ed.headline: EU and India Finalize Free Trade Agreement After Two Decades

9c55586c6dc88ae3e4da78fcdc3fe92abd4a14d4.summary: Vancouver Canucks goaltender Thatcher Demko will undergo season-ending hip surgery next week and will not return this season, according to general manager Patrik Allvin.
9c55586c6dc88ae3e4da78fcdc3fe92abd4a14d4.headline: Thatcher Demko to Miss Rest of Season After Hip Surgery

69676e8ee856cba1a576a7930a4feabd8dde2182.summary: Mark Carney denies reversing his Davos remarks during a phone call with Donald Trump, despite the US treasury chief claiming Carney walked back his comments. The Canadian prime minister confirmed a call took place after Trump threatened 100% tariffs on Canada.
69676e8ee856cba1a576a7930a4feabd8dde2182.headline: Carney Denies Walking Back Davos Remarks in Call With Trump

87717302567980644437499e3a5fa46ec1cd7c91.summary: Amazon is closing its Fresh supermarkets and Go convenience stores, with some locations being converted into Whole Foods stores. The company will focus on expanding same-day grocery delivery and its Whole Foods operations.
87717302567980644437499e3a5fa46ec1cd7c91.headline: Amazon to Close Fresh and Go Stores

177572e66089fcc7b5bc199245fa9aafb37a55f6.summary: Coco Gauff was filmed smashing her racket after losing to Elina Svitolina in the Australian Open quarterfinals and has called for more privacy for players. Aryna Sabalenka advanced to the semifinals after defeating Iva Jovic 6-3, 6-0.
177572e66089fcc7b5bc199245fa9aafb37a55f6.headline: Gauff Seeks Privacy After Loss as Sabalenka Reaches Australian Open

e2e3d69512d749308c22fd6f70de943210c4a5dd.summary: At least 35 people have died across the United States due to severe winter storms and freezing temperatures, according to local officials. The extreme cold continues to affect several states.
e2e3d69512d749308c22fd6f70de943210c4a5dd.headline: At Least 35 Dead in US as Severe Winter Storms Persist

8bf2a1616d98ca22917e046a042d72741dfcc2e0.summary: Spain's socialist-led coalition government has approved a decree to regularise 500,000 undocumented migrants and asylum seekers. The process applies to foreign nationals without a criminal record who can prove they lived in Spain for at least five months before 31 December 2025.
8bf2a1616d98ca22917e046a042d72741dfcc2e0.headline: Spain Approves Decree to Regularise 500

cb2449abf621eb444e667ca741a4b200d7c605ba.summary: The Treasury has introduced a three-year relief package for pubs, providing an average of £1,650 per pub in 2026/27, following warnings about potential mass closures and job losses.
cb2449abf621eb444e667ca741a4b200d7c605ba.headline: Treasury Announces Three Year Relief Package for Pubs

e965f8f6a53883c9299f6a3c788490525f627444.summary: House Democrats have warned President Trump that they will begin impeachment proceedings against Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem if he does not remove her from office, following her controversial remarks about Alex Pretti's death in Minnesota. Trump has defended Noem, stating she is doing a very good job.
e965f8f6a53883c9299f6a3c788490525f627444.headline: House Democrats Threaten Impeachment of DHS Secretary Noem

6850c00e2e1cd85ff2b5264084b4f1484de24bc5.summary: A lawsuit filed in Massachusetts challenges the Trump administration's justification for extrajudicial killings of people suspected of drug smuggling at sea, marking the first federal court case over such strikes since the administration began targeting vessels off Venezuela.
6850c00e2e1cd85ff2b5264084b4f1484de24bc5.headline: Lawsuit Challenges Trump Administrations Drug Smuggling Strikes at Sea

031522f9811ec12445afa239ed29f1641685ab03.summary: Anta Sports has agreed to buy a 29% stake in Puma for $1.8 billion from the Pinault family. Anta stated it does not plan to pursue a full takeover. Puma shares rose following the announcement.
031522f9811ec12445afa239ed29f1641685ab03.headline: Anta Sports Buys 29% Stake in Puma for $1.8 Billion

deb55e36f00ebc50bdcb6b4ab438c130813996be.summary: U.S. population growth slowed significantly in the year ending June 2025, with the Census Bureau attributing the decline to a sharp drop in net immigration. Growth was about half as fast as the previous year.
deb55e36f00ebc50bdcb6b4ab438c130813996be.headline: U.S. Population Growth Slows Sharply as Immigration Declines

8164b59810aad0a889dcfa7d83e723ef866f5d7a.summary: The Seattle Seahawks and New England Patriots are set to play in Super Bowl 60 on February 8, 2026. Sam Darnold's quarterback status for the game is being monitored. Betting odds, notable wagers, and ticket information are being actively tracked ahead of the event.
8164b59810aad0a889dcfa7d83e723ef866f5d7a.headline: Seahawks and Patriots to Meet in Super Bowl 60 on February 8

ac42216db624b089a0e20263cc5315b284111749.summary: Lei Lei and Xiao Xiao, the last two pandas in Japan, have departed Tokyo for China, ending Japan's five-decade presence of pandas and marking the conclusion of China's 'panda diplomacy' with Japan. Thousands gathered to bid farewell to the animals as they left.
ac42216db624b089a0e20263cc5315b284111749.headline: Japans Last Two Pandas Leave Tokyo as China Ends Panda Diplomacy

95ab5cab1a8b24c934be33eb019809205b1989fb.summary: Mike McCarthy has officially signed a contract to become the head coach of the Pittsburgh Steelers, replacing Mike Tomlin, who stepped down earlier this month after 19 seasons. McCarthy, a Pittsburgh native, brings an 18-season head coaching record of 174-112-2. He expressed enthusiasm about the team's current quarterback situation during his introductory press conference.
95ab5cab1a8b24c934be33eb019809205b1989fb.headline: Mike McCarthy Named Pittsburgh Steelers Head Coach

6b9e1273fbafdb03b90be77a737a6aab2ba19d7d.summary: A landslide in Niscemi, Sicily, triggered by Cyclone Harry, has forced the evacuation of about 1,500 people after a 4km-long chasm opened in the hillside, leaving houses at risk on the cliff edge. Local authorities report the situation as dire.
6b9e1273fbafdb03b90be77a737a6aab2ba19d7d.headline: Landslide in Sicily Forces Evacuation of 1

c1291ad8ab85ec70d34d16195337db7e15545222.summary: Claudia Sheinbaum confirmed that Mexico cancelled an oil shipment to Cuba, stating the decision was made independently and not in response to pressure from the US.
c1291ad8ab85ec70d34d16195337db7e15545222.headline: Sheinbaum Confirms Mexico Cancelled Oil Shipment to Cuba

61191671f953e68a6adc34615480285be8dfeaf5.summary: A byelection is taking place in a traditionally safe Labour area, where the outcome will test Keir Starmer's popularity. The campaign has drawn attention due to candidate missteps, including confusion over constituency boundaries during a photo opportunity involving Lee Anderson.
61191671f953e68a6adc34615480285be8dfeaf5.headline: Byelection in Safe Labour Area Tests Keir Starmers Popularity

7393a5e44c6378cfeb6e2f1d0e48003413134b8e.summary: A person is in critical condition after being shot during an incident involving U.S. Border Patrol in Arizona, according to the Pima County Sheriff's Department. Authorities are investigating the circumstances of the shooting.
7393a5e44c6378cfeb6e2f1d0e48003413134b8e.headline: Person in Critical Condition After Border Patrol Shooting in Arizona

4a27f35fd537128db4b692ebb5fc298d15565652.summary: India and the European Union have announced a free trade deal that will establish a trade zone covering up to 2 billion people, creating one of the world's largest free trade areas.
4a27f35fd537128db4b692ebb5fc298d15565652.headline: India and EU Announce Free Trade Deal Covering 2 Billion People

be0bbfcbbfaa7300624358717dc29dd1c0c74792.summary: Composer Philip Glass has withdrawn the world premiere of his latest symphony from the Kennedy Center, citing opposition to the values of the Trump-dominated institution under Donald Trump's presidency.
be0bbfcbbfaa7300624358717dc29dd1c0c74792.headline: Philip Glass Cancels Kennedy Center Premiere in Protest of Trump

3f9bb3cccd7df50cbfa41410238386e926906329.summary: Border Patrol commander Greg Bovino and several agents are expected to leave Minneapolis, according to officials and news sources.
3f9bb3cccd7df50cbfa41410238386e926906329.headline: Border Patrol Commander Bovino and Agents Expected to Leave

fab397fde2c4613c20dd005426999aab44df0919.summary: Astronomers have used an artificial intelligence-assisted method to analyze nearly 100 million images from NASA's Hubble Legacy Archive, leading to the discovery of rare astronomical phenomena previously hidden in the data.
fab397fde2c4613c20dd005426999aab44df0919.headline: AI Helps Astronomers Find Rare Phenomena in Hubble Telescope Data

14732b84a0cf28a7ac1126b30fc3f65c9b92048a.summary: CBS News Editor-in-Chief Bari Weiss announced the addition of new podcasters and writers as contributors, outlining her strategy to reshape the network's coverage during a staff meeting on Tuesday.
14732b84a0cf28a7ac1126b30fc3f65c9b92048a.headline: Bari Weiss Adds New Podcasters and Writers as CBS Contributors

2e58477d6b6254d826c0adc222ac09154237fb89.summary: Paul Thomas Anderson's political thriller leads the Bafta nominations with 14, followed by Sinners, Hamnet, and Marty Supreme. The British film I Swear received five nominations. The nominations reflect a diverse range of films recognized ahead of the upcoming awards.
2e58477d6b6254d826c0adc222ac09154237fb89.headline: Political Thriller Leads Bafta Nominations With 14 Nods

79e8a6117ec67544a8054fcef0d4827a0138c040.summary: Bill Belichick, an eight-time Super Bowl champion and former New England Patriots head coach, was not chosen for the Pro Football Hall of Fame in his first year of eligibility for the 2026 class after falling short of the required votes. The decision surprised many in the sports world.
79e8a6117ec67544a8054fcef0d4827a0138c040.headline: Bill Belichick Not Selected as First Ballot Hall of Famer in 2026

1bd114c21c481ae1c29651d9f11af6cac1c885d7.summary: Novak Djokovic advanced to the Australian Open semi-finals after Lorenzo Musetti retired with an injury in the third set, despite leading Djokovic by two sets. Djokovic will play in his 13th Australian Open semi-final and will face either Ben Shelton or Jannik Sinner for a place in the final.
1bd114c21c481ae1c29651d9f11af6cac1c885d7.headline: Djokovic Reaches Australian Open Semi Finals After Musetti Retires

3239c8bc378dc173b8280c38167fa62111f25b71.summary: Ilhan Omar was sprayed with an unknown liquid by a man using a syringe during a Minneapolis town hall. Omar was uninjured, continued the event, and the attacker was arrested and charged with assault.
3239c8bc378dc173b8280c38167fa62111f25b71.headline: Ilhan Omar Unharmed After Man Sprays Liquid at Minneapolis Town Hall

7694a5b51f0c71270418556b25948ad3efee9253.summary: Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum confirmed that Mexico has paused oil shipments to Cuba, describing it as a sovereign decision and not a response to external pressure from the United States.
7694a5b51f0c71270418556b25948ad3efee9253.headline: Mexico Pauses Oil Shipments to Cuba

4f003641082499a5a62015abc76018e5f6febe5b.summary: The Denver Broncos fired offensive coordinator Joe Lombardi, wide receivers coach Keary Colbert, and cornerbacks coach Addison Lynch on Tuesday, two days after the team's loss in the AFC championship game. The organization thanked the coaches for their contributions as part of a staff shakeup following an underwhelming offensive season.
4f003641082499a5a62015abc76018e5f6febe5b.headline: Broncos Fire Three Coaches After AFC Championship Loss

94166456f102a403abf390f615439a3488e90727.summary: Two federal officers fired shots during the encounter that killed ICU nurse Alex Pretti in Minneapolis, according to a notice from a U.S. Customs and Border Protection official to Congress.
94166456f102a403abf390f615439a3488e90727.headline: Federal Officers Fired Shots in Fatal Encounter With Alex Pretti

48d2d6ff5df5a26b3f1f0d928c04bf5cc4293b9b.summary: A South Korean court has sentenced former first lady Kim Keon Hee to a jail term for accepting luxury bags, a diamond necklace, and other gifts as bribes.
48d2d6ff5df5a26b3f1f0d928c04bf5cc4293b9b.headline: South Korea Court Jails Former First Lady Kim Keon Hee for Bribery

e9192a95d53f55116df5df5f806fa7ebf8c91aec.summary: A Russian drone strike on a passenger train in northeastern Ukraine killed five people, according to prosecutors. The attack was denounced as terrorism by Volodymyr Zelenskyy, who said it undermined efforts to end the war.
e9192a95d53f55116df5df5f806fa7ebf8c91aec.headline: Russian Drone Strike on Ukrainian Train Kills Five

ccee2e8fdf0ab00135ea0219f6adb7f7ad053db4.summary: Spain's government announced it will grant legal status to potentially 500,000 immigrants living and working in the country without authorization.
ccee2e8fdf0ab00135ea0219f6adb7f7ad053db4.headline: Spain to Grant Legal Status to Up to 500

843aa6c66f6ffb8c5812291ca0961ede7f285928.summary: The US is sending Immigration and Customs Enforcement agents to the Milan-Cortina Winter Olympics for security support of the US Olympic delegation. Italian officials and the public have expressed concern and requested clarification, while US authorities state ICE will not be involved in immigration enforcement during the event.
843aa6c66f6ffb8c5812291ca0961ede7f285928.headline: Italy Seeks Clarification on US ICE Agents Role at Winter Olympics

645d03ad9f9c2231aee75c8d53ce04f27a5120df.summary: Neil Young announced he is giving free access to his entire music catalog to residents of Greenland, aiming to support them amid recent tensions involving the U.S. and NATO.
645d03ad9f9c2231aee75c8d53ce04f27a5120df.headline: Neil Young Offers Free Music Catalog Access to Greenland Residents

a46319a2abb3768850bd60212408cad4137413ce.summary: San Antonio Spurs' Victor Wembanyama expressed horror on Tuesday regarding two fatal shootings by immigration agents in Minneapolis, stating he is disturbed by the news and did not want to give a 'politically correct' answer.
a46319a2abb3768850bd60212408cad4137413ce.headline: Victor Wembanyama Expresses Horror Over Minneapolis Shootings

b435318cce8392a94e99fc602bae9d7ce6846aa1.summary: Airports in several Asian countries have implemented screening measures for travelers from India following confirmed Nipah virus cases in West Bengal. Authorities in New Delhi are working to address concerns as the virus, which lacks a known cure, causes regular outbreaks in South Asia.
b435318cce8392a94e99fc602bae9d7ce6846aa1.headline: Asian Airports Screen Travelers After Nipah Virus Cases in India

bc96ca0a4a08b4f33ab10f790b09eadc43f820ef.summary: ASML reported record orders driven by strong demand for AI chips, surpassing estimates. The company raised its 2026 outlook but also announced job cuts. Shares rose 7% following the news.
bc96ca0a4a08b4f33ab10f790b09eadc43f820ef.headline: ASML Reports Record Orders and Raises 2026 Outlook Amid AI Demand

c7efcb5655d0725ee05cfe7bfb482732d9570903.summary: President Trump stated he maintains confidence in Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem despite calls for her resignation following the shooting deaths of Alex Pretti and Renee Good in Minneapolis. The White House is working to address tensions as Minnesota officials urge an end to Trump's immigration operation in the state.
c7efcb5655d0725ee05cfe7bfb482732d9570903.headline: Trump Backs Noem Amid Calls for Resignation After Minneapolis

e90abeb98c6b7cabd065aea35356124454c05661.summary: TikTok has agreed to settle a landmark social media addiction lawsuit ahead of trial, according to the plaintiff's attorneys. The trial involving Meta and YouTube will proceed as scheduled.
e90abeb98c6b7cabd065aea35356124454c05661.headline: TikTok Settles Social Media Addiction Lawsuit Before Trial

33a699ef6a2c00cf711746f403d5f32a02d18f34.summary: Iga Swiatek criticized the extensive behind-the-scenes camera coverage at the Australian Open, supporting Coco Gauff's earlier complaints about a lack of privacy for players. Both players expressed concern over the constant filming, comparing it to being watched like animals in a zoo.
33a699ef6a2c00cf711746f403d5f32a02d18f34.headline: Swiatek and Gauff Criticize Australian Opens Player Camera Coverage

1e8b25938cdd94335ca3aaa150ac85d7896cc827.summary: Elena Rybakina defeated Iga Swiatek 7-5, 6-1, and Jessica Pegula beat Amanda Anisimova to advance to the Australian Open semifinals, both achieving upsets over higher-seeded opponents.
1e8b25938cdd94335ca3aaa150ac85d7896cc827.headline: Rybakina and Pegula Advance to Australian Open Semifinals After Upsets

762af59deb9f39f95d7ed32aa5dd95b77342b563.summary: Aaron Judge has been revealed as the cover athlete for MLB The Show 26, making him the second player to appear on the game's cover twice, alongside Joe Mauer. The announcement was made in a new trailer.
762af59deb9f39f95d7ed32aa5dd95b77342b563.headline: Aaron Judge Named MLB The Show 26 Cover Athlete for Second Time

24ebab9125ad0d2e9319b5c772a34346b7cad766.summary: North Korea will announce plans for a nuclear-war deterrent and a five-year development strategy for defense and the economy at its upcoming party congress, according to state media.
24ebab9125ad0d2e9319b5c772a34346b7cad766.headline: North Korea to Announce Nuclear Deterrent and Five Year Plan at

624fefcb56ec016bafd55f5784e3059b120c94e1.summary: Atomic scientists have moved the Doomsday Clock closer to midnight than ever before, citing increased threats from nuclear weapons, climate change, and artificial intelligence. They urge the public to call for urgent action from leaders to address these risks.
624fefcb56ec016bafd55f5784e3059b120c94e1.headline: Doomsday Clock Set Closest to Midnight Amid Rising Global Threats

72b58ea9802d6cd962302be8e0a5ba8bd59d4045.summary: Amazon announced it will close all Amazon Fresh grocery stores and Amazon Go convenience stores. The company plans to focus on expanding its Whole Foods Market locations and grocery delivery services.
72b58ea9802d6cd962302be8e0a5ba8bd59d4045.headline: Amazon to Close Fresh and Go Stores

a3a4d6352beaacff9676ee440346993d94c757f3.summary: The National Transportation Safety Board concluded that the deadly midair collision near Washington, D.C., resulted from multiple systemic failures, following years of ignored warnings about air traffic. The investigation did not identify a single cause for the crash.
a3a4d6352beaacff9676ee440346993d94c757f3.headline: NTSB Cites Systemic Failures in Deadly DC Midair Collision

c6412f0d954a1ef02e36d7fc74091eb8b0d9e5a9.summary: A federal judge has temporarily blocked the removal of a five-year-old Ecuadorian boy and his father detained last week in Minnesota as part of the government's immigration crackdown. The court order prevents their deportation while legal proceedings continue.
c6412f0d954a1ef02e36d7fc74091eb8b0d9e5a9.headline: Judge Temporarily Blocks Deportation of Father and Son in Minnesota

3bf994603a1849990639b35f145a13f0ea0886b7.summary: U.S. consumer confidence dropped sharply in January 2026, reaching its lowest level since 2014, according to multiple reports. The decline reflects growing concerns about the economy among Americans.
3bf994603a1849990639b35f145a13f0ea0886b7.headline: U.S. Consumer Confidence Falls to Lowest Level Since 2014

e23ef68a68b443893ffff37ec3dcfa3ec88f6727.summary: Iran has executed a man accused of spying for Israel, according to reports from Reuters and Al Arabiya English. The execution took place on January 28, 2026.
e23ef68a68b443893ffff37ec3dcfa3ec88f6727.headline: Iran Executes Man Accused of Spying for Israel

40b93642ff2d80c816022839ab4d9972ced5a768.summary: The dollar fell to a four-year low after Trump commented on its value, calling it 'great.' The decline led to intensified selling, while gold prices rose to a record high above $5,200 an ounce.
40b93642ff2d80c816022839ab4d9972ced5a768.headline: Dollar Drops to Four Year Low After Trump Comments

2440b6d750f4b6387eeb37d83bb39638b87f45f5.summary: Oil prices increased as concerns about U.S. supply disruptions persisted following a recent winter storm. Market uncertainty remains due to ongoing effects on production and distribution.
2440b6d750f4b6387eeb37d83bb39638b87f45f5.headline: Oil Prices Rise Amid Ongoing U.S. Supply Concerns After Winter Storm

1c24da54782db9a614951e0180a4b2c7fe20861c.summary: Carney stated he told Trump he meant what he said at Davos, after discussing issues including the Ukraine war and Arctic security, which refers to the Greenland controversy. Carney also reacted to the US Treasury secretary with an eye roll.
1c24da54782db9a614951e0180a4b2c7fe20861c.headline: Carney Reaffirms Davos Remarks to Trump

0f6b4d38f39e5619c0183374234a07a1a2e5f6d7.summary: Bill Belichick, an eight-time Super Bowl-winning coach, was not elected to the Pro Football Hall of Fame in his first year of eligibility for the 2026 class. The decision drew strong reactions from supporters, including Tom Brady, who publicly criticized the voting committee for the exclusion.
0f6b4d38f39e5619c0183374234a07a1a2e5f6d7.headline: Bill Belichick Misses Hall of Fame in First Year

521ad89418219ea3c87cd6e5b654834f5c15ff97.summary: The Cleveland Browns have hired former Ravens offensive coordinator Todd Monken as their next head coach, replacing Kevin Stefanski. This marks Monken's first NFL head coaching position. The decision was reported on Wednesday, concluding a three-week search for the Browns' 19th full-time head coach.
521ad89418219ea3c87cd6e5b654834f5c15ff97.headline: Browns Hire Todd Monken as New Head Coach

5b12c09784512323ad0f1fb21bceffe72a5c4c59.summary: Patrick Reed announced he is leaving LIV Golf and will spend the rest of 2026 on the European tour, with plans to return to the PGA Tour as early as August. Reed informed the PGA Tour of his intention after his LIV Golf contract expired. He is the second major champion to exit LIV Golf, following Brooks Koepka's return to the PGA Tour the same week.
5b12c09784512323ad0f1fb21bceffe72a5c4c59.headline: Patrick Reed Leaves LIV Golf

b2a44d68ee243a3e22ccdf7f5c339e404b3cc66b.summary: Two federal officers who fatally shot ICU nurse Alex Pretti in Minneapolis have been placed on administrative leave, according to U.S. Customs and Border Protection. The shooting occurred during an immigration operation. The officers have continued work in another city, and the Trump administration is addressing the aftermath.
b2a44d68ee243a3e22ccdf7f5c339e404b3cc66b.headline: Federal Officers Placed on Leave After Fatal Shooting in Minneapolis

fde1e8a3ffe4e261270155f2c062ffd4c6a95d95.summary: The FBI, led by Kash Patel, searched the Fulton County election office in Atlanta as part of an investigation related to the 2020 US presidential election. The search addresses concerns linked to the Trump-Biden contest, following repeated false claims by Donald Trump about the election outcome.
fde1e8a3ffe4e261270155f2c062ffd4c6a95d95.headline: FBI Searches Atlanta Election Office Over 2020 Presidential Vote

68ea2bbdfd856214729231a5bf7a2eefcdb63a3e.summary: Milwaukee Bucks player Giannis Antetokounmpo has reportedly expressed readiness to be traded, and the Bucks are listening to aggressive offers from multiple teams ahead of the February 5 NBA trade deadline. While a trade could happen soon, sources indicate it remains more likely during the offseason.
68ea2bbdfd856214729231a5bf7a2eefcdb63a3e.headline: Bucks Considering Trade Offers for Giannis Antetokounmpo Before

d3fc6ec3821a9569d625df09b90d8c7f642ecbaa.summary: Tyson Fury has confirmed he will return to boxing to fight Arslanbek Makhmudov in the UK on April 11, ending his latest retirement. The bout was announced by Netflix.
d3fc6ec3821a9569d625df09b90d8c7f642ecbaa.headline: Tyson Fury to Fight Arslanbek Makhmudov in April Comeback

bd2e21e4cc636d0a7097033831b540aa0a8d2a57.summary: On January 28, 2026, Donald Trump warned Iran to agree to a nuclear deal soon or face a much stronger U.S. military response. He stated that a large U.S. naval force is heading to the region, while Iran said its armed forces are ready to respond to any aggression. Tensions between the U.S. and Iran have escalated as both sides issue threats.
bd2e21e4cc636d0a7097033831b540aa0a8d2a57.headline: Trump Warns Iran to Make Nuclear Deal as U.S. Armada Approaches

52f088db954347a401bd5291c990baa5742bd02f.summary: Rep. Ilhan Omar was sprayed with an unknown substance by a man during a town hall in Minneapolis on Tuesday. The man was tackled by security and arrested. Omar was not seriously injured. The incident occurred amid heightened tensions over recent federal immigration enforcement actions in the city.
52f088db954347a401bd5291c990baa5742bd02f.headline: Rep. Ilhan Omar Sprayed With Unknown Substance at Minneapolis Town

9ee45343933db6ae555938b8202df1901b495ad5.summary: Sarah Mullally has been officially confirmed as the archbishop of Canterbury, becoming the first woman to lead the Church of England. The confirmation ceremony took place at St Paul's Cathedral. Some African church leaders have expressed dismay at her appointment, while Mullally has pledged to address misogyny in the church.
9ee45343933db6ae555938b8202df1901b495ad5.headline: Sarah Mullally Confirmed as First Female Archbishop of Canterbury

cba5eb277baffdcdde712be5bd388b8bb174ef44.summary: Amazon is cutting about 16,000 corporate jobs in its second round of mass layoffs in three months, aiming to reduce bureaucracy. Affected employees will receive full pay and benefits for 90 days.
cba5eb277baffdcdde712be5bd388b8bb174ef44.headline: Amazon to Lay Off 16

e79ac42563bc297e7004be85db517ddd5bba869a.summary: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent reaffirmed the U.S. strong dollar policy and dismissed speculation of government intervention in currency markets. Following his statements, the dollar rebounded after recent declines.
e79ac42563bc297e7004be85db517ddd5bba869a.headline: Dollar Rises After Bessent Rejects U.S. Currency Market Intervention

12f0f31faccfe0d34d44528279f3ec68805aec0a.summary: Prime Minister Keir Starmer stated he discussed the Chagos agreement with Donald Trump amid concerns the US could withdraw support. Downing Street sources maintain the agreement is a 'done deal,' and US intelligence agencies continue to support it despite Trump's criticism.
12f0f31faccfe0d34d44528279f3ec68805aec0a.headline: UK Confirms Chagos Deal Remains in Place Despite Trump Criticism

32faab4f13253a8cf4e93dd316bae14b24487d87.summary: Several major banks have joined companies like BlackRock and BNY in pledging to match employee contributions for a specific cause, with financial firms making up most of the participating organizations.
32faab4f13253a8cf4e93dd316bae14b24487d87.headline: Major Banks Join Companies in Matching Employee Contributions

4a59dfc1eae881ffcac251c7228759a976b85447.summary: Lineups have been confirmed for the final round of the 2025-26 UEFA Champions League group stage, including Inter Milan vs Borussia Dortmund. Chelsea will play Napoli as both teams seek to advance in the competition.
4a59dfc1eae881ffcac251c7228759a976b85447.headline: Champions League Group Stage Concludes With Key Final Round Matches

43e7e2aa67d488e957eb0d9580f1f06e12382d80.summary: With the NBA trade deadline approaching on February 5, several teams are expected to focus on selling players, while the Mavericks are centering roster decisions around Flagg. Major trades from Los Angeles teams are unlikely, but some role players may be moved to strengthen lineups.
43e7e2aa67d488e957eb0d9580f1f06e12382d80.headline: NBA Teams Prepare for Trade Deadline as Mavericks Focus on Flagg

8239c20bb2884e609b13f43a78cd7ba35d33398d.summary: Hungarian prosecutors have filed charges seeking to fine Budapest Mayor Gergely Karácsony for urging public protests against the government in June. The charges aim to impose the fine without a trial, following large demonstrations in response to Karácsony's call.
8239c20bb2884e609b13f43a78cd7ba35d33398d.headline: Prosecutors Seek Fine Against Budapest Mayor Karácsony Over Protest

2d16c6fc3e4514a320939bc43809f041f8a391e7.summary: The New York Yankees have acquired right-handed reliever Angel Chivilli from the Colorado Rockies in exchange for minor league infielder T.J. Rumfield. To clear space on the roster, the Yankees designated outfielder Michael Siani for assignment. Chivilli appeared in 30 games for Colorado in 2024 with a 4.55 ERA.
2d16c6fc3e4514a320939bc43809f041f8a391e7.headline: Yankees Trade for Reliever Angel Chivilli

6bf6a5fff05994d046ff4af262d88e59fe945b57.summary: The FBI confirmed court-authorized activity at the Fulton County Election Hub and Operation Center. The Department of Justice recently filed a lawsuit against Fulton County seeking records related to the 2020 election. The FBI did not specify if its action is connected to the lawsuit.
6bf6a5fff05994d046ff4af262d88e59fe945b57.headline: FBI Conducts Court Authorized Activity at Fulton County Election

3a55f89436a2fc2f50af91848b56cef88b87bdf4.summary: Stocks reached a record high and the dollar stabilized as investors awaited the Federal Reserve's interest rate decision. Gold surpassed $5,300 for the first time, supported by a weaker dollar. Optimism over corporate earnings contributed to Wall Street's rebound following the recent Greenland crisis.
3a55f89436a2fc2f50af91848b56cef88b87bdf4.headline: Stocks Hit Record High and Gold Surges Ahead of Fed Rate Decision

99aa9051d4d2be5a8c752216492a7183c5929cad.summary: The S&P 500 index closed above 7,000 points for the first time, driven by investor optimism about artificial intelligence. This marks a new record high for the benchmark U.S. stock index.
99aa9051d4d2be5a8c752216492a7183c5929cad.headline: S&P 500 Closes Above 7

99a5f3397d6dc5f07fabe8a02c0097b24c12b44e.summary: New York Mayor Zohran Mamdani has proposed raising taxes on wealthy residents to address a $12 billion city budget deficit. Mamdani attributed the shortfall to fiscal mismanagement by former Mayor Eric Adams and ex-Governor Andrew Cuomo.
99a5f3397d6dc5f07fabe8a02c0097b24c12b44e.headline: Mayor Mamdani Proposes Tax Increases on Wealthy to Address Budget

4e191c1b7f8ec0de29e29f6ce0c4693bf0feafc6.summary: Nouri al-Maliki criticized Donald Trump's threat to withdraw US support for Iraq if al-Maliki returns to power, calling it 'blatant American interference' in Iraq's election.
4e191c1b7f8ec0de29e29f6ce0c4693bf0feafc6.headline: Al Maliki Condemns Trumps Threat to Withdraw US Support for Iraq

f5b98b914231f49b5340f94a25720e914d7e1f9d.summary: India has confirmed two cases of the Nipah virus in West Bengal over the past month. In response, airports across Asia have increased alert measures. The Nipah virus spreads from animals to humans, has a high fatality rate, and currently has no vaccine.
f5b98b914231f49b5340f94a25720e914d7e1f9d.headline: India Confirms Two Nipah Virus Cases

27d3a6c6b2c7eb4458fefb69131ab92332233822.summary: Ajit Pawar, the deputy chief minister of Maharashtra State, died in a charter jet crash while landing. Authorities in India are investigating the cause of the accident.
27d3a6c6b2c7eb4458fefb69131ab92332233822.headline: Ajit Pawar Dies in Maharashtra Plane Crash

d7d739fdf68e3e4b4af3efc8a4174fd013235013.summary: A fire broke out at a luxury hotel in Courchevel in the French Alps, leading to the evacuation of nearly 300 people. No injuries were reported.
d7d739fdf68e3e4b4af3efc8a4174fd013235013.headline: Fire at French Alps Hotel Prompts Evacuation of Nearly 300 People

f79018a9cd857fcc51cba1a2843452d3a6d49b20.summary: NASA scientists have launched the NURTURE airborne mission to study severe winter storms. The international campaign uses advanced remote sensing instruments to collect data and improve understanding of storm formation and behavior.
f79018a9cd857fcc51cba1a2843452d3a6d49b20.headline: NASA Launches NURTURE Mission to Study Severe Winter Storms

452263d4bdb28a31f886adb6f2eb0375975f9af3.summary: The James Webb Space Telescope has confirmed the existence of a bright galaxy that formed 280 million years after the Big Bang, advancing observations of the early universe.
452263d4bdb28a31f886adb6f2eb0375975f9af3.headline: James Webb Telescope Confirms Bright Galaxy From Early Universe

b4f19a6a1c859f1cae97cf0de713a8efcf338d78.summary: Astronomers using NASA’s Chandra X-ray Observatory and other tools have discovered a galaxy cluster that began forming about a billion years after the big bang, one to two billion years earlier than previously believed. The finding provides new insight into the early formation of large cosmic structures.
b4f19a6a1c859f1cae97cf0de713a8efcf338d78.headline: Astronomers Find Earliest Known Galaxy Cluster Formation

473d1eeeaa904bd00233c05fd6e77f394724ac2c.summary: Bill Belichick was not elected to the Pro Football Hall of Fame in his first year of eligibility for the 2026 class. The decision drew criticism from Tom Brady and Robert Kraft, who publicly supported Belichick. The Hall of Fame released a statement addressing rumors about the voting process and said it would act if selection bylaws were violated.
473d1eeeaa904bd00233c05fd6e77f394724ac2c.headline: Belichick Misses Hall of Fame in First Year

74284c1befe588f0b3d817969ef1c64ed8bc66ba.summary: Two US federal agents involved in the fatal shooting of intensive care nurse Alex Pretti during an immigration raid in Minneapolis have been placed on administrative leave, according to a US Customs and Border Protection spokesperson. The incident has led to ongoing public outrage and debate over immigration law enforcement.
74284c1befe588f0b3d817969ef1c64ed8bc66ba.headline: Two Federal Agents Placed on Leave After Fatal Minneapolis Shooting

a25cbb2ded9526f6cfe37216764b815355e6a4c0.summary: China has executed 11 people linked to Myanmar-based criminal gangs, including key members of the Ming family group involved in scam operations, according to state media. The executions are part of efforts to combat cross-border fraud and scam centres operating from Myanmar.
a25cbb2ded9526f6cfe37216764b815355e6a4c0.headline: China Executes 11 Linked to Myanmar Based Scam Gangs

bdace6bcc52e1271efbf8ace50d498f710e35c56.summary: The Cleveland Browns have hired Todd Monken, previously the Baltimore Ravens offensive coordinator, as their new head coach, replacing Kevin Stefanski. Monken becomes the Browns' 11th head coach since 1999, as NFL teams continue to fill head coaching vacancies after the regular season.
bdace6bcc52e1271efbf8ace50d498f710e35c56.headline: Browns Hire Todd Monken as New Head Coach

47d897ef553129a7988b171a961a103785a31d00.summary: The FBI has executed a search warrant at Fulton County's Elections Hub and Operations Center in Atlanta, seizing original 2020 voting records as part of an investigation into claims of vote fraud related to the 2020 presidential election.
47d897ef553129a7988b171a961a103785a31d00.headline: FBI Seizes 2020 Voting Records in Atlanta Election Office Search

b3f9867e55a0c493b148e81a14f3ad4a65083751.summary: A county in Virginia has opposed the sale of a warehouse owned by Jim Pattison Developments to U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE). The building's potential use by ICE has sparked local controversy.
b3f9867e55a0c493b148e81a14f3ad4a65083751.headline: Virginia County Opposes Sale of Warehouse to ICE

f05fb4034a3c89c90eec157d9717e5c9541e1c14.summary: Senegal manager Pape Thiaw has been banned for five games and fined by CAF following chaotic incidents during the Africa Cup of Nations final against Morocco.
f05fb4034a3c89c90eec157d9717e5c9541e1c14.headline: Senegal Manager Pape Thiaw Banned and Fined After Cup of Nations Final

d416e726ac294dc48cfb0490ccf4fd67581bd621.summary: LeBron James was emotional during a video tribute as he returned to Cleveland, where the Cavaliers defeated the Los Angeles Lakers 129-99. The meeting signaled a reset in China-UK relations, with both sides expressing interest in strengthening economic cooperation.

dedde9555359c7b056fdf56d1abce2c3d0c35462.summary: Senate Democrats, led by Chuck Schumer, have called for immigration reforms, including a mask ban for federal agents, to be included in Department of Homeland Security funding legislation. b5ffed7b17a367cb3abbd031ef4e28f1977015d7.summary: Champions League Matchday 8 saw all 36 teams play at once, providing significant drama and standout performances. 349d1ed85634ad687eaee5ff8319a72a6f6458e2.summary: Residents in Niamey, Niger, reported heavy gunfire and explosions near the city's international airport on Thursday. 85e20aad9f9a4a115d9b6a0a2df6da73fc0a28b7.summary: Carlos Alcaraz overcame cramps and a tough challenge from Alexander Zverev to win a five-set semi-final at the Australian Open, securing his place in the final after a match lasting five hours and 27 minutes.
