4c9e6d7e3774006876c13d32cc25d43c28d8df4d.summary: The Syrian Kurdish-led SDF has agreed to a ceasefire and a phased integration deal with the government after losing significant territory to government forces in recent weeks.
4c9e6d7e3774006876c13d32cc25d43c28d8df4d.headline: Syrian Kurdish Led SDF Reaches Ceasefire and Integration Deal

36440db56f572db456c2e7295de1649cc53a81dc.summary: The CEO of the Indonesia Stock Exchange has resigned following an $84 billion market selloff triggered by MSCI's warning of a possible downgrade to 'frontier' market status. The government has announced new measures to improve market liquidity in response to the situation.
36440db56f572db456c2e7295de1649cc53a81dc.headline: Indonesia Stock Exchange CEO Resigns After Major Market Selloff

d6d63711c6bef5277a9f8ff5577e2a2e2362b15e.summary: Bill Belichick was not selected for this year's Pro Football Hall of Fame class, with voters citing their reasons for omitting him from their ballots. The voting process is under investigation following scrutiny over the results. The official Hall of Fame class will be announced on February 5.
d6d63711c6bef5277a9f8ff5577e2a2e2362b15e.headline: Bill Belichick Not Selected for Hall of Fame

6ae99126c35472c30968b16369addce91e8c838d.summary: Justin Rose leads the Farmers Insurance Open after shooting a 10-under-par 62 on the North Course at Torrey Pines. Brooks Koepka returned to the PGA Tour for the first time since March 2022, finishing with an opening round of 73.
6ae99126c35472c30968b16369addce91e8c838d.headline: Justin Rose Leads Farmers Insurance Open

14c7de40fd2e1fe613959374a9fbff443e9c8b81.summary: Apple reported a 16% annual increase in revenue for its fiscal first quarter, surpassing expectations. The growth was driven by strong iPhone demand in Asia, while sales of wearables and Mac computers declined.
14c7de40fd2e1fe613959374a9fbff443e9c8b81.headline: Apple Revenue Rises 16% on Strong iPhone Demand in Asia

971f6cea21fef881eb1ce7489f16cbfc634925cb.summary: Donald Trump said he plans to talk to Iran as the US increases its military presence in the Middle East. The Pentagon is preparing for possible action, but Trump stated he is seeking communication with Iran's leadership.
971f6cea21fef881eb1ce7489f16cbfc634925cb.headline: Trump Plans Talks With Iran Amid US Military Build Up

1d705fe51f2331de0418e8953b216fb2e8f9eee0.summary: Trump is considering military strikes against Iran, according to sources. The president has deployed military forces to the region, while Iran warns it will retaliate if attacked. Iran has recently faced airstrikes and internal unrest.
1d705fe51f2331de0418e8953b216fb2e8f9eee0.headline: Trump Considers Military Strikes Against Iran Amid Rising Tensions

86e8601ce458518c212697fd3ef2960210808649.summary: Maj James Hook and Col Samantha Shepherd have been charged with offences related to their handling of a sexual assault case involving Gunner Beck, a 19-year-old soldier who died by suicide at Larkhill camp in Wiltshire in 2021.
86e8601ce458518c212697fd3ef2960210808649.headline: Two Army Officers Charged Over Handling of Soldiers Sexual Assault

bbdc77bf2213c7afa64d4d0b425a5475017af1ff.summary: Kon Knueppel led the Hornets to their fifth consecutive win over the Mavericks, making key plays late in the game. Cooper Flagg scored 49 points, setting an NBA record for a teenager, but the Mavericks lost to the Hornets.
bbdc77bf2213c7afa64d4d0b425a5475017af1ff.headline: Hornets Defeat Mavericks Despite Flaggs Record 49 Points

f6ad1742cea2a8157f4dd9c9117aaf542c38b993.summary: Israel handed over the bodies of 15 unidentified Palestinians to Hamas on Thursday, completing the final exchange of prisoners and detainees between the two sides.
f6ad1742cea2a8157f4dd9c9117aaf542c38b993.headline: Israel Completes Final Exchange With Hamas

d6f49b5fda82ca74a60fb107e5c44ae37fb399a8.summary: The European Union has officially designated Iran's Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC) as a terrorist organization in response to the group's crackdown on protesters. The move aligns the EU with similar actions taken by the United States and Canada.
d6f49b5fda82ca74a60fb107e5c44ae37fb399a8.headline: EU Designates Irans Revolutionary Guard as Terrorist Organization

3b5c5bdf83190c79c0084de8d9105f377c47d3ae.summary: Tom Homan, leading the federal surge in Minneapolis, announced he is developing a plan to reduce the number of federal agents in the Twin Cities.
3b5c5bdf83190c79c0084de8d9105f377c47d3ae.headline: Tom Homan Plans to Reduce Federal Agent Presence in Minneapolis

d15e3190a5a0b3aa50dabaed0c838d40f7ea07b2.summary: A man and a woman in Indonesia's Aceh province were each caned 140 times by Sharia police after being found guilty of having sex outside marriage and drinking alcohol. This is among the harshest punishments issued since Aceh adopted sharia law.
d15e3190a5a0b3aa50dabaed0c838d40f7ea07b2.headline: Aceh Couple Caned 140 Times for Violating Sharia Law

d591654a87215576677f9007ed72d86bf73d9a46.summary: Amazon is in discussions to invest up to $50 billion in OpenAI, according to sources. OpenAI CEO Sam Altman and Amazon CEO Andy Jassy are reportedly speaking directly about the potential deal.
d591654a87215576677f9007ed72d86bf73d9a46.headline: Amazon in Talks to Invest Up to $50 Billion in OpenAI

32e9390a8b04db04656e26dc2f221b9c207d09d5.summary: Iran's foreign minister Abbas Araghchi is set to visit Ankara for talks as Turkey mediates to prevent a US attack. Iran has stressed its defensive readiness but faces pressure to make concessions over its nuclear program amid heightened US threats.
32e9390a8b04db04656e26dc2f221b9c207d09d5.headline: Turkey Mediates Talks as Iran Faces US Pressure Over Nuclear Program

a1a6bbd34333e26504237f420463d9faa5a0c569.summary: Vizsla Silver, a Vancouver-based mining company, reports that 10 of its employees were abducted from a project site in Concordia, Sinaloa, Mexico. The region has experienced cartel violence since 2024.
a1a6bbd34333e26504237f420463d9faa5a0c569.headline: Ten Vizsla Silver Employees Abducted from Mexican Mining Site

d56e8f3fea3957fa5009a759df56fa00d387acf1.summary: Iran's Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC) will conduct live-fire military exercises in the Strait of Hormuz, according to Iranian media reports. The announcement comes amid ongoing tensions with the United States.
d56e8f3fea3957fa5009a759df56fa00d387acf1.headline: Irans IRGC Announces Live Fire Drills in Strait of Hormuz

0c84a2757a6613bdee86305d383cb9fe93d99e8a.summary: Islamic State has claimed responsibility for a deadly attack on the international airport and adjacent air force base in Niamey, Niger's capital. Militants used heavy weapons and drones, damaging planes from Ivorian and Togolese airlines. The claim follows accusations by Abdourahamane Tiani of foreign involvement in the incident.
0c84a2757a6613bdee86305d383cb9fe93d99e8a.headline: Islamic State Claims Attack on Niamey Airport and Air Base in Niger

e474023a4daf2bbba93ce7353ab659a856605649.summary: The US deputy attorney general announced that the Department of Justice has opened a federal civil rights investigation into the fatal shooting of Minneapolis nurse Alex Pretti by federal agents. The FBI will lead the federal probe. Protests continue in Minneapolis following Pretti's death.
e474023a4daf2bbba93ce7353ab659a856605649.headline: Federal Civil Rights Probe Launched in Death of Alex Pretti in

2fef6ea1259c4a13b1e4f2e63bc9fb9978410408.summary: Catherine O'Hara, Emmy-winning actor known for her roles in 'Schitt’s Creek,' 'Home Alone,' and 'Beetlejuice,' died on January 30 at the age of 71 after a brief illness. Her death was confirmed by her manager.
2fef6ea1259c4a13b1e4f2e63bc9fb9978410408.headline: Catherine OHara Emmy Winning Actor Dies at 71

d03fd65895f3cd531a4b271f67978dd6cd7f06f0.summary: The Justice Department released over 3 million pages of documents, more than 2,000 videos, and 180,000 images related to Jeffrey Epstein. Deputy Attorney General Todd Blanche said about 200,000 pages were withheld or redacted due to legal privileges. The release fulfills a congressional requirement.
d03fd65895f3cd531a4b271f67978dd6cd7f06f0.headline: Justice Department Releases Over 3 Million Pages in Epstein Case

c988b1641dffa185c2dcf49f7672f5c2d144ce81.summary: A federal judge has ruled that Luigi Mangione will not face the death penalty in the case involving the killing of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson. The judge dismissed the federal murder charge that carried capital punishment, but Mangione still faces federal stalking charges and state murder charges.
c988b1641dffa185c2dcf49f7672f5c2d144ce81.headline: Judge Bars Death Penalty in Luigi Mangione CEO Murder Case

1339c0c533027f0da12ca1305dc7bba2514c0099.summary: Lindsey Vonn crashed during her final downhill race before the Milano Cortina 2026 Winter Olympics in Switzerland on Friday. She was airlifted to a hospital for evaluation after clinging to her left knee. The race was cancelled following her crash. Vonn stated her Olympic hopes remain despite the injury.
1339c0c533027f0da12ca1305dc7bba2514c0099.headline: Lindsey Vonn Injured in Crash Before Winter Olympics

ec9f02284758b138eca244170ab27b337de0229d.summary: Journalist Don Lemon was arrested by federal agents in Los Angeles in connection with an anti-ICE protest that disrupted a church service in Minnesota. Lemon, who was covering the protest for his online news show, faces federal civil rights charges. His lawyer has pledged to fight the charges, and press freedom groups have criticized the arrest.
ec9f02284758b138eca244170ab27b337de0229d.headline: Don Lemon Arrested Faces Federal Charges After Minnesota Church

52338e0653ff0ffcf6271d2740d6a89f9dd93b1d.summary: Israel announced that the Rafah border crossing between Gaza and Egypt will reopen on Sunday, marking the first time the crossing has been open since May 2024. The reopening will allow people to travel between Gaza and Egypt after a prolonged closure.
52338e0653ff0ffcf6271d2740d6a89f9dd93b1d.headline: Israel to Reopen Gaza Egypt Rafah Crossing on Sunday After Long

46c59c61a3e0687deb7ec684f08d9ac291470a60.summary: The Minnesota Vikings fired general manager Kwesi Adofo-Mensah on January 30, 2026, after the team missed the playoffs with a 9-8 record. The Vikings appointed executive vice president of football operations Rob Brzezinski as interim general manager through the 2026 NFL draft, after which a search for a permanent replacement will begin.
46c59c61a3e0687deb7ec684f08d9ac291470a60.headline: Vikings Fire GM Kwesi Adofo Mensah

44e4940f55deedcfdd33bc3142dfde68a014e507.summary: New England Patriots quarterback Drake Maye did not practice on Friday due to illness, as confirmed by coach Mike Vrabel. Maye is also managing a shoulder injury ahead of the team's Super Bowl matchup with the Seattle Seahawks.
44e4940f55deedcfdd33bc3142dfde68a014e507.headline: Patriots QB Drake Maye Misses Practice Due to Illness Before Super

2c9b99bf3fbb62f1af4006179c6ac05458000536.summary: Novak Djokovic defeated defending champion Jannik Sinner in a five-set semifinal to reach his 11th Australian Open final. Djokovic will face Carlos Alcaraz in the final as he seeks his 25th Grand Slam title.
2c9b99bf3fbb62f1af4006179c6ac05458000536.headline: Djokovic Defeats Sinner to Reach Australian Open Final Against Alcaraz

8c1110372a27143344b755384b0ca05a09cafcdb.summary: Donald Trump has nominated Kevin Warsh to succeed Jerome Powell as chair of the Federal Reserve. Warsh, a former Fed governor, will require Senate confirmation. The nomination comes amid heightened White House interest in central bank policy and ongoing Senate opposition from Sen. Tillis until a legal dispute involving Powell is resolved.
8c1110372a27143344b755384b0ca05a09cafcdb.headline: Trump Nominates Kevin Warsh to Succeed Powell as Fed Chair

706a4cd38bf1b37f39858328dceeb344975be3af.summary: UN Secretary-General António Guterres warned that the United Nations could face a financial collapse by July 2026 if member states do not pay their outstanding dues. Guterres urged countries to address unpaid contributions and consider reforms to the UN's financial system.
706a4cd38bf1b37f39858328dceeb344975be3af.headline: Guterres Warns UN May Face Financial Collapse by July 2026

410de8ec9e01f7e539c5cf930be8a146b201b49b.summary: Sam Curran took a hat-trick as England defeated Sri Lanka by 11 runs (DLS) in a rain-shortened T20 international series opener in Pallekele. Curran became the second England bowler to achieve a T20I hat-trick. Sri Lanka was all out for 133 in 17 overs, with England reaching 125-4 before rain ended play.
410de8ec9e01f7e539c5cf930be8a146b201b49b.headline: Sam Curran Hat Trick Secures England Win Over Sri Lanka in Rain

b016938f84451fc45c691ff27d3ffa93e5a2c26c.summary: The NFL has confirmed Bad Bunny will perform at the Super Bowl halftime show despite criticism from the Trump administration. The 60th Super Bowl will feature the Seattle Seahawks facing the New England Patriots, a rematch of their game 11 years ago.
b016938f84451fc45c691ff27d3ffa93e5a2c26c.headline: Bad Bunny Set for Super Bowl Halftime as Seahawks Face Patriots

a000691da439d581a9aca9b3dd14c6465049695c.summary: Nikola Jokic is expected to return to the Denver Nuggets lineup on Friday against the Los Angeles Clippers after missing 16 games with a bone bruise in his left knee. His return makes him eligible for the NBA's end-of-season awards.
a000691da439d581a9aca9b3dd14c6465049695c.headline: Nikola Jokic Set to Return for Nuggets After 16 Game Absence

719bcbcae94e6364006da2c3dd74fa43623822d3.summary: Lakers center Jaxson Hayes and Spurs rookie Carter Bryant have accepted invitations to participate in the NBA slam dunk contest at All-Star Weekend in Los Angeles, according to sources.
719bcbcae94e6364006da2c3dd74fa43623822d3.headline: Jaxson Hayes and Carter Bryant to Compete in NBA Slam Dunk Contest

dd1209f8baeea3346aa3ac9586ea5bfc4d59f4bd.summary: Donald Trump warned the UK against strengthening ties with China as Keir Starmer visited Beijing and Shanghai to discuss economic cooperation and promote trade deals after meeting Xi Jinping.
dd1209f8baeea3346aa3ac9586ea5bfc4d59f4bd.headline: Trump Warns UK Over China Ties During Starmers Visit to Beijing

dbd1cc0af67f26165361b741d15c30faf6a55903.summary: Panama's supreme court has ruled against the concession held by a subsidiary of Chinese company CK Hutchison at the Panama Canal ports. The decision supports President Trump's goal of increasing U.S. control over the canal. Panama's president stated that canal operations will continue as normal.
dbd1cc0af67f26165361b741d15c30faf6a55903.headline: Panama Court Ends Chinese Port Concession

a1aa7e54387a78003de217cc3f0318f4bedc425d.summary: The US Department of Justice released three million pages of documents, including emails showing payments to Reinaldo Avila da Silva. The disclosures have renewed scrutiny of the relationship between the disgraced financier and the UK's former Washington ambassador.
a1aa7e54387a78003de217cc3f0318f4bedc425d.headline: DOJ Releases Emails Revealing Payments Linked to Disgraced Financier

fa7ff799065f1d6b99f49126134fb30354b391ba.summary: Trump announced that the U.S. will decertify Canadian planes and impose a 50% tariff on Canadian aircraft sold in the U.S., citing Canadian restrictions on U.S.-made Gulfstream aircraft. This move escalates trade tensions between the two countries.
fa7ff799065f1d6b99f49126134fb30354b391ba.headline: Trump Announces 50% Tariff and Decertification of Canadian Planes

c770f51ea02762c23d7130999ae7b72337dad538.summary: The Syrian government and Kurdish-led forces have reached an agreement to extend a fragile ceasefire into a permanent truce in northeastern Syria. The deal establishes a framework for integrating Kurdish forces into the state, following Ahmed al-Sharaa's rise to the presidency after rebel forces seized power in December 2024.
c770f51ea02762c23d7130999ae7b72337dad538.headline: Syrian Government and Kurdish Forces Agree to Permanent Truce

21f9459eb6199e7cdc630a4c147cee556b5cbec2.summary: Donald Trump signed an executive order declaring a national emergency regarding Havana, enabling tariffs on any country that delivers oil to Cuba. The White House stated the action targets Cuba's ties to hostile powers and increases pressure on its government.
21f9459eb6199e7cdc630a4c147cee556b5cbec2.headline: Trump Signs Order Allowing Tariffs on Oil Deliveries to Cuba

12fafe38c01d72af030a6511c0a5754d645ab82f.summary: The WNBA and the players' union are scheduled to meet Monday in New York to resume collective bargaining negotiations, which have been stalled for several weeks. Kelsey Plum, vice president of the players' union, confirmed the meeting while speaking to reporters.
12fafe38c01d72af030a6511c0a5754d645ab82f.headline: WNBA and Players Union Set to Resume Stalled Contract Talks Monday

3aa264ab6c444c29a891fbbc27e26662da5abe23.summary: South Africa has declared Israel’s chargé d’affaires persona non grata, accusing the Israeli representative of 'gross abuse of diplomatic privilege.' In response, Israel has announced a reciprocal measure against South Africa.
3aa264ab6c444c29a891fbbc27e26662da5abe23.headline: South Africa Expels Israeli Diplomat

410cde97ac3554cbbc32dc79f6bef896b9241be4.summary: The Israeli military has acknowledged that the Gaza health authorities' reported death toll of around 70,000 is broadly accurate, reversing its previous rejection of these figures.
410cde97ac3554cbbc32dc79f6bef896b9241be4.headline: Israeli Military Accepts Gaza Death Toll of About 70

4649fa26bb09c24b0d1ede5aed36fde5b2a53dec.summary: Deng Chol Majek has been sentenced to at least 29 years in prison for the murder of Rhiannon Whyte, whom he stabbed 23 times at a railway station. The sentencing follows a conviction for what the court described as a 'sadistic' attack.
4649fa26bb09c24b0d1ede5aed36fde5b2a53dec.headline: Deng Chol Majek Jailed for 29 Years for Murder of Rhiannon Whyte

8576334c2b0fe6f1904a7fa7443aef80fe131d91.summary: The US Senate has stalled on a funding deal, increasing the likelihood of a partial government shutdown set to begin Saturday. The proposed deal aims to address Democratic concerns about Department of Homeland Security funding related to enforcement actions in Minnesota.
8576334c2b0fe6f1904a7fa7443aef80fe131d91.headline: Senate Stalls on Funding Deal

af61afc17665cda1c0eaa5ef8d34d8bfddd99133.summary: Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum warned that US tariffs threatened by Donald Trump on goods from countries supplying energy to Cuba could worsen the humanitarian situation in Cuba.
af61afc17665cda1c0eaa5ef8d34d8bfddd99133.headline: Sheinbaum Warns US Tariffs Could Deepen Cuba Crisis

1dcad1360f8b918762e4e03e2555e326fc08e52a.summary: NASA has postponed the first crewed Artemis mission to the moon due to near-freezing temperatures forecasted at the launch site.
1dcad1360f8b918762e4e03e2555e326fc08e52a.headline: NASA delays the first Artemis moonshot with astronauts because of extreme cold at the launch site - AP News

c0d7847343c3361e2c9556776845978dc81fe51f.summary: Deep Space Station 15, a 112-foot antenna at the Goldstone Deep Space Communications Complex near Barstow, California, was photographed under the Milky Way in September 2025. Goldstone is part of NASA’s Deep Space Network, which supports communications with spacecraft across the solar system.
c0d7847343c3361e2c9556776845978dc81fe51f.headline: Deep Space Station 15 Photographed Under Milky Way at Goldstone

76799fb13ae605412a792a0399b2697121085fab.summary: U.S. producer prices rose in December, marking the largest monthly increase in five months. Businesses are passing on higher costs, including those from tariffs, to consumers.
76799fb13ae605412a792a0399b2697121085fab.headline: U.S. Producer Prices See Largest Rise in Five Months in December

855030e9ef8b2abab0397b3e98e17b34fe5b4935.summary: Venezuela's acting President Delcy Rodríguez has announced an amnesty bill that could allow the release of hundreds of political prisoners. Rodríguez also stated that the El Helicoide prison will be closed, marking major reforms following the recent change in leadership.
855030e9ef8b2abab0397b3e98e17b34fe5b4935.headline: Venezuela Proposes Amnesty and Closure of El Helicoide Prison

920809c9174066d4b8a9b6c39c67f6d2c14eee60.summary: A partial US government shutdown began on Saturday after the House of Representatives failed to vote on a funding deal. The Senate passed a measure to avert the shutdown, but the House is in recess until Monday, when a vote could reopen the government. The funding impasse centers on Democratic opposition to Department of Homeland Security spending following recent enforcement actions.
920809c9174066d4b8a9b6c39c67f6d2c14eee60.headline: Partial US Government Shutdown Begins as House Delays Funding Vote

6682eae47453ec1ccf997b75d8d40d32ab53394e.summary: Donald Trump has nominated Kevin Warsh to be the next chair of the Federal Reserve, succeeding Jerome Powell. Warsh, a former Fed governor and critic of the central bank, was announced as Trump's pick on Friday. The nomination comes amid White House efforts to increase influence over the Fed and has prompted mixed reactions from markets and lawmakers.
6682eae47453ec1ccf997b75d8d40d32ab53394e.headline: Trump Nominates Kevin Warsh to Succeed Powell as Fed Chair

5dc05cad6877023ace1e17e8e56b07f716f83cb6.summary: Recently released Department of Justice documents show that Jeffrey Epstein connected New York Giants co-owner Steve Tisch with multiple women in 2013. Tisch's name appears at least 440 times among the millions of files made public on Friday.
5dc05cad6877023ace1e17e8e56b07f716f83cb6.headline: Epstein Linked Giants Co Owner Steve Tisch With Women

c7d4bffc1f839b98e70b4fedfd6be0251b75ca1b.summary: Nikola Jokic returned to the Denver Nuggets' lineup on Friday after missing 16 games with a left knee injury. Jokic scored 31 points and had 12 rebounds, helping the Nuggets defeat the Los Angeles Clippers 122-109.
c7d4bffc1f839b98e70b4fedfd6be0251b75ca1b.headline: Nikola Jokic Returns Leads Nuggets to Win Over Clippers

7ca08557764a7816af12bf43d68cc05f4382f29c.summary: A federal judge has dismissed the murder charge against Luigi Mangione in the case of the fatal shooting of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson, making him ineligible for the death penalty. Prosecutors are now barred from seeking capital punishment in this case.
7ca08557764a7816af12bf43d68cc05f4382f29c.headline: Judge Dismisses Death Penalty Charge in Mangione CEO Murder Case

e66806db93be9a5efcb36428146f8a0fc2b83dd3.summary: Neal Skupski and Christian Harrison won the Australian Open men's doubles title, while Elise Mertens and Zhang Shuai claimed the women's doubles championship. Novak Djokovic and Carlos Alcaraz are set to face each other in the men's singles final.
e66806db93be9a5efcb36428146f8a0fc2b83dd3.headline: Skupski and Harrison Win Mens Doubles

fe549f03fbec06af7f446619d956cdbb46690513.summary: Luka Doncic recorded a triple-double by halftime and finished with 37 points, 13 assists, and 11 rebounds as the Los Angeles Lakers defeated the Washington Wizards 142-111 on January 30. The Lakers' win was decisive, with Doncic leading throughout and Deandre Ayton adding 28 points and 13 rebounds.
fe549f03fbec06af7f446619d956cdbb46690513.headline: Luka Doncic Leads Lakers to 142 111 Win Over Wizards With Triple

aed881ddd5e1415e0c920a8a705164cf55d36c18.summary: Justin Rose set a new 36-hole tournament record and leads by four shots at the halfway point of the Farmers Insurance Open. Brooks Koepka, returning to the PGA Tour, made the cut on the number.
aed881ddd5e1415e0c920a8a705164cf55d36c18.headline: Justin Rose Leads by Four After Record 36 Holes at Farmers Insurance

f9c6bed857bd76d6fb14e952dcb778dc80db7b09.summary: Brooklyn Nets guard Egor Demin set an NBA rookie record by making a 3-pointer in his 34th straight game during a 109-99 win over the Utah Jazz on Friday night. Demin finished with 25 points and 10 rebounds, helping the Nets end a seven-game losing streak.
f9c6bed857bd76d6fb14e952dcb778dc80db7b09.headline: Egor Demin Sets NBA Rookie 3 Point Record as Nets Defeat Jazz

1201519fdba77077ffc016d460f0eab995a81df5.summary: Jacob Wilson and the Athletics have agreed to a seven-year, $70 million contract extension, with a club option for an eighth season. The deal, announced Friday, keeps Wilson under contract through at least 2032 and avoids salary arbitration after the 2027, 2028, and 2029 seasons.
1201519fdba77077ffc016d460f0eab995a81df5.headline: Jacob Wilson Athletics Agree to Seven Year $70 Million Extension

ba411ca18d87389c909974643b858405514b2611.summary: The Minnesota Vikings fired general manager Kwesi Adofo-Mensah on Friday after four seasons. The move comes less than a year after Adofo-Mensah signed a contract extension and follows the team's failure to reach the playoffs this season.
ba411ca18d87389c909974643b858405514b2611.headline: Vikings Dismiss GM Kwesi Adofo Mensah After Missing Playoffs

f58307b5d1f5e4bc12ec5358d35836f244ff46c0.summary: Journalist Don Lemon was released from custody after being arrested and charged with federal civil rights violations related to his coverage of an anti-immigration enforcement protest at a Minnesota church. Lemon pleaded not guilty to the charges.
f58307b5d1f5e4bc12ec5358d35836f244ff46c0.headline: Don Lemon Released After Pleading Not Guilty to Protest Charges

c670bf3625b45f4fcbef21fd9af6e87ee1178702.summary: Donald Trump has selected Brett Matsumoto, a longtime Bureau of Labor Statistics economist, to lead the agency. Matsumoto's nomination comes after Trump withdrew a previous, more controversial pick and follows months without a permanent commissioner.
c670bf3625b45f4fcbef21fd9af6e87ee1178702.headline: Trump Selects Brett Matsumoto to Lead Bureau of Labor Statistics

83a1408715b5df5f21ff6c725315128f385b6430.summary: The US has approved major arms sales to Israel and Saudi Arabia. Israel will receive $6.67 billion in military equipment, including 30 Apache attack helicopters. Saudi Arabia will purchase Patriot missiles worth $9 billion. The total value of the approved sales exceeds $15 billion.
83a1408715b5df5f21ff6c725315128f385b6430.headline: US Approves Over $15 Billion in Arms Sales to Israel and Saudi

d66ce7f6b30b64fdab9b87aee8c7bebafc8b5a6b.summary: Iran's foreign minister stated that Tehran is prepared to resume nuclear talks with the United States but will not negotiate over its missile program or defense capabilities.
d66ce7f6b30b64fdab9b87aee8c7bebafc8b5a6b.headline: Iran Open to Nuclear Talks With U.S

71fb2fe469aa8a9a2a22168f603734bb37c10562.summary: Catherine O'Hara, Emmy-winning actor known for her roles in 'Schitt's Creek,' 'Home Alone,' and 'Beetlejuice,' died on January 30 at age 71 after a brief illness. Her career spanned 50 years and included collaborations with Christopher Guest.
71fb2fe469aa8a9a2a22168f603734bb37c10562.headline: Catherine OHara Emmy Winning Actor Dies at 71

18f7ec0f3e7f886d0454b8e57e8160ce32256b49.summary: Panama's supreme court has ruled against a Chinese company's concession to operate ports at each end of the Panama Canal, supporting US policy objectives. Panama's president stated the canal will continue to operate normally. The decision is seen as a victory for President Trump, who has advocated for greater US control over the canal.
18f7ec0f3e7f886d0454b8e57e8160ce32256b49.headline: Panama Court Ends Chinese Port Concession

bc44174f4346a5bdb1b294d003847ba6fcf6a2d8.summary: The US Department of Justice released over three million documents related to Jeffrey Epstein, including emails between Epstein and a person referred to as 'The Duke' and photos showing Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor in compromising positions. Mountbatten-Windsor continues to deny any wrongdoing amid renewed scrutiny.
bc44174f4346a5bdb1b294d003847ba6fcf6a2d8.headline: DOJ Releases Epstein Files Including Photos of Andrew Mountbatten

1df3c8b2a920f25c225ae384938cd8114aaf76d5.summary: Thousands of people in Minnesota and other U.S. cities protested as part of a national shutdown, calling for an end to immigration enforcement operations by ICE.
1df3c8b2a920f25c225ae384938cd8114aaf76d5.headline: Protests Held Nationwide Against ICE Immigration Enforcement

b0b73425619f6d739350d09ed2c4cf155573a4ef.summary: Nationwide protests took place on January 30, 2026, following the fatal shootings of Renee Good and Alex Pretti by federal agents in Minneapolis. Demonstrators gathered in multiple cities to express opposition to the actions of Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE).
b0b73425619f6d739350d09ed2c4cf155573a4ef.headline: Nationwide Protests Erupt Over Fatal ICE Involved Shootings

bf25afe37a252c559116cee09625d8b29493b32d.summary: Blue Origin announced it will pause its space tourism flights for at least two years to concentrate resources on developing its lunar landing capabilities.
bf25afe37a252c559116cee09625d8b29493b32d.headline: Blue Origin Pauses Space Tourism Flights to Focus on Lunar Projects

17c2931d1e4aced6bb1eacffb0ca4057ce99f804.summary: Israel will reopen the Rafah border crossing between Gaza and Egypt on Sunday, allowing people to travel through the crossing for the first time since its closure in May 2024, according to a government agency.
17c2931d1e4aced6bb1eacffb0ca4057ce99f804.headline: Israel to Reopen Rafah Border Crossing With Egypt on Sunday

e2d329d7c1e7f0c7d2f3614d2703cbfcb2788e01.summary: Gold and silver prices fell sharply after Trump announced Warsh as the next Fed chair. Silver dropped 30% in its worst day since 1980, and gold also declined, reversing recent gains as investor concerns about Fed independence eased.
e2d329d7c1e7f0c7d2f3614d2703cbfcb2788e01.headline: Gold and Silver Prices Plunge After Trump Names Warsh as Fed Chair

b35946a1328b2d47484a566890fdc3f5703881cc.summary: Newly released files reveal that Bill Gates requested antibiotics to secretly give to his then-wife, Melinda, according to a recently disclosed email. The files also mention Elon Musk, the former Prince Andrew, and other prominent individuals.
b35946a1328b2d47484a566890fdc3f5703881cc.headline: Files Reveal Bill Gates Sought Antibiotics for Ex Wife Without Her

3220fd6f86af6c089e9e45aef2d29b5d4f20851e.summary: Islamic State in the Sahel has claimed responsibility for an attack on the international airport and air force base in Niamey, Niger's capital. Militants used heavy weapons and drones, damaging planes from Ivorian and Togolese airlines. The assault resulted in fatalities.
3220fd6f86af6c089e9e45aef2d29b5d4f20851e.headline: Islamic State Claims Deadly Attack on Niamey Airport and Air Base

005370401aba256d358d1d9d8190b665b66b99bd.summary: Over 200 people were killed this week in a collapse at the Rubaya coltan mine in eastern Democratic Republic of Congo, according to Lumumba Kambere Muyisa, a spokesperson for the rebel-appointed government. The mine supplies about 15% of the world's coltan, a mineral used in mobile phones. Rights groups have raised concerns about working conditions at the site.
005370401aba256d358d1d9d8190b665b66b99bd.headline: Over 200 Killed in Rubaya Coltan Mine Collapse in Eastern Congo

f30dd6596d9daa0545cfe96a9ac42c3372d2c148.summary: Russia is experiencing increasing financial pressure to fund its war in Ukraine, with a widening budget gap. As a result, President Vladimir Putin faces a limited timeframe to secure a peace agreement, as peace talks have resumed.
f30dd6596d9daa0545cfe96a9ac42c3372d2c148.headline: Russia Faces Budget Strains as Ukraine Peace Talks Resume

7a5baa861d492bcff56a725d5fa3aa893fafdd5e.summary: The United States and Argentina are in advanced negotiations on an agreement that would allow the U.S. to deport immigrants from other countries to Argentina, according to reports from the New York Times and Reuters.
7a5baa861d492bcff56a725d5fa3aa893fafdd5e.headline: U.S. and Argentina in Advanced Talks on Deportation Agreement

93161feb23a605e3b7c07380d57f24f983f5dbf0.summary: The Syrian government and Kurdish-led forces have agreed to extend a ceasefire into a permanent truce, establishing a framework for integrating Kurdish forces into the state. This agreement follows a period of uncertainty after rebel forces led by Ahmed al-Sharaa, now president, seized power in December 2024.
93161feb23a605e3b7c07380d57f24f983f5dbf0.headline: Syrian Government and Kurdish Forces Agree to Permanent Truce

671d578f0388a3a76b9d32c9a8b913ea74842f3d.summary: The US Department of Justice has opened a federal civil rights investigation into the shooting death of Alex Pretti in Minneapolis, according to officials.
671d578f0388a3a76b9d32c9a8b913ea74842f3d.headline: Justice Department Opens Civil Rights Probe Into Alex Pretti Shooting

83c2dff463127658614b6ee39d166efb93c42a01.summary: Philadelphia 76ers forward Paul George has been suspended without pay for 25 games after violating the NBA's anti-drug program. The league did not specify the substance involved. George stated he took an improper medication and accepted responsibility. The suspension begins Saturday.
83c2dff463127658614b6ee39d166efb93c42a01.headline: 76ers Paul George Suspended 25 Games for Anti Drug Policy Violation

aa2b3e32fa6cac68860ee9dbd9fcdbce110a8c5c.summary: The Buffalo Bills have reached an agreement to hire Jim Leonhard as their defensive coordinator under new head coach Joe Brady. Leonhard, previously the Denver Broncos' assistant head coach and defensive pass game coordinator, has not yet signed a contract, according to sources cited by multiple outlets.
aa2b3e32fa6cac68860ee9dbd9fcdbce110a8c5c.headline: Bills Reach Agreement to Hire Jim Leonhard as Defensive Coordinator

b94063cca725364b1715f9a3da08c9526a9ac2d2.summary: Israeli strikes on Gaza killed at least 30 Palestinians, including women and children, according to Gaza's Health Ministry. The Israeli military confirmed the strikes, stating they targeted Hamas militants and weapons sites. The attacks occurred amid a ceasefire that both Israel and Hamas accuse each other of violating.
b94063cca725364b1715f9a3da08c9526a9ac2d2.headline: Israeli Strikes Kill at Least 30 in Gaza Amid Ceasefire Accusations

6254aaf7a16caddfbf3a8d297f8bbc060bd744e6.summary: Venezuela's acting President Delcy Rodríguez has announced an amnesty bill that could result in the release of hundreds of people detained for political reasons. The proposed legislation aims to address the issue of political prisoners in the country.
6254aaf7a16caddfbf3a8d297f8bbc060bd744e6.headline: Venezuela Announces Amnesty Bill for Political Prisoners

ff727ceabd6db7602a8be619d898f54780caf858.summary: Elena Rybakina won her first Australian Open title, defeating world number one Aryna Sabalenka 6-4, 4-6, 6-4 in the final. This marks Rybakina's second Grand Slam title, following her Wimbledon victory in 2022. Sabalenka, the reigning champion, has now lost consecutive Australian Open finals.
ff727ceabd6db7602a8be619d898f54780caf858.headline: Elena Rybakina Defeats Aryna Sabalenka to Win Australian Open Title

438b241208fe825927ac55ac6521cfe8474b56ef.summary: A partial US government shutdown has begun as the House prepares to vote on a Trump-backed funding deal already passed by the Senate. The House is expected to consider the measure on Monday.
438b241208fe825927ac55ac6521cfe8474b56ef.headline: Partial US Government Shutdown Begins as House Awaits Funding Vote

df28d2114f6d3b98b5a5984e0214f2898f8f0489.summary: The Justice Department released three million pages from its files on Jeffrey Epstein, including references to Trump and emails involving a person called "The Duke." Lawmakers and advocacy groups allege that about half of the records remain withheld despite legal requirements for full disclosure.
df28d2114f6d3b98b5a5984e0214f2898f8f0489.headline: Justice Department Releases 3 Million Epstein Files

3aa3d639c765e727906ef4dfe674c0e4622987c8.summary: Teofimo Lopez and Shakur Stevenson are scheduled to fight for the Ring Magazine and WBO super lightweight titles at Madison Square Garden on Saturday, with ring walks expected at 10:50 p.m. ET.
3aa3d639c765e727906ef4dfe674c0e4622987c8.headline: Teofimo Lopez and Shakur Stevenson Set for Title Fight at MSG Saturday

6966316f38876b3856d3ff51d67ab2301cb6f158.summary: Canadian actress Catherine O'Hara, known for roles in Home Alone and Schitt's Creek, died in Los Angeles at age 71 after a brief illness. Tributes have been paid by actors, politicians, and Canadian prime minister Mark Carney.
6966316f38876b3856d3ff51d67ab2301cb6f158.headline: Catherine OHara Dies at 71

048ef1fb45607e4d3ee3b8a9d1d545163d7fbcf8.summary: A U.S. judge has declined to block the Biden administration's increase of immigration agents in Minnesota. Attorney General Pam Bondi praised the decision as a significant legal victory for the Justice Department.
048ef1fb45607e4d3ee3b8a9d1d545163d7fbcf8.headline: Judge Allows Minnesota Immigration Agent Increase to Proceed

b38f2f10a6eabfaeeba171306e3863b6b3ad342d.summary: Chelsea defeated West Ham 3-2 at Stamford Bridge after coming back from a 2-0 halftime deficit in the Premier League. Goals from Joao Pedro, Marc Cucurella, and Enzo Fernandez secured the win. This marks Chelsea's first comeback from two goals down at home in the Premier League and their sixth win in seven matches under coach Liam Rosenior.
b38f2f10a6eabfaeeba171306e3863b6b3ad342d.headline: Chelsea Overcomes 2 Goal Deficit to Beat West Ham 3 2 at

c6374060020083af7b12bc33584f620a0444db3d.summary: The New England Patriots and Seattle Seahawks will face each other in Super Bowl 60 on Sunday, February 8, marking a rematch of their game 11 years ago. Final injury reports for both teams have been released, and details about the event, including uniforms and betting predictions, are available.
c6374060020083af7b12bc33584f620a0444db3d.headline: Patriots and Seahawks Set for Super Bowl 60 Rematch on February 8

3b620fcbdba14b0dcef12fe2c56882b81cf5d05f.summary: Federal judge Kate M. Menendez denied Minnesota officials' request to temporarily halt Operation Metro Surge, a federal immigration operation in Minneapolis. The operation has led to the deaths of two people and weeks of protests, but the judge's ruling allows it to continue.
3b620fcbdba14b0dcef12fe2c56882b81cf5d05f.headline: Judge Denies Minnesota Request to Halt Operation Metro Surge

87622049a66de5f5a26ca45c02ebcf5ed63b74e2.summary: Austin Hays has agreed to a one-year deal with the Chicago White Sox, according to multiple reports. The veteran outfielder joins the team as a free agent to add depth to their roster.
87622049a66de5f5a26ca45c02ebcf5ed63b74e2.headline: Austin Hays Agrees to One Year Deal With White Sox

0fe0ac79f04759a2052e06f9b7aee1792967e597.summary: More than 200 people were killed in a collapse at the Rubaya coltan mine in eastern Democratic Republic of Congo this week, according to a spokesperson for the rebel-appointed government. The collapse occurred after heavy rains on Wednesday.
0fe0ac79f04759a2052e06f9b7aee1792967e597.headline: Over 200 Dead in Eastern Congo Coltan Mine Collapse After Heavy Rains

10f8c50a8fb0d8fdc70321905ee0bea0da532b09.summary: Carlos Alcaraz advanced to the Australian Open final after a challenging match. He will face Novak Djokovic, who is aiming for his 25th Grand Slam title. The final sets up a highly anticipated contest between Alcaraz and Djokovic.
10f8c50a8fb0d8fdc70321905ee0bea0da532b09.headline: Alcaraz to Face Djokovic in Australian Open Final Showdown

e0d5a7c685bf4195f41a5463a2284e7e033ceb61.summary: Lord Triesman, a former Labour minister and chair of the Football Association, has died at the age of 82. The Labour party stated he passed away peacefully at home on Friday night. Tony Blair paid tribute, calling him a vital part of the New Labour movement.
e0d5a7c685bf4195f41a5463a2284e7e033ceb61.headline: Lord Triesman Former Labour Minister Dies at 82

fa5ace514630ec30d249fbb022aa7cb1029e4892.summary: Journalist Don Lemon and another reporter were arrested and charged with federal civil rights crimes after covering an anti-ICE protest at a Minnesota church. Both journalists have been taken to court in connection with their reporting on the protest.
fa5ace514630ec30d249fbb022aa7cb1029e4892.headline: Don Lemon Charged With Civil Rights Crimes After Protest Coverage

984b87cddddec94a8894370a34de27dae15bf250.summary: NASCAR has postponed its preseason exhibition race at Bowman Gray Stadium to Monday night due to ice and snow in the Winston-Salem area. The event, originally scheduled as a two-day competition starting Saturday with the main event on Sunday, was delayed for safety reasons.
984b87cddddec94a8894370a34de27dae15bf250.headline: NASCAR Postpones Preseason Race at Bowman Gray Due to Winter Storm

ca1a546a50da2eb0a59fb40aa7aacea8c4b6d8ba.summary: A drone strike in Ethiopia's Tigray region killed one person and injured another, according to Reuters. The incident follows recent clashes between government troops and Tigrayan forces, raising concerns about renewed conflict in the area.
ca1a546a50da2eb0a59fb40aa7aacea8c4b6d8ba.headline: Drone Strike in Tigray Kills One

a628e72d032ec3202bfc8083de8c59a3133e64ea.summary: Recently released Justice Department documents include images appearing to show Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor and emails indicating he invited Jeffrey Epstein to Buckingham Palace after Epstein's release from house arrest.
a628e72d032ec3202bfc8083de8c59a3133e64ea.headline: Documents Show Andrew Mountbatten Windsor Invited Epstein to Palace

f2efea80839b1c480b2db977c272b2e4ac288a22.summary: Thousands of Danish veterans and supporters protested outside the US embassy in Copenhagen, responding to Donald Trump's recent comments that allied NATO troops stayed back from the front lines during the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan.
f2efea80839b1c480b2db977c272b2e4ac288a22.headline: Danish Veterans Protest in Copenhagen After Trumps NATO Remarks

ab59ea7e6d924ea3479f1dd737017d1846603553.summary: Gold and silver prices dropped sharply on Friday after Trump announced his pick for the Federal Reserve, reversing recent gains driven by increased demand for safe-haven assets.
ab59ea7e6d924ea3479f1dd737017d1846603553.headline: Gold and Silver Prices Fall After Trumps Fed Pick Announcement

d55e31b46e9d3af0e4a175336de24cdbd2295f88.summary: SpaceX has applied to the FCC for approval to launch up to 1 million satellites to support solar-powered data centers in orbit, aiming to provide computing for artificial intelligence applications.
d55e31b46e9d3af0e4a175336de24cdbd2295f88.headline: SpaceX Seeks FCC Approval for 1 Million Satellites for AI Data Centers

409bc2d88364c587e9b4803eadaad1c559c8c359.summary: Iran's president stated that Donald Trump, Benjamin Netanyahu, and European countries contributed to unrest in Iran by provoking tensions and exploiting the country's challenges during recent protests.
409bc2d88364c587e9b4803eadaad1c559c8c359.headline: Iran President Blames Foreign Leaders for Stirring Unrest in Protests

f438e535b3c29a7e5bad910a746f0ef95da09e7c.summary: A gas leak caused an explosion in a residential building in Bandar Abbas, Iran, according to Iranian media reports. The blast resulted in four deaths.
f438e535b3c29a7e5bad910a746f0ef95da09e7c.headline: Gas Leak Causes Fatal Explosion in Bandar Abbas

1ee3c88dbcaeb98e6687990b24d83c87ea48eca6.summary: Bitcoin dropped below $80,000 on January 31, 2026, extending its recent decline as the broader cryptocurrency market continued to fall.
1ee3c88dbcaeb98e6687990b24d83c87ea48eca6.headline: Bitcoin Falls Below $80

2e3b488b5f0883ff21de806bb0c410f229fbd65f.summary: At WWE Royal Rumble 2026 in Riyadh, Gunther defeated AJ Styles in a Career Match. The event marked the start of the WrestleMania 42 season and featured four matches.
2e3b488b5f0883ff21de806bb0c410f229fbd65f.headline: Gunther Defeats AJ Styles in Career Match at WWE Royal Rumble 2026

5e41da0f9b37a48c41a48f77c025ad0b3e64a70d.summary: Justin Rose leads the Farmers Insurance Open by four shots after setting a 36-hole scoring record at Torrey Pines. Brooks Koepka, returning to the PGA Tour, narrowly made the cut.
5e41da0f9b37a48c41a48f77c025ad0b3e64a70d.headline: Justin Rose Leads Farmers Insurance Open

72863f1c3c4e35aa49d3551407addddb5419bc01.summary: A weaker U.S. dollar, described by Donald Trump as a 'yo-yo,' is creating new challenges for stock investors, prompting some to look for investment opportunities overseas.
72863f1c3c4e35aa49d3551407addddb5419bc01.headline: Weaker Dollar Drives U.S. Stock Investors to Seek Overseas Options

1395724298cecb9d9898654f780ca38be57d1f8b.summary: Catherine O'Hara, Emmy-winning actor known for her roles in 'Schitt's Creek' and 'Home Alone,' has died at the age of 71.
1395724298cecb9d9898654f780ca38be57d1f8b.headline: Catherine OHara Emmy Winning Actor Dies at 71

2d5a726101e2401145321653c15e65da2261de95.summary: A federal judge has ordered the release of five-year-old Liam Conejo Ramos and his father from ICE detention in Texas, following their arrest during an immigration raid in Minnesota. The judge criticized the deportation quotas that led to their detention and previously blocked their removal from the U.S. The case drew national attention after images of Liam in detention were widely circulated.
2d5a726101e2401145321653c15e65da2261de95.headline: Judge Orders Release of 5 Year Old and Father From ICE Detention

4f20ee420f373393c5e76221c5d8c67f25259475.summary: Alexander Volkanovski defeated Diego Lopes by unanimous decision at UFC 325 in Sydney, Australia, successfully defending his featherweight title. Volkanovski won on all three judges’ scorecards, continuing his championship reign in front of his hometown fans.
4f20ee420f373393c5e76221c5d8c67f25259475.headline: Volkanovski Defeats Lopes to Retain Featherweight Title at UFC 325

77433b2b6f70115139ec9975d40ea4ebb44ef59d.summary: Iran is set to begin a live-fire naval exercise in the Strait of Hormuz, while Donald Trump states that Iran is engaged in serious talks with the US about possible negotiations. Trump expresses hope for a deal and indicates discussions are ongoing as a US naval group approaches the region.
77433b2b6f70115139ec9975d40ea4ebb44ef59d.headline: Iran Plans Naval Exercise Amid Ongoing Talks With US

7ea157461bb441c65359af03d0b01634f3c48162.summary: The Cleveland Cavaliers, Sacramento Kings, and Chicago Bulls completed a three-team trade. The Cavaliers received Keon Ellis and Dennis Schroder from the Kings, sending De'Andre Hunter to Sacramento. The Bulls acquired Dario Saric and two second-round picks from the Kings. The deal was finalized ahead of the Feb. 5 trade deadline.
7ea157461bb441c65359af03d0b01634f3c48162.headline: Cavaliers Acquire Ellis and Schroder in Three Team Trade

0882b009b99e3d0cec8e666f7a63aa7299f5fef6.summary: Iran has declared European Union armies as 'terrorist groups' in response to the EU's decision to designate Iran's Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps as a terrorist organization.
0882b009b99e3d0cec8e666f7a63aa7299f5fef6.headline: Iran Labels EU Armies as Terrorist Groups in Response to IRGC

d38a40139dec3d3f89f9fc5385ddbabc15434519.summary: Donald Trump stated that he welcomes investment by China and India in Venezuela's oil sector and said India will buy oil from Venezuela. Exxon and Chevron remain cautious about expanding operations in Venezuela as Trump urges increased oil production.
d38a40139dec3d3f89f9fc5385ddbabc15434519.headline: Trump Welcomes China and India Investment in Venezuela Oil Sector

411626124a6c0b2087e2f90e76210dd6423ede99.summary: Israeli strikes in Gaza killed at least 30 Palestinians, including women and children, according to local hospitals and the Gaza Health Ministry. The Israeli military confirmed the strikes, stating they targeted Hamas militants and weapons sites. The violence occurred as both Israel and Hamas accused each other of violating the ongoing ceasefire.
411626124a6c0b2087e2f90e76210dd6423ede99.headline: Israeli Strikes Kill 30 in Gaza Amid Accusations of Ceasefire

1761d76314a7aedbf51d0d08c4ea986f078e80ad.summary: Democrat Christian Menefee has won a Texas U.S. House seat in a special election, reducing the Republican majority in the House.
1761d76314a7aedbf51d0d08c4ea986f078e80ad.headline: Christian Menefee Wins Texas U.S. House Seat

44254ceed7933f6ecb767fdbba2cec95c3686871.summary: The San Francisco Giants have agreed to a one-year, $12 million contract with infielder Luis Arráez, a three-time MLB All-Star and batting champion, ahead of the 2026 season.
44254ceed7933f6ecb767fdbba2cec95c3686871.headline: Giants Sign Luis Arráez to One Year

2af369df281a1b5409f464ef1886df5ba3b8c1d5.summary: Jarrell Miller defeated Kingsley Ibeh by split decision in their heavyweight boxing match, despite experiencing a wardrobe malfunction when a punch from Ibeh knocked off Miller's hairpiece during the second round.
2af369df281a1b5409f464ef1886df5ba3b8c1d5.headline: Jarrell Miller Wins Split Decision Over Kingsley Ibeh Despite Mishap

1236820dccc19c96c409a458d468f26566e34b49.summary: Los Angeles Dodgers manager Dave Roberts announced that Shohei Ohtani will not pitch for Japan in the upcoming World Baseball Classic, stating it was Ohtani's decision. Ohtani had earlier expressed uncertainty about participating as a pitcher in the tournament.
1236820dccc19c96c409a458d468f26566e34b49.headline: Shohei Ohtani Will Not Pitch for Japan in World Baseball Classic

a36c1789e3a100ea668088c8aee24a5f10a4cc3f.summary: Philadelphia 76ers forward Paul George has been suspended without pay for 25 games for violating the NBA's anti-drug program. The suspension began on Saturday. The NBA did not disclose details about the violation. Despite George's absence, the 76ers defeated the New Orleans Pelicans 124-114, with Joel Embiid scoring 40 points.
a36c1789e3a100ea668088c8aee24a5f10a4cc3f.headline: Paul George Suspended 25 Games for NBA Anti Drug Violation

cb8b20761c53fb9ff8b8acd248322b33ae9bbc62.summary: Shakur Stevenson defeated Teofimo Lopez Jr. by decision to win the WBO super lightweight (junior welterweight) world title after 12 rounds at Madison Square Garden.
cb8b20761c53fb9ff8b8acd248322b33ae9bbc62.headline: Shakur Stevenson Wins WBO Super Lightweight Title Over Teofimo Lopez

5ac8bf81485dd7d6fa563cf879f9b0229bcd4ba2.summary: A measure to address the partial government shutdown must be approved by the House Rules Committee before it can proceed to a full House vote.
5ac8bf81485dd7d6fa563cf879f9b0229bcd4ba2.headline: Shutdown Measure Awaits House Rules Committee Approval

d61ca3f46b8ebb062832a0b92044b1871416d93a.summary: Ford and China's Xiaomi have discussed a possible joint venture to manufacture electric vehicles in the US, according to the Financial Times. The talks could allow Xiaomi to enter the US market, but no agreement has been finalized.
d61ca3f46b8ebb062832a0b92044b1871416d93a.headline: Ford and Xiaomi Discuss Potential US EV Joint Venture

854b57bd0176d2c7e529d641815f7326fc538ddc.summary: Quinn Hughes scored and assisted to set a franchise record for defensemen with an eight-game point streak as the Minnesota Wild defeated the Edmonton Oilers 7-3. Joel Eriksson Ek, Mats Zuccarello, and Brock Faber also recorded a goal and an assist each for Minnesota.
854b57bd0176d2c7e529d641815f7326fc538ddc.headline: Quinn Hughes Sets Wild Record as Minnesota Defeats Edmonton 7 3

686941d924819458f7321f809bde0301482a0112.summary: A U.S. District Judge has declined to block the Trump administration's increased immigration enforcement efforts in Minnesota while a lawsuit against the surge continues. The judge acknowledged the crackdown's significant impact but allowed it to proceed for now.
686941d924819458f7321f809bde0301482a0112.headline: Judge Allows Minnesota Immigration Enforcement Surge to Continue

c2faaa0a569117337b364fb58fdcf71986d2ac4a.summary: Laura Dogu, the top US envoy for Venezuela, has arrived in Caracas as Venezuela begins to privatize its oil sector amid pressure from Trump.
c2faaa0a569117337b364fb58fdcf71986d2ac4a.headline: US Envoy Laura Dogu Arrives in Caracas as Venezuela Privatizes Oil

6e5811f192de46ee4633a9312ebdafac26d3ba13.summary: Taylor Rehmet, a Democrat, won a special election for the Texas state Senate in Tarrant County, flipping a district previously held by Republicans and won by Donald Trump in 2024 by 17 points.
6e5811f192de46ee4633a9312ebdafac26d3ba13.headline: Democrat Taylor Rehmet Wins Texas Senate Seat in Tarrant County

1300ab331d2ee0c97356cea4b579e0febc569643.summary: Chicago mayor Brandon Johnson has directed police to investigate and document any alleged illegal activity by federal immigration agents in the city, providing officers with a clear procedure to follow if they witness or receive reports of such incidents.
1300ab331d2ee0c97356cea4b579e0febc569643.headline: Chicago Mayor Orders Police to Investigate Alleged ICE Misconduct

cd2b80b9c9fcba2cf2595a1f142d3bed5dbde1ac.summary: Linus Ullmark made 26 saves in his first game back as the Ottawa Senators defeated the New Jersey Devils 4-1. Brady Tkachuk contributed a goal and two assists, while Dylan Cozens scored his 100th NHL goal. The Senators have won three straight games. The Devils, missing Jack Hughes due to injury, have lost three of their last four.

193c35fdaba5dfc6e08d2e873f87ecd39147ee0f.summary: The US and Iran have agreed to hold nuclear talks in Muscat on Friday, following days of uncertainty over the location and format. The White House confirmed the meeting after Arab states intervened to keep negotiations on track, salvaging the talks that were initially set for Turkey.

62585cc64ddbee05742ff02d9d1571b3d443a857.summary: Jon Ruben, 76, has been sentenced to 23 years and 10 months in jail after admitting to sexually abusing young boys and drugging his wife. Ruben, who led Christian youth camps in Leicestershire, laced sweets with tranquilizers to facilitate the abuse.
62585cc64ddbee05742ff02d9d1571b3d443a857.headline: Jon Ruben Jailed for Over 23 Years for Child Sexual Abuse and

Al-Bakoush faces charges related to the deaths of the four US citizens.

Earlier reports indicated a close race with progressive candidate Analilia Mejia maintaining a narrow lead, but the final outcome shows Malinowski as the winner.

21df70ba8a0ad7be0dafe9fa3a32ece9a194624d.summary: The Trump administration has approved a new rule that makes it easier to fire thousands of federal employees, expanding the president's authority to dismiss staff for any reason.

bc9debad41fff40f709e5a41b5bd1dd232c7dc5f.summary: Storm Leonardo has caused severe flooding and strong winds in Spain and Portugal, leading to at least two deaths and the evacuation of over 7,000 people. Authorities have declared a state of calamity in 69 areas of Portugal, and the Chega party has called for a delay in voting due to ongoing hazardous weather.

89c712cbde779c5ecde01a5cd134ee45698381a7.summary: A Manhattan judge has scheduled Luigi Mangione's trial to begin three months before his federal trial. Mangione left court protesting the decision, shouting 'double jeopardy.'
89c712cbde779c5ecde01a5cd134ee45698381a7.headline: Manhattan Judge Sets Mangiones Trial Before Federal Case

76d0b86f1252b78cfdb8940997c3a7b9e273a38f.summary: The United States has accused China of conducting secret nuclear tests in violation of international agreements, alleging that these activities are aimed at developing larger nuclear warheads. China has not publicly responded to the accusation.

The charge is the largest among recent EV-related writedowns by automakers and is expected to result in fewer vehicle options for consumers.
436714d5891060e6a4a65458c2ac3c23caafc95e.headline: Stellantis Shares Drop After $27 Billion EV Writedown

4a42b1fc1fb08165fcaba9866601380296504ddc.summary: Donald Trump offered to unfreeze funding for New York City infrastructure projects if Dulles airport and its train station were renamed for him, according to a source. Trump made this demand to Chuck Schumer during discussions about funding for the NY-NJ tunnel and subway extension.
4a42b1fc1fb08165fcaba9866601380296504ddc.headline: Trump Tied NYC Project Funding to Renaming Dulles Airport

5f458ab6f743e8cc0dd16e3a5e61fecfad23dc94.headline: FBI Offers $50000 Reward in Ongoing Search for Nancy Guthrie

Lee, 31, was taken into custody on Thursday and is due in court on February 11, according to the Hamilton County Sheriff's Office.

4a4fd2ea90276a215805114b23aadfb8cc05ade6.summary: President Trump deleted a video depicting Barack and Michelle Obama as apes after bipartisan backlash. Lawmakers from both parties condemned the post as racist. Trump said he would not apologize, stating he only saw part of the video before sharing it. The White House initially defended the post but removed it following criticism.

baf777488480d61a03b2404dcd3c6d0b1bc2f391.summary: Donald Trump stated that the US and Iran held 'very good' talks in Oman, marking their first direct negotiations since last year's conflict involving Israel. Iranian foreign minister Abbas Araghchi described the talks as a 'good start.' Negotiations are set to resume next week.
baf777488480d61a03b2404dcd3c6d0b1bc2f391.headline: US and Iran Hold Direct Talks in Oman

42a11bd8ad924ed6be05e42431a584adfa08b38e.summary: Yasiel Puig, a former major league outfielder, was found guilty by a jury of obstruction of justice and lying to federal officials during an investigation into an illegal sports gambling ring, according to the U.S. Attorney's Office.

Goldschmidt, a seven-time All-Star and 2022 NL MVP, hit .274 with 10 home runs and 45 RBIs last season.

69918dfa78c52013a45582d905966234ae78809a.summary: The 2026 Milano Cortina Winter Olympics began on Friday with an opening ceremony in Milan featuring performances by Andrea Bocelli and Mariah Carey. Athletes from around the world, including flag bearers Erin Jackson and Frank Del Duca for Team USA and Mikaël Kingsbury and Marielle Thompson for Canada, participated. The event showcased Italian culture and faced political tensions, including protests against U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement.

04c3b8ed5716afb44750e9772689f6946bc6512a.summary: The Seattle Seahawks and New England Patriots are set to play in Super Bowl 60 on Sunday, February 8, 2026. Both teams will be near full strength, as key players Nick Emmanwori and Drake Maye were removed from the final injury report. Experts and models have shared predictions, betting picks, and analysis ahead of the game, but the outcome will be determined on game day.

49f6c1c92eeda81827622a0fc42c10174a044bb0.headline: Large Bets and Top Picks Highlight Super Bowl LX Betting Activity

489136f86afcb53825df13d5e646c00da0ff861e.headline: Congress to Receive Unredacted Jeffrey Epstein Files

The attack is the second major bombing in Islamabad in recent months, raising concerns about increasing extremist violence in the area.
654e055a631c94019ba549babebc8c36628c75bc.headline: Suicide Bombing at Islamabad Mosque Kills 31

The decision follows a recent meeting between China and Canada’s top leaders that has improved relations between the two countries.
0652ba973f74c1674c5e67cfc28115ac2da059e5.headline: China Overturns Death Sentence for Canadian Robert Lloyd Schellenberg

a00c66a1c8eda8b541c70deff698462c22bb7b24.summary: US attorney general Pam Bondi announced the arrest of Zubayar al-Bakoush, who is suspected of involvement in the 2012 Benghazi attack that killed four Americans, including the US ambassador. 8b6721762a25cd1acf0b2a637a657d160091074d.summary: Thousands in Islamabad gathered to mourn 31 people killed in a suicide bombing at a Shi'ite mosque. Pakistan accused 'Indian-backed proxies' of responsibility, but India rejected the allegation as 'baseless and pointless.'

3156e00e31f5c62fc6fc8ea8c8fbce60f0fe933e.headline: Investors Shift Focus to Indias Weak Earnings After Trade Deals

The deal aims to strengthen economic ties and expand political cooperation between the two countries.
60afc2a331ee00d59087bdb6dcdfcc3b14e38179.headline: Argentina and US Sign Trade Deal to Lower Tariffs and Expand Quotas

Investors expect this increased spending to reduce available cash as the industry accelerates investment in artificial intelligence.

56f7290f6149f5fe9fdcba5e4b4fd8c561204d62.summary: The Dow Jones Industrial Average surpassed the 50,000 mark for the first time on February 6, 2026, marking a new record high for the index.

3160e8722da85ef141feb9c75cdebb873043f475.summary: NASA’s Solar Dynamics Observatory captured a strong solar flare on February 4, 2026. Solar flares are bursts of energy from the Sun that can affect radio communications, power grids, and navigation signals on Earth.

c55cf0e70a566d5e092150cad5b6884ea558eb96.summary: India and the United States have reached a new agreement following improved relations between Donald Trump and Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi. An Indian minister indicated that the deal could lead to India purchasing more American goods, with further details to be announced soon.
c55cf0e70a566d5e092150cad5b6884ea558eb96.headline: India and U.S. Reach New Agreement to Boost Trade

Zelenskyy notes that difficult issues remain as Russia continues strikes on Ukrainian energy facilities.

4ce249b7d262a7d86d557053ed9c888441f252ff.headline: Valérie Maltais Wins Bronze in 3

8db32f80b961897a8bd682845ff0591f48d2486e.summary: India began their 2026 T20 World Cup campaign with a 29-run win over the United States, led by Suryakumar Yadav's unbeaten 84. Pakistan narrowly defeated the Netherlands by three wickets in their opening match. Scotland lost to West Indies by 35 runs. England are set to open their campaign against Nepal. Cricket's governing body is seeking to persuade Pakistan to reverse its boycott of India fixtures.
8db32f80b961897a8bd682845ff0591f48d2486e.headline: India Pakistan Win T20 World Cup Openers

Gore was known for his speed and played eight MLB seasons, primarily as a pinch-runner and defensive replacement, winning titles with the Kansas City Royals, Los Angeles Dodgers, and Atlanta Braves.

8bdbbaeb67395899fa4cde12e2ae5b78e833fe98.summary: The Pentagon announced it will end all graduate-level military training, fellowships, and certificate programs at Harvard University. The decision, confirmed by Defence Secretary Pete Hegseth, severs academic ties between the Department of Defense and the school.
8bdbbaeb67395899fa4cde12e2ae5b78e833fe98.headline: Pentagon Ends All Military Training and Programs at Harvard

2595eed56b75fef4f5cefec578cf66b3fd480feb.summary: Franjo von Allmen of Switzerland won the first gold medal of the 2026 Winter Olympics in the men's downhill skiing event. Francesca Lollobrigida secured Italy's first gold medal of the Games by winning the women's 3,000 meters speedskating with an Olympics-record time.

602351ef077b545a158be04b1c696329dcc32345.summary: Sports leaders worldwide have agreed on a new, unified gender policy, marking the first time a uniform set of criteria will be applied across international sporting organizations.
602351ef077b545a158be04b1c696329dcc32345.headline: Global Sports Leaders Agree on First Unified Gender Policy

President Trump said the talks had a 'very good' start and that negotiations would resume next week. Both sides agreed to continue diplomatic efforts.

e43e6303e6f5b24ca303d605362943267e3f273e.headline: Boulter Wins Ostrava Open

78ae73bc93b01857eed2b380455978845e8bfc11.summary: Tom Brady, now a broadcaster and part-owner of the Raiders, has announced he is supporting the New England Patriots in Sunday's Super Bowl after earlier saying he had no preference. His initial comments drew criticism from fans and former teammates.

The incident occurred on the first full day of the Winter Olympic Games. Authorities are investigating the attack.
586eb9b65f8542e16d3f0f793160b89e2e34ba9b.headline: Saboteurs Disrupt Rail Services Near Bologna Amid Winter Olympics

87a83aa6282cc135184bab5b54b9785999d3a126.summary: Scotland lost 18-15 to Italy in Rome in their opening match of the Six Nations, starting their campaign with a defeat in rainy conditions.

His family and press freedom groups have criticized the sentence, and US and UK officials have called for his release on humanitarian grounds due to his age and health.

775a84363027e13c8b6050e1c573aea7ff1a9df7.summary: David Njoku has announced he will not return to the Cleveland Browns in 2026 after nine seasons with the team. Njoku is coming off one of his least productive seasons and plans to continue his career elsewhere.

ad3c843a6ad1f819fc8bc7af06fabad3fe56d359.summary: A White House official stated that Trump opposes Israeli annexation of the West Bank, viewing stability in the Palestinian territory as supporting efforts to achieve peace in the region.

eacd4331e854bb56fdd3482c767e109c0ba1e076.summary: Minnesota Timberwolves center Naz Reid and Atlanta Hawks forward Mouhamed Gueye were ejected early in the fourth quarter after an altercation during the Timberwolves' 138-116 win over the Hawks. The incident began when Gueye appeared to trip Reid, leading to a scuffle that caused both benches to clear.

f621fb4540a4b1cf0454e011b4ac36b6c7dc8ec4.summary: Ali Larijani, secretary of Iran's Supreme National Security Council, is traveling to Oman, a location known for previous discussions with the US, as diplomatic efforts continue to prevent conflict.

Authorities have continued their investigation at her mother's Tucson home, examining rooftop cameras and searching the septic tank.

6c969f919763480c9606d425d7b9d2866e66aeea.summary: Savannah Guthrie has appealed for help as the search for her missing mother, Nancy Guthrie, continues into a second week. A ransom deadline set by the abductors is approaching, and authorities are investigating the apparent abduction. Guthrie urged anyone with information to contact law enforcement.
6c969f919763480c9606d425d7b9d2866e66aeea.headline: Savannah Guthrie Appeals for Help as Ransom Deadline Nears in Mothers

8f345f32df47450e611c9e1f64e2199a0046b96b.summary: Israel's security cabinet has approved measures to facilitate more Jewish settlements in the occupied Palestinian territory, easing land purchases. The move has drawn criticism for allegedly violating international law and the Oslo Accords. A White House official reiterated Donald Trump's opposition to Israel annexing the West Bank.
8f345f32df47450e611c9e1f64e2199a0046b96b.headline: Israel Approves Measures Easing New Settlements in Palestinian

e0e341c94763cae4c30b4de4098a96aa91981b14.summary: Workday has named co-founder Aneel Bhusri as CEO, replacing Eschenbach, as the company focuses on AI initiatives following a significant drop in its share price.
e0e341c94763cae4c30b4de4098a96aa91981b14.headline: Workday Appoints Aneel Bhusri as CEO After Share Price Decline

24f1928930b0df4ececbeb0613b7951bfc1d8000.summary: At least 53 people, including two babies, are dead or missing after an inflatable migrant boat sank off the coast of Libya, according to the UN migration agency. The incident is part of a larger toll, with at least 484 migrants reported dead or missing in the central Mediterranean so far this year.

383da9357d1e2eefd7c19bcb0200bee350a24e6e.summary: The British prime minister is experiencing significant political challenges, intensified by criticism from the Scottish leader. The government is under pressure to address internal issues and adjust its agenda.

4e96e5654ebf5c1ff7105c168d176172a96ebdbc.summary: Sanae Takaichi, Japan’s first female prime minister, secured a record election victory and pledged to pursue the Liberal Democratic Party’s goal of amending the constitution.
4e96e5654ebf5c1ff7105c168d176172a96ebdbc.headline: Sanae Takaichi Wins Record Election

bae20303fe6a10bff308aa99c38261a17533d74e.summary: The Boston Red Sox acquired third baseman Caleb Durbin from the Milwaukee Brewers in a six-player trade on Monday, sending left-hander Kyle Harrison to Milwaukee.
bae20303fe6a10bff308aa99c38261a17533d74e.headline: Red Sox Acquire Caleb Durbin in Six Player Trade With Brewers

5d5f1ce291081f1bd59ffa740502c02e96c9beac.summary: YouTube star MrBeast, also known as James Stephen Donaldson, has acquired the youth-focused financial services app Step.
5d5f1ce291081f1bd59ffa740502c02e96c9beac.headline: MrBeast Acquires Youth Financial App Step

9f514325d6a2b8a48d0cc2790d2ec90ae856672d.summary: The FDA has told Novo to address violations in its obesity pill TV ad, citing misleading claims. The agency said Novo must take immediate action, which could include stopping all ads with the disputed content.
9f514325d6a2b8a48d0cc2790d2ec90ae856672d.headline: FDA Orders Novo to Address Misleading Obesity Pill TV Ad Claims

3bf7baa2ded1d3e57d5df740a6724483422ffc86.summary: Oil prices fell as traders assessed supply risks related to ongoing tensions between the United States and Iran.
3bf7baa2ded1d3e57d5df740a6724483422ffc86.headline: Oil Prices Decline as Traders Assess US Iran Tensions

3b42394f4744aab5a3700241d5ada676a31d4ef1.summary: Gold prices declined as investors showed caution ahead of the release of key U.S. economic data.
3b42394f4744aab5a3700241d5ada676a31d4ef1.headline: Gold Prices Drop as Investors Await Key U.S. Economic Data

6112fc2b9c043accafc3c8a56a60e81a58c3db64.summary: Cuba has announced that airlines can no longer refuel on the island due to a worsening energy crisis linked to the US blockade. The move follows threats from Donald Trump to impose tariffs on countries supplying oil to Cuba.

37275f15365908e87dda3f60ebb8d41a611cfa10.summary: Justin Verlander has agreed to a one-year, $13 million contract with the Detroit Tigers, returning to the team where he began his MLB career. Verlander, who turns 43 on February 20, is coming off a season with San Francisco and aims to strengthen the Tigers' pitching rotation.
37275f15365908e87dda3f60ebb8d41a611cfa10.headline: Justin Verlander Signs One Year Deal to Return to Detroit Tigers

ab18984d005873ca20eeddc774b63b8d0b840d53.summary: SportsLine's model and various analysts have released predictions and betting picks for multiple NBA and college basketball games scheduled for February 10, 2026, including Pacers vs. Knicks, Bucks vs. Magic, Rockets vs. Clippers, Spurs vs. Lakers, and others. Predictions for the Winter Olympics women's hockey game between the U.S. and Canada have also been published.
ab18984d005873ca20eeddc774b63b8d0b840d53.headline: Predictions Released for NBA

dd30aec8a87d35117db73fada2800cc3749ddf57.summary: The FBI has released new images and video of an armed, masked individual seen tampering with Nancy Guthrie's doorbell camera the night she disappeared from her Tucson, Arizona home on January 31. Nancy Guthrie, 84 and mother of Savannah Guthrie, remains missing as authorities and her family urge the public to help with the ongoing investigation.
dd30aec8a87d35117db73fada2800cc3749ddf57.headline: FBI Releases Images of Suspect in Disappearance of Nancy Guthrie

fc90a616bdbd515b5df5954517e743cc0b5040a1.summary: Toronto Raptors forward Brandon Ingram has been named as the replacement for injured Golden State Warriors player Stephen Curry in the upcoming NBA All-Star Game. This marks Ingram's second All-Star selection. Ingram is averaging 22 points, 5.8 rebounds, and 3.7 assists per game this season.
fc90a616bdbd515b5df5954517e743cc0b5040a1.headline: Brandon Ingram Replaces Injured Curry in NBA All Star Game

617fbbdea5044c97ea8a7bc97056a8974d6f0f60.summary: Paramount has improved its bid for Warner Bros. Discovery by offering to cover Netflix break-up fees and adding a 'ticking fee' that pays shareholders extra for each quarter the deal remains unclosed. The move aims to attract investors as Warner Bros. Discovery shareholders await a vote on a separate Netflix deal, expected no earlier than March.
617fbbdea5044c97ea8a7bc97056a8974d6f0f60.headline: Paramount Enhances Warner Bros. Bid With Fees to Attract Investors

5b18bddd378b3d0e9fcf4904351c1241b681c82d.summary: U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick admitted to visiting Jeffrey Epstein's island during a family vacation and acknowledged a 2012 meeting with Epstein. Lutnick claims he had little contact with Epstein, but newly released records indicate a more extensive relationship. He faces bipartisan calls to resign following these revelations.
5b18bddd378b3d0e9fcf4904351c1241b681c82d.headline: Commerce Secretary Lutnick Faces Calls to Resign Over Epstein Ties

3a5e8c477165283f5cbabe8ad82f0d7b4f168cd7.summary: LeBron James said the Lakers are not a championship team after their one-point home loss to the Oklahoma City Thunder. Both teams played without their MVP candidates, and James noted the game highlighted the gap between the teams as contenders.
3a5e8c477165283f5cbabe8ad82f0d7b4f168cd7.headline: LeBron James Says Lakers Not a Championship Team After Loss to Thunder

131b45067ee75b2b60171600cd68993a1b77ee89.headline: Seahawks Lead Early 2026 27 NFL Power Rankings After 2025 Season

c0a024cc3523713fdd30799491463e68c7517887.summary: Bad Bunny headlined the Super Bowl LX halftime show, which included a real wedding ceremony during the performance. The event drew attention for its unique elements and sparked discussion about potential future halftime performers.
c0a024cc3523713fdd30799491463e68c7517887.headline: Bad Bunny Headlines Super Bowl LX Halftime Show With On Stage Wedding

b81a864a9cbf75c9a2e38ce5c3c4b57b4545bb35.summary: US Commerce Secretary was questioned in Congress about his interactions with Jeffrey Epstein. He previously stated he ended ties with Epstein in 2005, but now acknowledges having lunch with him on Epstein's island in 2012.

4c430e39240927ff0ba47b72c1bcc86d1d1e5f4c.summary: Alphabet is raising nearly $32 billion through a bond sale to increase investment in artificial intelligence, expanding the offering amid heightened competition in the AI sector.
4c430e39240927ff0ba47b72c1bcc86d1d1e5f4c.headline: Alphabet to Raise $32 Billion in Bonds to Fund AI Expansion

3a2cb03b86a1744bb11bcc9f0f29f72acd2f864a.summary: Chappell Roan has left the talent agency Wasserman after the release of emails from the early 2000s showing agency founder Casey Wasserman exchanging flirtatious messages with Ghislaine Maxwell. Wasserman has apologized for his past communication with Maxwell following public backlash.

Counter-terror officers are leading the investigation. Both victims were left seriously injured.
9681a093ef212d1cb2f45471351422aca7a98fc5.headline: 13 Year Old Arrested After Two Boys Stabbed at London School

Airlines from other countries, including Russia, China, and Spain, have also been affected.

1310d90aa90f1d321a375632747bbe81164e8bf5.summary: Ian Claughton, 60, has been jailed for seven years after rigging multiple houses with booby traps—including tripwires, pipe bombs, stun guns, and a homemade flamethrower—to deter intruders. He was found guilty of several drug-related offenses.

82f623966c6050c4d5f0d33782e078577c7ea4e4.summary: A 15-year-old boy has been sentenced to at least 13 years in custody for murdering 12-year-old Leo Ross, who was stabbed while walking home from school in Birmingham last year. Leo is believed to be the youngest victim of knife crime in the West Midlands.
82f623966c6050c4d5f0d33782e078577c7ea4e4.headline: Teen Sentenced to 13 Years for Fatal Stabbing of Leo Ross in

The nebula, located about 1,000 light-years away in the constellation Cygnus, contains a central star hidden by a dense cloud.

Montreal's police chief acknowledged similar issues can occur in other forces, referencing past cases involving officers accused of selling information to criminal groups.

NASA astronaut Chris Williams documented the deployment using a camera from the station's cupola.

4353365da2ce6716ec921432a8239c820b950328.summary: Online prediction market Kalshi reported a record trading volume of over $1 billion on Super Bowl Sunday, with more than $145 million in bets placed on events such as Bad Bunny’s opening song and halftime show guests. CEO Tarek Mansour stated the platform's Super Bowl trading volume rose 2,700% year-over-year.
4353365da2ce6716ec921432a8239c820b950328.headline: Kalshi Super Bowl Trading Volume Tops $1 Billion

23083b3c908f107d7ddf66d2b926578bf5b060a2.summary: Ghislaine Maxwell invoked the Fifth Amendment and declined to answer questions during a closed-door virtual deposition before the House Oversight Committee, as shown in video released by Chairman James Comer.
23083b3c908f107d7ddf66d2b926578bf5b060a2.headline: Ghislaine Maxwell Invokes Fifth Amendment in House Oversight

ab421e45b6203d6207373089f23c5b7de57601c6.summary: Violent clashes erupted in Sydney during Israeli President Isaac Herzog's visit, prompting Australia to call for calm. The unrest occurred amid widespread rallies and heightened protest restrictions following a recent deadly attack on a Jewish celebration.
ab421e45b6203d6207373089f23c5b7de57601c6.headline: Australia Calls for Calm After Clashes During Israeli Presidents Visit

34adbb2573b5e6b2fd76c4d843d9b57fb9823381.summary: The US military's Southern Command confirmed a strike on a vessel in the eastern Pacific on Monday, resulting in the deaths of two suspected drug smugglers. Rescuers are searching for a lone survivor following the incident.

dcea773688f0d07b1986a78ddfce3a6a1041decb.summary: Authorities have renewed their investigation at the Tucson home of an 84-year-old, searching the septic tank and examining rooftop cameras. Savannah Guthrie has publicly appealed for help in the case.
dcea773688f0d07b1986a78ddfce3a6a1041decb.headline: Authorities Renew Search at Tucson Home

e60dc9b9c7f3d870ef346d4c1ca714338301179c.summary: Super Bowl LX averaged 124.9 million viewers, a 2% decrease from last year and below the record set in 2025. Bad Bunny's halftime show drew 128.2 million viewers, also short of a record. Telemundo set a new record for Spanish-language Super Bowl broadcasts in the US with 3.3 million viewers.
e60dc9b9c7f3d870ef346d4c1ca714338301179c.headline: Super Bowl LX Viewership Dips Slightly

c4b937edb510b7f1f10ea5c9045f8701fac10ffa.summary: A shooting at Tumbler Ridge Secondary School and a nearby residence in British Columbia left at least nine people dead and over 25 injured, including two with life-threatening injuries. Authorities described the suspect as a female in a dress with brown hair. The incident has deeply affected the remote town.
c4b937edb510b7f1f10ea5c9045f8701fac10ffa.headline: Nine Killed Over 25 Injured in Tumbler Ridge School Shooting

21fb0c2cc6f2c5bc6a2cfaceb18ea3bfc4a592b3.summary: A Washington DC grand jury declined to indict six Democratic lawmakers who made a video reminding military members of their right to refuse illegal orders. The decision follows criticism from Donald Trump, who had called the lawmakers 'traitors.' Federal prosecutors will not pursue charges.
21fb0c2cc6f2c5bc6a2cfaceb18ea3bfc4a592b3.headline: Grand Jury Declines to Indict Six Democrats Over Military Orders Video

4c4e971243749ad24a5a3736c3efcd066daf0247.summary: A person was detained during a traffic stop south of Tucson, Arizona, in connection with the disappearance and reported abduction of Nancy Guthrie. The Pima County Sheriff's Department and the FBI are questioning the individual. Guthrie, 84, has been missing for nine days. Authorities have released a photo of the suspect.

96476097f2098baa59f401bd37ec7857b2565905.summary: Vladyslav Heraskevych, a skeleton sled racer, says he will wear a helmet honoring Ukrainian athletes killed in Russia's invasion, despite the International Olympic Committee's ban on political statements. The IOC has warned that this could lead to his disqualification.
