67c5ec4829f288305281d6575e3df916b367a76a.summary: NASA’s SpaceX Crew-12 mission launched successfully at 5:15 a.m. EST on Friday from Cape Canaveral, sending NASA astronauts Jessica Meir and Jack Hathaway, ESA astronaut Sophie Adenot, and Roscosmos cosmonaut Andrey Fedyaev aboard a Dragon spacecraft to the International Space Station for a science expedition.
67c5ec4829f288305281d6575e3df916b367a76a.headline: SpaceX Crew 12 Launches Four Astronauts to International Space Station

dec872134dee2c406037c7785b6f9f2102952175.summary: The US government briefly named Alibaba and Baidu as companies allegedly aiding China's military but has since withdrawn the updated list that included them.
dec872134dee2c406037c7785b6f9f2102952175.headline: US Removes Alibaba and Baidu From List of Firms Linked to Chinas

eb6e96807d9385be19f425067792d08c39bbcad1.summary: Guides are available for today's New York Times Pips and Strands puzzles, offering hints and complete answers to assist players in solving the games.
eb6e96807d9385be19f425067792d08c39bbcad1.headline: Hints and Answers Provided for Todays NYT Pips and Strands Puzzles

275f70a5b906ec56bfa68087e6910b8d982f9c3f.summary: Nick Castellanos has agreed to a one-year deal with the San Diego Padres after being released by the Phillies. He will earn the major league minimum from the Padres, while the Phillies will pay the remainder of the $20 million owed to him for the upcoming season.
275f70a5b906ec56bfa68087e6910b8d982f9c3f.headline: Nick Castellanos Signs One Year Deal With Padres After Phillies

43dcde870332888d327341c701a3ad8c50a34bf7.summary: Manchester City defeated Salford City 2-0 to advance to the fifth round of the FA Cup. John Stones returned from injury, and Marc Guehi scored his first goal for Manchester City in the match.
43dcde870332888d327341c701a3ad8c50a34bf7.headline: Manchester City Advances to FA Cup Fifth Round With 2 0 Win

61fad45c688c1c0238dbc06090e719a8effaf125.summary: The UK, France, Germany, Sweden, and the Netherlands jointly stated that Alexei Navalny was killed two years ago by a lethal toxin derived from poison dart frogs, which was found in his body. Intelligence agencies say Russia administered the poison. Russia denies the allegations and has demanded evidence.
61fad45c688c1c0238dbc06090e719a8effaf125.headline: European Nations Accuse Russia of Poisoning Navalny With Dart Frog

b4de2f5d78befe621364debdd1da40c6a270b01b.summary: The U.S. military conducted 10 strikes on over 30 Islamic State targets in Syria between February 3 and 12, targeting infrastructure and weapons storage facilities. The strikes were carried out in response to a December ambush that killed two U.S. soldiers and one American civilian interpreter.
b4de2f5d78befe621364debdd1da40c6a270b01b.headline: US Strikes Over 30 Islamic State Targets in Syria After Deadly Ambush

21555b91c62c93217d054b558c1a4f6469dd5fb7.summary: Jordan Stolz won his second gold medal at the 2026 Milan Cortina Winter Olympics by setting an Olympic record in the men's 500-meter speedskating event. He previously won gold in the 1,000 meters, becoming only the second skater to win both events at the same Olympics.
21555b91c62c93217d054b558c1a4f6469dd5fb7.headline: Jordan Stolz Wins Second Gold

1f62c28c8ea7497e02adb03555962f431125628f.summary: Casey Wasserman, chairman of the 2028 Los Angeles Olympics organizing committee, is selling his talent agency after emails between himself and Ghislaine Maxwell were revealed in recently released government files related to the Jeffrey Epstein controversy. Several clients have ended their relationships with the agency following the disclosures.
1f62c28c8ea7497e02adb03555962f431125628f.headline: Casey Wasserman to Sell Talent Agency After Epstein Related Email

533703c418c4973677afdba8be453350a3d8576e.summary: Philadelphia rookie VJ Edgecombe led Team Vince to a 25-24 win over Team Melo in the Rising Stars event at the 2026 NBA All-Star Weekend in Los Angeles. Edgecombe scored 17 points in the semifinal and secured the championship with two game-winning free throws, earning the event's MVP award.
533703c418c4973677afdba8be453350a3d8576e.headline: VJ Edgecombe Leads Team Vince to Rising Stars Win

f2d195c12d55a0eefbabc50bfb2c20d0b258dd9f.summary: At the Munich Security Conference, US Secretary of State Marco Rubio emphasized the importance of cooperation between the US and Europe, highlighting shared history and transatlantic ties. European leaders responded positively, expressing hope to strengthen trust after recent tensions.
f2d195c12d55a0eefbabc50bfb2c20d0b258dd9f.headline: Rubio Stresses US Europe Cooperation at Munich Security Conference

a0bcf5ea9279ece9ddf28bf489bef3db4fe6f126.summary: Canada's women's hockey team advanced to the Olympic semifinals after defeating Germany 5-1, with captain Marie-Philip Poulin returning to the lineup and making history.
a0bcf5ea9279ece9ddf28bf489bef3db4fe6f126.headline: Canada Advances to Olympic Semifinals in Womens Hockey With 5 1 Win

1932af97035e760a977e049404003badbee224eb.summary: Lucas Pinheiro Braathen won gold in the men's giant slalom at the Winter Olympics, earning Brazil and South America their first Winter Games medal. Braathen, 25, finished 0.58 seconds ahead of Switzerland's Marco Odermatt, with Loic Meillard taking bronze. Braathen previously competed for Norway before representing Brazil.
1932af97035e760a977e049404003badbee224eb.headline: Lucas Pinheiro Braathen Wins Brazils First Winter Olympic Gold

d5dbdf452bfda50b4de0679557e98642f4e8f32b.summary: Laurent Dubreuil won bronze in the men's 500 metres at the Milan Cortina Olympics, briefly setting an Olympic record with a time of 34.26 seconds before being surpassed by Jordan Stolz of the United States, who took gold, and Jenning de Boo of the Netherlands, who won silver.
d5dbdf452bfda50b4de0679557e98642f4e8f32b.headline: Laurent Dubreuil Wins Bronze in 500m Speed Skating at Milan Olympics

30f82bcf67cb179e82483edb132f6f5bf3340997.summary: A condom shortage has affected the Milano Games on Valentine's Day, while gold and silver prices are causing fluctuations in the jewelry market. In the U.S., ten states may see the northern lights this weekend after a recent solar event. Valentine’s Day celebrations include themed displays and reflections on long-lasting relationships.
30f82bcf67cb179e82483edb132f6f5bf3340997.headline: Milano Games Face Condom Shortage as Valentines Day Events Unfold

eeb499923d80f170357eb3d006b8c8724245e22e.summary: The US secretary of state affirmed support for the transatlantic alliance during talks with European leaders. Despite this reassurance, some European leaders called for greater independence from the US, citing ongoing tensions over issues such as Greenland and Ukraine.
eeb499923d80f170357eb3d006b8c8724245e22e.headline: US Reaffirms Support for Europe as Leaders Seek More Independence

89ac18d1665e3b2e46b6d387dfe243b131aa722c.summary: Scotland defeated England 31-20 in the Calcutta Cup rugby match at Murrayfield, securing a bonus-point win and ending England's 12-Test unbeaten streak. Scotland scored four tries, with Jones contributing two, while Arundell of England was sent off. Scotland reclaimed the Calcutta Cup after their previous loss to Italy.
89ac18d1665e3b2e46b6d387dfe243b131aa722c.headline: Scotland Beat England 31 20 to Reclaim Calcutta Cup in Six Nations

8fa737ecf6d4e54c206afb43e8e959bb8fa7a4df.summary: Donald Trump has ordered the USS Gerald R. Ford aircraft carrier to move from the Caribbean Sea to the Middle East, marking its second deployment to the region. The ship is expected to arrive in about three weeks as part of efforts to pressure Iran to limit its nuclear program.
8fa737ecf6d4e54c206afb43e8e959bb8fa7a4df.headline: Trump Orders USS Gerald R. Ford to Middle East to Pressure Iran

31c450d077db177b0348d686daabe16f0c34938b.summary: Larry the Cat, chief mouser at No 10, has paid tribute to his former rival following their passing.
31c450d077db177b0348d686daabe16f0c34938b.headline: Larry the Cat Pays Tribute to Former Rival

088e9c306fe15c26f120f93d2e68c47f0145daf5.summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy stated that the United States too often asks Ukraine, rather than Russia, to make concessions. He expressed hope that upcoming U.S.-brokered peace talks in Geneva would be substantive.
088e9c306fe15c26f120f93d2e68c47f0145daf5.headline: Zelenskyy Criticizes U.S. Approach Ahead of Geneva Peace Talks

695bd33f4c8904d607e98a446301017719b1b5e1.summary: Britain's High Court ruled that the government's ban on Palestine Action as a terrorist group was unlawful and breached free speech rights. The government plans to appeal, and the ban remains in effect pending further legal proceedings.
695bd33f4c8904d607e98a446301017719b1b5e1.headline: High Court Rules Palestine Action Ban Unlawful

c1ba6677c7915297492b62655b385e2a7cbfa616.summary: Ursula von der Leyen, speaking at the Munich Security Conference, called on the European Union to actively implement its mutual defence pact, emphasizing the need for the EU to adapt to current security challenges.
c1ba6677c7915297492b62655b385e2a7cbfa616.headline: Von der Leyen Urges EU to Implement Mutual Defence Pact

75392cdc22311704142ddf47c8199c3bdec041c8.summary: Jimmie Johnson announced he will retire from the NASCAR Cup Series after competing in the 2027 Daytona 500, ending his seven-title career and shifting his focus to Legacy Motor Club.
75392cdc22311704142ddf47c8199c3bdec041c8.headline: Jimmie Johnson to Retire After 2027 Daytona 500

1f59b1a7a42c9c4ea50cbf57799d1a34859b109b.summary: Prime Minister Keir Starmer stated that Britain has moved beyond the Brexit era and pledged to pursue a closer relationship with the European Union.
1f59b1a7a42c9c4ea50cbf57799d1a34859b109b.headline: Starmer Pledges Closer UK EU Ties

3530e4cc309e6beac9506004bd95acfec0afbcd2.summary: Donald Trump announced plans to implement national voter ID requirements before the upcoming midterm elections, stating he will pursue an executive order if necessary, regardless of congressional action.
3530e4cc309e6beac9506004bd95acfec0afbcd2.headline: Trump Plans Executive Order for National Voter ID Before Midterms

fff9459a0f794f19e42ebab1f06ca1ca771cf26f.summary: Federal authorities have opened a perjury investigation into whether ICE officers lied in their testimony about the shooting of a Venezuelan man. The probe will examine the accuracy of statements made by the officers regarding the incident.
fff9459a0f794f19e42ebab1f06ca1ca771cf26f.headline: Feds Investigate ICE Officers for Alleged Perjury in Shooting Case

9b46d6e485aaa054cf8bd88c2c81dcccda751679.summary: An Indian man has pleaded guilty in the U.S. to charges of orchestrating a failed plot, backed by the Indian government, to kill a Sikh separatist in New York City. Authorities in the U.S. and Canada have linked the case to broader efforts targeting Indian dissidents.
9b46d6e485aaa054cf8bd88c2c81dcccda751679.headline: Indian Man Pleads Guilty in Failed Plot to Kill Sikh Separatist in

a66637b64bdf2a3fa2a1aff7a627f6923320332d.summary: The US Department of Homeland Security has shut down after funding expired, following a stalemate over immigration enforcement, including ICE raids. The White House ordered the shutdown as lawmakers failed to reach an agreement.
a66637b64bdf2a3fa2a1aff7a627f6923320332d.headline: Homeland Security Shuts Down After Funding Lapses Over Immigration

16deacaa4eec82ec6a0a0d184fcd9e3adc1c4117.summary: The Wall Street Journal reports that the US military used Anthropic's AI model Claude, through a partnership with Palantir Technologies, during an operation in Venezuela aimed at kidnapping Nicolás Maduro.
16deacaa4eec82ec6a0a0d184fcd9e3adc1c4117.headline: US Military Used Anthropics Claude AI in Venezuela Operation

458c7f7c1a4f8f76f8a01301c47a9c6f8e0e2e20.summary: African leaders met in Addis Ababa for the 39th African Union Summit, where Mahmoud Ali Youssouf, Chairman of the African Union Commission, called for an end to the extermination of the Palestinian people.
458c7f7c1a4f8f76f8a01301c47a9c6f8e0e2e20.headline: African Union Summit Leaders Urge End to Palestinian Extermination

dc1f4c1bc4464a48aeca4b63d3a9174c560dd7db.summary: Inter president Beppe Marotta publicly backed head coach Cristian Chivu ahead of the Derby d'Italia match against Juventus. The Serie A fixture is scheduled for February 14 at San Siro, with both teams preparing for the high-profile encounter.
dc1f4c1bc4464a48aeca4b63d3a9174c560dd7db.headline: Inter President Marotta Supports Coach Chivu Ahead of Juventus Match

705bc8a6efe5837e2355823b1ea3756f17c40c71.summary: The son of Iran's last shah has called for US military intervention in Iran, as US military officials prepare for possible operations in Iran that could last several weeks.
705bc8a6efe5837e2355823b1ea3756f17c40c71.headline: Son of Irans Last Shah Calls for US Action as Military Plans

375f616ba213a726e1014ec7717a9239f60a47f5.summary: Lucas Pinheiro Braathen won gold in the men's giant slalom at the Winter Olympics, becoming the first South American and first Brazilian to win a medal at a Winter Games. Braathen, 25, finished ahead of Marco Odermatt of Switzerland, with Loic Meillard taking bronze. Brazil's president praised the historic achievement.
375f616ba213a726e1014ec7717a9239f60a47f5.headline: Lucas Pinheiro Braathen Wins Brazils First Winter Olympic Gold

c577f1f23b38b8091f6a92120c094b8b16d5016f.summary: During the 2026 NBA All-Star Weekend in Los Angeles, Keshad Johnson of the Miami Heat won the Slam Dunk Contest, while Damian Lillard of the Portland Trail Blazers claimed his third NBA 3-Point Contest title by defeating Devin Booker. The All-Star Game will feature a new USA vs. World format at the Intuit Dome.
c577f1f23b38b8091f6a92120c094b8b16d5016f.headline: Johnson Wins Dunk Contest

9db6ebdf4f9bab4c936cdb4d967e36978e2f263b.summary: Miami Heat forward Keshad Johnson won the 2026 NBA Slam Dunk Contest at Intuit Dome, defeating Carter Bryant and posting near-perfect scores. Jaxson Hayes missed advancing by one point.
9db6ebdf4f9bab4c936cdb4d967e36978e2f263b.headline: Keshad Johnson Wins 2026 NBA Slam Dunk Contest

31e942684df36fe6eff63b07f17d793d237d5ee9.summary: The US military conducted airstrikes on over 30 Islamic State targets in Syria between February 3 and 12, 2026, as part of Operation Hawkeye. The strikes killed and captured more than 50 ISIL fighters and targeted infrastructure and weapons facilities in response to a December ambush that killed two US soldiers and one American civilian interpreter.
31e942684df36fe6eff63b07f17d793d237d5ee9.headline: US Airstrikes in Syria Kill and Capture Over 50 ISIL Fighters

dbb25edf55fb2c84242f6444b8d860898a7c2a1c.summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy stated that the U.S. too often asks Ukraine, rather than Russia, to make concessions in peace talks. He expressed hope for substantive discussions at upcoming U.S.-brokered negotiations in Geneva and accused Moscow of stalling the peace process.
dbb25edf55fb2c84242f6444b8d860898a7c2a1c.headline: Zelenskyy Criticizes US Approach Ahead of Geneva Peace Talks

e67faed80a9e96b1ae579ebdd9c411f64daf68df.summary: Liverpool are reportedly pursuing Newcastle United winger Anthony Gordon, with transfer speculation increasing as Mohamed Salah may depart the club. No transfer has been finalized, and talks are ongoing.
e67faed80a9e96b1ae579ebdd9c411f64daf68df.headline: Liverpool Pursue Newcastles Anthony Gordon Amid Salah Exit Rumors

7050ff5e1e4234227e1b8b26ee73085cde7af553.summary: Shai Hope scored an unbeaten half-century to lead West Indies into the last eight of the Men's T20 World Cup, while Nepal was eliminated from the tournament after their match in Mumbai.
7050ff5e1e4234227e1b8b26ee73085cde7af553.headline: West Indies Reach T20 World Cup Last Eight

c856aac768e16af3765ce7428c4f59b76b4375d4.summary: Damian Lillard won the 2026 NBA 3-Point Contest in Los Angeles, defeating Devin Booker with a 29-point performance. Returning after not playing all season due to injury, Lillard became the third player in NBA history to win the 3-point contest three times.
c856aac768e16af3765ce7428c4f59b76b4375d4.headline: Damian Lillard Claims Third NBA 3 Point Contest Title After Injury

b9ab91dc15a79d1e0e3f4231236b622e06cac243.summary: The U.K., France, Germany, Sweden, and the Netherlands stated that Alexei Navalny was killed by a toxin derived from poison dart frogs, with intelligence agencies confirming its presence in his body. Russia denies the allegations and has demanded access to the evidence from the European countries.
b9ab91dc15a79d1e0e3f4231236b622e06cac243.headline: European Nations Blame Russia for Navalny Death by Dart Frog Toxin

d281956d09c32251976d425db012f2958a542e23.summary: Valentine's Day at the 2026 Milano Winter Games featured a shortage of condoms and several love stories, including a Ukrainian skier advancing to the Olympic finals and proposing marriage. Celebrations and themed displays marked the holiday in Dearborn and other locations, while northern lights were forecast to be visible in ten states over the weekend.
d281956d09c32251976d425db012f2958a542e23.headline: Valentines Day Brings Love Stories and Condom Shortage at Milano Games

5619538565835f62637bb3baf99dccc65b023156.summary: The San Diego Padres have agreed to deals with outfielder Nick Castellanos, pitcher German Marquez, and pitcher Griffin Canning to strengthen their roster, according to sources. The moves come after the Padres finished the previous season with 90 wins and a playoff appearance.
5619538565835f62637bb3baf99dccc65b023156.headline: Padres Add Castellanos Marquez and Canning in Roster Moves

2f7bc1fb5193797dc9ab52c2a00a730c95d91a13.summary: No. 16 Texas Tech defeated No. 1 Arizona 78-75 in overtime, handing the Wildcats their second consecutive loss. JT Toppin scored 31 points, including eight in overtime. Texas Tech improved to 19-6 and beat a No. 1 team for the third time in its history. Arizona, previously 23-0, has now lost two straight games.
2f7bc1fb5193797dc9ab52c2a00a730c95d91a13.headline: Texas Tech Upsets No. 1 Arizona 78 75 in Overtime

e45f6488e97c0a261fdca607a814586b6a79bba9.summary: Donald Trump and Benjamin Netanyahu have agreed that the United States should increase efforts to limit Iran's oil sales to China, according to Axios and Reuters.
e45f6488e97c0a261fdca607a814586b6a79bba9.headline: Trump and Netanyahu Agree to Press Iran on Oil Sales to China

0e78e85fa69eecb4c110d229674252e755cb86c5.summary: The Pentagon has warned it may end its relationship with Anthropic due to disagreements over AI safety measures, according to Axios and Reuters reports.
0e78e85fa69eecb4c110d229674252e755cb86c5.headline: Pentagon Warns Anthropic Over AI Safety Dispute

104222aefd85975daf71dafbc8f837c4e8b4e268.summary: A drone attack hit Russia's Black Sea coastal region overnight, damaging infrastructure at the Taman seaport and fuel tanks. Authorities reported the incident caused significant damage to the targeted facilities.
104222aefd85975daf71dafbc8f837c4e8b4e268.headline: Drone Attack Damages Taman Seaport and Fuel Tanks in Russia

cd5c36ac086cede59e852bf10382ea61e16093ab.summary: Casey Wasserman announced he is selling his talent agency after his name appeared in the Epstein files and communications with Ghislaine Maxwell came to light. Several clients, including Chappell Roan and Abby Wambach, have cut ties with the firm amid the controversy.
cd5c36ac086cede59e852bf10382ea61e16093ab.headline: Casey Wasserman to Sell Agency After Epstein File Revelations

9d8c15b6761b10dec0a1745b1d29c3241a4de79f.summary: The International Space Station is fully staffed again after four new astronauts arrived to replace those who left in January due to medical issues. The crew will spend the next eight months conducting experiments to support future deep space missions.
9d8c15b6761b10dec0a1745b1d29c3241a4de79f.headline: ISS Returns to Full Crew After Arrival of Four Replacement Astronauts

a7756f67c115583a18590fd40ec27436697f810b.summary: The European Central Bank has expanded its euro liquidity support to international markets, aiming to strengthen the euro's position in global finance.
a7756f67c115583a18590fd40ec27436697f810b.headline: ECB Expands Euro Liquidity Support to Boost Global Currency Role

fb3f042f4d9ec44b8c0d5c9447fb3f9836fa3d53.summary: Prime Minister Keir Starmer announced that the UK aims to strengthen its relationship with the European Union, stating that the country has moved on from the Brexit era.
fb3f042f4d9ec44b8c0d5c9447fb3f9836fa3d53.headline: UK Plans Closer Relationship With EU After Brexit

2da6f19df4ae69be43c83143971fc06599fc4d88.summary: Israeli forces killed five Palestinians in southern Khan Younis and four in northern al-Faluja, according to medical sources. The reported deaths bring the total number of Palestinians killed since the October 10 ceasefire to 601, amid ongoing violations.
2da6f19df4ae69be43c83143971fc06599fc4d88.headline: Nine Palestinians Killed by Israeli Forces in Gaza

82972d638ce72afed1048802b297e019528e49e6.summary: Markets are preparing for continued volatility in the coming week, with analysts expecting more fluctuations driven by developments in artificial intelligence and investor reactions described as 'scare trading.'
82972d638ce72afed1048802b297e019528e49e6.headline: Markets Anticipate Ongoing Volatility Amid AI Developments

798a25f021ebfdd356b7408a87f6d940bf964610.summary: Marcus Semien began Mets spring training in Port St. Lucie, expressing enthusiasm about reuniting with Bo Bichette and noting Francisco Lindor's absence.
798a25f021ebfdd356b7408a87f6d940bf964610.headline: Marcus Semien Starts Mets Spring Training

54f2a6aadc88602730ff642b8904118d7b91102b.summary: Guides and solutions for today's New York Times games, including Pips, Connections, and Strands, are available to assist players with hints and answers.
54f2a6aadc88602730ff642b8904118d7b91102b.headline: NYT Puzzle Solutions and Hints Provided for Pips

5a51d83a97a107aa50f56cd84002f445c435e6f0.summary: The Toronto Blue Jays made an unexpected offseason move, while the Seattle Seahawks are focusing on ten key players as they adjust their roster to manage salary cap space.
5a51d83a97a107aa50f56cd84002f445c435e6f0.headline: Blue Jays Make Unanticipated Move

113b51d3d870d66d90776f081418b5c84f6f8eb6.summary: Last week, industrial stocks rose sharply while financial stocks declined, driven by concerns about artificial intelligence impacting the sector.
113b51d3d870d66d90776f081418b5c84f6f8eb6.headline: Industrial Stocks Rise as Financials Fall Amid AI Concerns

984f58d56471dcc19c0d59847b2625b26196783a.summary: At the Milano Cortina 2026 Winter Olympics, World Curling increased umpire monitoring after accusations of 'double-touching' the stone by Canadian and British teams. A verbal warning was issued to Canada for language during a dispute. Umpires will now move between all sheets for the remainder of the event to observe deliveries.
984f58d56471dcc19c0d59847b2625b26196783a.headline: World Curling Increases Oversight After Double Touching Accusations

516941453e224694d68c255e7669f2814fce86dd.summary: India defeated Pakistan by 61 runs in Colombo, with Ishan Kishan scoring 77, to secure a place in the Super 8s of the T20 World Cup. The teams did not shake hands before or after the match. West Indies also advanced to the last eight, eliminating Nepal. India and West Indies are confirmed for the next round.
516941453e224694d68c255e7669f2814fce86dd.headline: India Beats Pakistan to Reach T20 World Cup Super 8s

776a119567a5f15d1b8bc9e8a69dcbf4dbb0a2f0.summary: Matt Weston and Tabby Stoecker won gold for Great Britain in the mixed team skeleton at the 2026 Winter Olympics in Cortina d'Ampezzo, finishing with a combined time of 1 minute, 59.35 seconds. Weston became the first British athlete to win two gold medals at a single Winter Olympics.
776a119567a5f15d1b8bc9e8a69dcbf4dbb0a2f0.headline: Weston and Stoecker Win Mixed Team Skeleton Gold for Great Britain

d3e40097aa865e1638f08a312be7fe595973b742.summary: U.S. Figure Skating has decided not to appeal the results of the Olympic ice dance competition, confirming a silver medal for Madison Chock and Evan Bates after they finished behind France's Laurence Fournier Beaudry and Guillaume Cizeron. The decision follows controversy over the judges' scoring but effectively finalizes the medal standings.
d3e40097aa865e1638f08a312be7fe595973b742.headline: U.S. Figure Skating Confirms No Appeal of Olympic Ice Dance Results

a94367fefc1e4d51402a929cdcb69b8860e602ca.summary: Norway’s Johannes Hoesflot Klaebo won his ninth career gold medal in cross-country skiing by anchoring the men’s 4 x 7.5km relay at the Milan Cortina 2026 Winter Olympics. This victory sets a new Winter Games record for most gold medals by an athlete. Klaebo surpassed previous record holders Marit Bjoergen, Bjoern Daehlie, and Ole Einar Bjoerndalen.
a94367fefc1e4d51402a929cdcb69b8860e602ca.headline: Klaebo Sets Winter Olympics Record With Ninth Gold Medal

6e908475da61c9e4c28913434fd5431f1fabcec0.summary: The Syrian army has taken control of the al-Shaddadi base in Hasakah following coordination with the US, as part of the ongoing ceasefire agreement with Kurdish-led forces.
6e908475da61c9e4c28913434fd5431f1fabcec0.headline: Syrian Army Takes Control of al Shaddadi Base in Coordination With US

629665b64b3a02390f281d149ee6f664e2a9306d.summary: Trump and Netanyahu have agreed to increase pressure on Iran by targeting its oil sales, particularly to China, according to multiple reports. The agreement includes plans to impose sanctions on Iranian oil as part of efforts to curb Iran's revenue.
629665b64b3a02390f281d149ee6f664e2a9306d.headline: Trump and Netanyahu Agree to Sanction Iranian Oil Exports

9687ef47f8092f04c9a8a2ef71c2f62e1a465d94.summary: US military forces boarded a sanctioned oil tanker, Veronica III, in the Indian Ocean after tracking it from the Caribbean Sea. The vessel was allegedly attempting to evade an energy blockade against sanctioned ships linked to Venezuela.
9687ef47f8092f04c9a8a2ef71c2f62e1a465d94.headline: US Military Boards Sanctioned Oil Tanker Tracked From Caribbean

79b5fb8eed5ba758ec1d99c75ed53210ffe4ba03.summary: Five European countries report that lab tests confirm Russian opposition leader Alexey Navalny was killed in 2024. The UK is considering new sanctions against Moscow, attributing responsibility to the Kremlin. Russia rejects the accusations from western nations.
79b5fb8eed5ba758ec1d99c75ed53210ffe4ba03.headline: Lab Tests Confirm Navalny Killed in 2024

8374b245741a2b37e103a4c135d554019f8c7efc.summary: German Galushchenko was detained by Ukraine's anti-corruption bureau while attempting to leave the country. His detention follows his dismissal and ongoing legal proceedings related to a corruption scandal.
8374b245741a2b37e103a4c135d554019f8c7efc.headline: German Galushchenko Detained Amid Corruption Investigation in Ukraine

accfa9e6d6e45d7d8201a89831bdab609190ba00.summary: A winter storm watch has been issued for northern California, with several feet of snow expected. Authorities warn of major travel impacts as residents and travelers prepare for the holiday weekend.
accfa9e6d6e45d7d8201a89831bdab609190ba00.headline: Winter Storm Watch Issued for Northern California Ahead of Holiday

4a38300482a89708f7fd0397e78b19356b3545d1.summary: Anthony Kim won the LIV Golf Adelaide tournament, marking his first victory since 2010. After a twelve-year absence from competition, Kim secured the title with a 9-under 63, completing a notable career comeback.
4a38300482a89708f7fd0397e78b19356b3545d1.headline: Anthony Kim Wins LIV Golf Adelaide After Twelve Year Absence

f9839c4db7610885bfd944b538937e9d732f9a8f.summary: Federica Brignone won the gold medal in the Olympic women's giant slalom in Cortina d'Ampezzo, becoming the oldest Olympic Alpine gold medalist at age 35. Mikaela Shiffrin of the U.S. finished 11th.
f9839c4db7610885bfd944b538937e9d732f9a8f.headline: Federica Brignone Wins Olympic Giant Slalom Gold

d4ec7fcefc77131065a5a8ae2c432bb101828ef4.summary: At least 12 Palestinians were killed and several injured across Gaza on Sunday, including at least six in a strike on a tent encampment in northern Gaza, according to the Palestinian Red Crescent. 3b16440a71debf9f3f6fb185b8af20940609f8a8.summary: Barack Obama clarified on Instagram that he has not seen evidence of aliens making contact with Earth, following earlier comments on a podcast that appeared to suggest otherwise.

43a7c9dd07cf63cb4855799c0fdb2f1b9a7d4387.summary: Richard Howson has been fined £237,700 by the Financial Conduct Authority for misleading investors before the collapse of Carillion. He withdrew his challenge to the penalty. The UK government had to intervene to maintain key services after the company's failure.
43a7c9dd07cf63cb4855799c0fdb2f1b9a7d4387.headline: Richard Howson Fined £237

990c8663e3d5176fc719a4044f7eeebba72ea328.summary: Alibaba has introduced its new Qwen3.5 AI model, described as a significant upgrade aimed at advancing capabilities for the 'agentic AI era.' The launch comes just before the expected release of the DeepSeek AI model.

492d364ab0bb249aedb69c422f0f168e4966fdfb.summary: The FBI reports finding a glove with DNA about three kilometres from Nancy Guthrie's home in Tucson, Arizona. The glove appears similar to those worn by a masked person seen outside her door the night she disappeared.

bc71a28d2f4abe013c08f5b7211c55f45d12881f.summary: Giannis Antetokounmpo has affirmed his commitment to the Milwaukee Bucks and expressed his goal of winning another championship with the team. He confirmed he is not seeking a trade, and the Bucks are aiming to keep him on the roster for the long term.

9c74dc6f9e437eb1c58f7f98eaba88d74a504ab4.summary: A Ukrainian ex-minister has been accused of money laundering and embezzling millions of dollars intended for infrastructure defenses, according to authorities. The case involves alleged collaboration with criminal groups in a major corruption investigation.

President Trump stated he will participate from Washington. The discussions follow earlier meetings in the UAE and coincide with increased US military presence in the region and Iranian military exercises.

d42df74d08a50d818d9bd01f38b5f12fdc06cb02.summary: Cleveland Browns safety Ronnie Hickman was assaulted by four men in a New York City hotel lobby and suffered minor injuries. He was treated at a hospital and has since been released. The Browns stated that Hickman is now at home resting with his family.

ee1633f27c48893089ce9ff13ce17689f5512a8c.summary: Adani Group announced plans to invest $100 billion by 2035 to build green-powered, AI-ready data centers in India. The initiative aims to support India's efforts to become a major player in artificial intelligence and cloud computing.

c2f3e6e8944a713da6b4c3e35dcbfc935be3983f.summary: Thomas Pritzker has resigned as Hyatt executive chairman, effective immediately, citing 'terrible judgment' in maintaining ties with Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell. Pritzker also stated he will not seek reelection to the board at the upcoming annual stockholder meeting.
c2f3e6e8944a713da6b4c3e35dcbfc935be3983f.headline: Thomas Pritzker Resigns as Hyatt Executive Chairman Over Epstein Ties

19c506ef470b939079e2f74e43089ff7d499990e.summary: Manchester United are considering a transfer move for Liverpool midfielder Alexis Mac Allister, according to reports. Manchester City are reportedly not interested in selling James Trafford, while Nicolas Jackson is expected to return to Chelsea from Bayern Munich.
19c506ef470b939079e2f74e43089ff7d499990e.headline: Manchester United Eye Liverpools Alexis Mac Allister in Possible

efc242238e08fdea83cf8b59433066722594bce1.summary: Steve Witkoff and Jared Kushner will lead U.S. negotiators in Geneva, Switzerland, for talks with Russian and Ukrainian delegates. Donald Trump has urged Ukraine to reach a deal with Russia before the U.S.-brokered discussions scheduled for Tuesday.
efc242238e08fdea83cf8b59433066722594bce1.headline: Witkoff and Kushner to Lead U.S. Brokered Russia Ukraine Talks in

638434ee169d842ee2b7d3de280a5ba8f32334a3.summary: Rev. Jesse Jackson, a prominent civil rights leader and two-time Democratic presidential candidate, died on Tuesday at age 84, his family announced. Jackson was known for his decades-long activism and close association with Martin Luther King Jr.
638434ee169d842ee2b7d3de280a5ba8f32334a3.headline: Rev. Jesse Jackson Civil Rights Leader Dies at 84

dfd77037daef79bd1e257b374d146d7f8f852e36.summary: Tyson Fury says the deaths of two friends of Anthony Joshua in a December car crash influenced his decision to return to boxing after 15 months away. Fury is set to step back into the ring following the incident.

9c52d004cbbdccf4418321fd1a8dac1265c15607.summary: The Philippines has objected to a statement from the Chinese Embassy regarding job losses, amid ongoing tensions and conflicting accounts between Beijing and Manila over the South China Sea.
9c52d004cbbdccf4418321fd1a8dac1265c15607.headline: Philippines Objects to Chinese Embassy Remarks on Job Losses

3a36f954d35355169d62c398d836b4c9299fa273.summary: Russia and Ukraine are preparing for talks expected to focus on Ukrainian territory Russia wants Kyiv to give up. Previous U.S.-mediated negotiations were called productive by both sides, but key issues such as territory and security guarantees remain unresolved.
3a36f954d35355169d62c398d836b4c9299fa273.headline: Russia and Ukraine Prepare for Talks on Territorial Disputes

70411a1ba55fb588441576847fdfd5f9c03953ec.summary: Trump and Maryland governor Wes Moore exchanged criticism over responsibility for a sewage spill in the Potomac River. Trump announced that the US government would intervene to address the spill and offered federal assistance, while disputes over the response continue.
70411a1ba55fb588441576847fdfd5f9c03953ec.headline: Trump and Moore Dispute Potomac River Sewage Spill Response

b238e52ad94dc1c74f8630794b7861342e712c46.summary: Tarique Rahman and newly elected lawmakers were sworn into Bangladesh's parliament, following a landslide victory and the ousting of Sheikh Hasina. Rahman is set to take the oath as prime minister after the country's first elections since the 2024 uprising.

d4ba3bcee0314e5ae9570825a5ac75df62916e28.summary: People around the world are marking the Lunar New Year with prayers, fireworks, and street festivals to welcome the Year of the Horse. Celebrations also feature robots and various festivities as communities gather for the occasion.

27bf369c72a6292162de4c14c65ead53f54f71d1.summary: A judge has ordered the US National Park Service to reinstall a slavery exhibit in Philadelphia, criticizing the government for removing it and accusing officials of attempting to rewrite history.
27bf369c72a6292162de4c14c65ead53f54f71d1.headline: Judge Orders National Park Service to Restore Philadelphia Slavery

fc9f42cfc6e9355d2c436c7ed023e7f14c986c8e.summary: Oscar-winning actor Robert Duvall, known for his roles in 'Tender Mercies,' 'The Godfather,' and 'Apocalypse Now,' has died at the age of 95. His career spanned decades and included performances in films such as 'To Kill a Mockingbird' and 'Gone in 60 Seconds.'

3a62138232e04663378ad1daf5c6c7d241c069b1.headline: Anderson Cooper Leaves 60 Minutes

Malinin plans to address his struggles in a new skating routine. The Games also feature intense competition among figure skating stars Amber Glenn, Adeliia Petrosian, and Alysa Liu.

e3338a3fb2049f64ef940510e7c4132fcb773b18.summary: Los Angeles Dodgers utility man Tommy Edman will miss opening day after undergoing right ankle surgery in the offseason. Manager Dave Roberts confirmed Edman is not ready for spring training or the start of the regular season. Edman had surgery in November after being limited to 97 games in 2025 due to the injury.

3de829ed95e56b3cdb7511d29a107d2fd7542869.summary: Denmark's prime minister is leveraging the renewed attention from Donald Trump's interest in Greenland as part of her strategy ahead of the upcoming election.
3de829ed95e56b3cdb7511d29a107d2fd7542869.headline: Denmarks Prime Minister Uses Greenland Issue in Election Strategy

99103675e47a84ca784324008676fe359830af78.summary: Minnesota law enforcement officials report that the FBI is refusing to share evidence from its investigation into the death of Alex Pretti, who was shot by federal immigration agents. The state's governor had called for an impartial inquiry into the incident.
99103675e47a84ca784324008676fe359830af78.headline: FBI Withholds Evidence in Minnesota Shooting Investigation

b8e6512968afa926095a1aeecc4f8ef1f947379e.summary: Ireland's Data Protection Commission has launched an investigation into X's Grok AI chatbot over its generation of sexualized images of people in the EU, including minors. The probe reflects increased regulatory scrutiny of the chatbot's content practices.

dcb37672327da347bbe81218753a50d2ddad2f8b.summary: Barack Obama stated on Instagram that he has not seen any evidence of aliens making contact with humans, clarifying earlier remarks from a podcast.

bd7a7b161dd49bee10ef3e7a39bc3b962cbe8ae2.summary: Israeli producer Dana Eden, co-creator of the Emmy-winning TV series 'Tehran,' has died suddenly in Greece, according to Israeli public broadcaster KAN and police officials in Athens.

569391d9df4eebf379491bfdc84f1bbd07085298.summary: Ronda Rousey and Gina Carano announced they will return from retirement to fight each other in a mixed martial arts bout on May 16, 2026, at Intuit Dome in Inglewood, California. The event will be promoted by Most Valuable Promotions and streamed on Netflix. Both fighters have been inactive in MMA for several years.

Police believe the incident was targeted and may be linked to a family dispute. A good Samaritan helped stop the shooting, and investigators have interviewed nearly 100 witnesses.

Both sides report progress but note that significant challenges remain before a final agreement can be reached. Oil prices fell following news of constructive talks.

Cuban stated that tanking can be beneficial and is not necessarily negative for the league.

Discovery to negotiate with Paramount Skydance, which has been invited to submit a final bid that could potentially top Netflix's existing offer. Talks are ongoing and must conclude within the week.

Jackson was known for his decades of activism, his close association with Martin Luther King Jr., and his two campaigns for the Democratic presidential nomination. Tributes from political figures recognized his impact on social and economic justice in the US.

Czechia will face Canada in the knockout stage, marking their first playoff meeting of this tournament after Canada won their previous group-stage encounter.

58ced526e47bb2e7c64330d8f412c304db27fa26.summary: The Lunar New Year began on February 17, 2026, marking the start of the Year of the Fire Horse. Celebrations took place worldwide, with events in China featuring humanoid robots performing dances and martial arts to showcase new technology.
58ced526e47bb2e7c64330d8f412c304db27fa26.headline: Lunar New Year 2026 Celebrated Globally With Technology Showcases

f05b00b943e4dc8c0da4c874319a12912ff5fe81.summary: A federal judge has ruled that Kilmar Abrego Garcia cannot be re-detained by immigration authorities. The judge also criticized the Trump administration for repeatedly threatening to deport a Salvadoran national to Africa without taking action.

Investigators confirmed that DNA from a glove found two miles from her home matched an unknown male, but it has not produced any leads. Authorities continue to analyze additional DNA evidence as the investigation continues.
6b898277d767106e62df419098b024bbdd7b1b73.headline: No Leads From DNA in Ongoing Search for Nancy Guthrie

60acfe4a69874d907c6300f77662e389a5162fa4.summary: Tricia McLaughlin, the top Homeland Security spokesperson for the Trump administration, is set to leave her position as the administration's immigration crackdown faces scrutiny.

13d81e20cb878a15b24eaabd0aeace6e52f2f07d.summary: At the 2026 Winter Olympics in Milan, Italy won gold in the men's team pursuit speed skating, defeating the U.S. team, who took silver. China earned bronze. In the women's team pursuit, Canada claimed gold by beating the Netherlands, marking Canada's third gold medal of the Games.

08101101d37c7cadc1c78a6c1f09e71422dac3e9.summary: Cucumber prices in Russia have sharply increased, causing public frustration and prompting political and regulatory attention as authorities seek to address concerns over rising wartime food costs.
08101101d37c7cadc1c78a6c1f09e71422dac3e9.headline: Cucumber Prices Surge in Russia

51da7962a0aed3ca3cfa19de58bfc470ce63fba8.summary: Los Angeles Mayor Karen Bass has called for Casey Wasserman to resign as head of the 2028 Olympics organizing team due to his association with Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.
51da7962a0aed3ca3cfa19de58bfc470ce63fba8.headline: L.A. Mayor Calls for Casey Wasserman to Resign From 2028 Olympics Role

42d0c4e65bfa8cbe39ecdc595f3e6bbdc92742a4.summary: Adani announced plans to invest $100 billion in AI data centers in India by 2035. The investment aims to support India's efforts to strengthen its position in the global artificial intelligence sector over the next decade.

53a1e1d14bbee62adf44a4f0e0f1a2c4b2c74e60.summary: Canada defeated Switzerland 2-1 in the semifinals, advancing to face the United States in the women's gold-medal game.
53a1e1d14bbee62adf44a4f0e0f1a2c4b2c74e60.headline: Canada Beats Switzerland to Reach Womens Gold Medal Final Against U.S

a5073327766f3ddf583c819acd0ae14094636dea.summary: Trilateral peace talks between Ukraine, Russia, and the US began in Geneva, focusing on eastern Ukrainian territory. Ukraine has rejected Russia's demand for control of these areas, and negotiations are ongoing with no breakthroughs reported after the second day.
a5073327766f3ddf583c819acd0ae14094636dea.headline: Ukraine Russia US Continue Peace Talks in Geneva Without Breakthrough

Both teams left the pitch during the incident. Benfica denied the allegations involving Gianluca Prestianni. Real Madrid won the match 1-0. UEFA has issued a statement following the incident.
2bededdde534b07145983bc04a3ef438921043ab.headline: Real Madrid Benfica Match Halted After Vinicius Reports Racist Abuse

76fc6563717d9ecdd38339729dc0dc589d6f6f18.summary: Communities worldwide are celebrating the Lunar New Year, marking the start of the Year of the Horse with prayers, festivities, and cultural traditions in cities such as Beijing, Manila, Panama, Moscow, and New York.

67fd64456dc67bfb57fc1da324f1c071ff2af3d0.summary: Peru's Congress has voted to impeach and remove President Jose Jeri from office, four months after he took over from Dina Boluarte. The decision follows multiple corruption allegations, including secret meetings linked to China.

bb87a510f46e50ff0c37ff2a23311932aa34ba49.summary: Philippine Vice President Sara Duterte has announced her intention to run for president in the 2028 elections. The announcement comes amid multiple impeachment complaints filed against her over alleged corruption.

f40bf88bb55212d620912be2dacb7f8d54c9e570.summary: Manny Pacquiao will face Ruslan Provodnikov in a 10-round welterweight exhibition bout on April 18 at the Thomas and Mack Center in Las Vegas.

ecedace14f4de4d864b282e647c78b62fbc303d6.summary: Ronda Rousey and Gina Carano will return from MMA retirement to fight each other on May 16 in California. The event will be streamed on Netflix.

c1cce10f104610c91e7fdf00187d4e461b3945d3.summary: Conservation and historical organizations filed a lawsuit against the Trump administration on Tuesday, challenging National Park Service policies they claim remove historical and scientific information from national parks. The lawsuit also addresses the removal of the rainbow Pride flag from the Stonewall National Monument in New York.

8495a754905dbb5e861b6a8309103266832520c9.summary: UN-appointed experts stated that newly released documents on Jeffrey Epstein's sex-trafficking activities reveal potential crimes against humanity and highlight the need for an independent investigation into the scale of abuses against women and girls.
8495a754905dbb5e861b6a8309103266832520c9.headline: UN Experts Call for Independent Probe Into Epstein Files

3830f7bd2941da72487f6f66ba84c71fcce12beb.summary: Japan has committed to invest about $36 billion in US oil, gas, and critical mineral projects as part of the first phase of a trade deal between Japan and the US. The agreement was announced by Donald Trump and the Japanese prime minister, with both leaders highlighting the deal's impact on economic security.

eceb613c87bdfd6d32db16681188c0a5b58dac32.summary: U.K. inflation fell to 3% in January, its lowest level since March 2025, according to the Office for National Statistics. The decrease remains above the Bank of England's 2% target but has increased expectations of a possible interest rate cut as soon as next month.
eceb613c87bdfd6d32db16681188c0a5b58dac32.headline: U.K. Inflation Drops to 3%

c06ec13f6c5825382fbacc22eeba9c57885247c8.summary: The United States and Iran reported progress in Geneva nuclear talks, agreeing on a set of guiding principles, according to officials including Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi and U.S. special envoy Steve Witkoff. Both sides will continue negotiations, but no final deal has been reached.
c06ec13f6c5825382fbacc22eeba9c57885247c8.headline: U.S. and Iran Agree on Guiding Principles in Geneva Nuclear Talks

2992bd6204804a5fab79a24d8cb2f40794137dbd.summary: Police arrested 18-year-old Carter Camacho of Georgia after he allegedly ran toward the U.S. Capitol with a loaded shotgun, wearing a tactical vest and gloves. Authorities say he also carried additional ammunition. U.S. Capitol Police Chief Michael Sullivan praised officers for their response.
2992bd6204804a5fab79a24d8cb2f40794137dbd.headline: Armed 18 Year Old Arrested After Running Toward U.S. Capitol

Two other family members were critically injured in the attack. Authorities say the shooter targeted family members.
5a73db2f8f7a1eb012f6e5502b6487427942441f.headline: Shooter Kills Ex Wife and Son in Rhode Island Ice Rink Attack

The deal is valued at tens of billions of dollars and expands the partnership between the two companies.

ce7790ba527f3e4e62a9cfbf8df065b430b0f2b6.summary: On February 5, 2026, NASA's Terra satellite captured images showing extensive snow cover across Hokkaido, northern Japan. Sapporo, the island's largest city, regularly experiences over 140 days of snowfall each year, with nearly 6 meters accumulating on average. Hokkaido also features several large caldera lakes and more than 31 active volcanoes.

bec731ed2974d4e84da756f5de60f8b6aecf83a5.summary: Giancarlo Stanton stated his Yankees career feels lacking and will be incomplete without winning a World Series. Stanton hit 38 home runs with 100 RBIs in his first Yankees season in 2018 but missed 266 of 708 games over the next five seasons.

aca6c5aff87c054e9103e3ff6ff14382cd74061f.summary: Arizona State defeated No. 13 Texas Tech 72-67, ending the Red Raiders' three-game winning streak. Texas Tech's JT Toppin left the game with a lower right leg injury in the second half. Maurice Odum led Arizona State with 23 points, and the win marked Arizona State's first victory over a ranked opponent since January 2025.

9921f777d983f8a4a9615e1099d8bff6cc4b01ee.summary: Government sources report that the UK may delay plans to equalize the minimum wage across age groups. The GMB union criticized any potential delay or halt as unacceptable. Meanwhile, UK inflation fell to 3% in January, raising expectations for an early interest rate cut by the Bank of England.

4f331a2c1f926c05fb43b57957673fc35906298c.summary: The Rev. Jesse Jackson, a longtime civil rights leader, Baptist minister, and two-time Democratic presidential candidate, has died at age 84.

2f81a735b0c724b25d21fe9dcef6624020952655.summary: Humanoid robots performed martial arts and dance routines at the China Media Group’s Spring Festival Gala on February 17, drawing attention from viewers and experts. The performance highlighted China's advancements in AI-powered robotics, with growing global recognition of its technology.
2f81a735b0c724b25d21fe9dcef6624020952655.headline: Humanoid Robots Showcase Chinas AI Advances at Spring Festival Gala

c42366464ebc820cd7f5673e8caccecf945c54dd.summary: DNA from a glove found near Nancy Guthrie’s home is being analyzed at a private lab in Florida after being sent there by the Pima County Sheriff’s Department on February 12. The sheriff stated confidence in finding Guthrie, but her whereabouts remain unknown.

The sale is in accordance with Allen's wishes and marks the end of the Allen family's ownership of the NFL franchise.

Both sides described the negotiations as difficult, and the discussions concluded quickly. The war is set to enter its fifth year next week, and fighting continues.

The team and Irving announced the decision on Wednesday, citing ongoing rehabilitation. Irving will not return to play this season.

Six skiers were rescued. Search and recovery efforts continue following the deadliest U.S. avalanche in over forty years.
0856caf823baab94ff8a5c4bd6bf456f0658af26.headline: Eight Dead One Missing After Sierra Nevada Avalanche

Shiffrin secured victory by a margin of 1.50 seconds, ending an eight-year Olympic medal drought.

He stated that Meta has improved its ability to identify underage users but acknowledged wishing the company had acted sooner. The trial focuses on whether social media use harms children.

c02d9cc8e4b06f32069adc0e830b0315b9f68f44.summary: Japan has agreed to invest $36 billion in U.S. oil, gas, and critical mineral projects under a new trade deal with Donald Trump. The agreement marks the first major tranche of Japanese investment following the pact, with both leaders highlighting the deal's significance for economic security.

27245419b8e59e317925b3e6ba62ea64c09eb637.summary: Patrick Mahomes restructured his contract with the Kansas City Chiefs, creating $43.65 million in salary cap space ahead of the 2026 season, according to ESPN and multiple reports.

eed620530476e7ff8e8d3e7613654f6fddf19d7a.summary: Les Wexner, retired founder of Victoria's Secret ex-parent L Brands, has faced scrutiny over his personal and financial ties to Jeffrey Epstein, who was known to be Wexner’s biggest financial client. Wexner has not been accused of any wrongdoing.
eed620530476e7ff8e8d3e7613654f6fddf19d7a.headline: Les Wexners Financial Ties to Jeffrey Epstein Examined

cdb21a91ae2f6fd4b22e8a9943c695b636450e66.headline: UK Inflation Drops to 3%

The announcement is part of the party's effort to present a more conservative economic policy.
496c7f1060b6db5650e59d8d35fffa7fe732688d.headline: Reform UK Announces Measures to Cut Welfare Spending

52dd949c580e43d4696a22da93b0b005cef5169f.headline: Federal Funds Released for Gateway Rail Tunnel Project

92447eb909e77ff604316a91326ce18de3766e7f.summary: ECB President Christine Lagarde intends to step down before Emmanuel Macron's term as French president ends, according to reports. This would allow Macron and Merz to select her successor ahead of the next French presidential election.

08fe89ddfd7d8b23c213344cefc0a288b48f05ad.summary: Philippine Vice President Duterte has announced plans to run for president in the country's 2028 elections, according to multiple news sources.

8d56db16032bffcb572d2c2f895128c1b6131f57.summary: The No. 42 prospect in the system is a utility player, highlighting the importance of versatile athletes in the organization's rankings.

e89ef9a6642aaa3a1b9fccefd4a857388a9ae796.summary: Police arrested an 18-year-old man who allegedly ran toward the U.S. Capitol with a loaded shotgun. In a separate incident, Shia LaBeouf was arrested in New Orleans following a fight during Mardi Gras, according to police.
e89ef9a6642aaa3a1b9fccefd4a857388a9ae796.headline: Police Arrest Shia LaBeouf in New Orleans and Man Near U.S. Capitol

The court denied prosecutors' request for the death penalty. Yoon's actions led to his impeachment and removal from office.
22a979c34987ccf55be169819a6bf631e7fa735c.headline: Yoon Suk Yeol Sentenced to Life in Prison for 2024 Martial Law

Fifteen skiers were initially reported missing, and six have been found alive. Officials say this is the deadliest avalanche in the U.S. in over 40 years.

Matt Nussbaum was also promoted to interim deputy executive director. The appointments were made by the union's executive board on Wednesday.

The Gates Foundation stated the decision was to keep the summit's focus on its main priorities. 8e4be93c6506447e3b19f2dcd144df6fdb16f6fa.summary: A large banner featuring Donald Trump's face was displayed on the exterior of the U.S. Justice Department headquarters on Thursday. The banner was visible on the building for a period before being removed. Authorities have not released details about who was responsible for the display.
8e4be93c6506447e3b19f2dcd144df6fdb16f6fa.headline: Trump Banner Displayed on Justice Department Headquarters

59a394252cfc05bb0f9f26c1dcdcfc397ee023bb.summary: Bennedict Mathurin scored 38 points in his home debut as the Los Angeles Clippers edged the Denver Nuggets 115-114. Jamal Murray missed a potential game-tying free throw with 0.9 seconds left. Kawhi Leonard contributed 23 points and Derrick Jones Jr. added 22 for the Clippers, who improved to 21-7 since December 20. Both teams were returning from the All-Star break.
59a394252cfc05bb0f9f26c1dcdcfc397ee023bb.headline: Mathurin Scores 38 in Clippers 115 114 Win Over Nuggets

60a1a84ee1b9d0df89c49ec0dd6efc8cd8d5a6f8.summary: Evo Morales reappeared in his political stronghold in Bolivia after nearly seven weeks of unexplained absence, ending rumors that he had fled the country following the abduction of Nicolas Maduro in Venezuela.
60a1a84ee1b9d0df89c49ec0dd6efc8cd8d5a6f8.headline: Evo Morales Reappears in Bolivia After Seven Week Absence

0e641acc2344c122daad4826cfe670e4cd841c63.summary: A 19-year-old Palestinian American man was shot and killed by Israeli settlers during an attack on a village in the occupied West Bank, according to the Palestinian Health Ministry and officials.
0e641acc2344c122daad4826cfe670e4cd841c63.headline: Israeli Settlers Kill 19 Year Old Palestinian American in West Bank

6fd55192aad7db5814af4e68d1277668a1083c96.summary: West Indies completed the T20 World Cup group stage undefeated after beating Italy by 42 runs in Kolkata. Shai Hope scored 75 runs, while Matthew Forde took 3 wickets for 19 runs to help secure the win. Italy showed strong fielding, but could not overcome West Indies' performance.
6fd55192aad7db5814af4e68d1277668a1083c96.headline: West Indies Finish T20 World Cup Group Stage Unbeaten After Win Over

52d8d918c0829a1135d5d6b3b2a10a2385cbf793.summary: NASA's Jared Isaacman criticized Boeing and NASA managers for issues with the Starliner spacecraft that have left two astronauts stranded at the International Space Station for months. The spacecraft has been declared unsafe for the crew's return.
52d8d918c0829a1135d5d6b3b2a10a2385cbf793.headline: NASA Criticizes Boeing Over Starliner Issues Stranding Astronauts

3c14c7dd5c1f6c9777132d914a7bdbc36493905c.summary: Shawn DeRemer, husband of Labor Secretary Lori Chavez-DeRemer, has been barred from the Labor Department's headquarters following allegations by at least two female staff members of sexual assault. The department's inspector general is investigating, and a police complaint has been filed in Washington, D.C.
3c14c7dd5c1f6c9777132d914a7bdbc36493905c.headline: Labor Secretarys Husband Barred from HQ Amid Sexual Assault Probe

638497800411097445dc5a6c876efbb13bf2c9f7.summary: NBA Commissioner Adam Silver told the league's 30 general managers that the NBA plans to implement new anti-tanking rules for the next season, according to sources.
638497800411097445dc5a6c876efbb13bf2c9f7.headline: NBA Plans New Anti Tanking Rules for Next Season

1fe0d2eee018923517265dc981ab10644ea54ab6.summary: The United States women's hockey team won the Olympic gold medal at Milano Cortina 2026, defeating Canada 2-1 in overtime. Megan Keller scored the winning goal during 3-on-3 overtime, securing Team USA's third Olympic gold in women's ice hockey.
1fe0d2eee018923517265dc981ab10644ea54ab6.headline: USA Wins Womens Hockey Gold Over Canada in Overtime at 2026 Olympics

0188651072e9b04e079a926bbe4ee102d3a4e5f1.summary: Cade Cunningham scored 42 points and had 13 assists as the Detroit Pistons defeated the New York Knicks 126-111 at Madison Square Garden on February 19. The Pistons have now won all three games against the Knicks this season. Paul Reed added 18 points, and Tobias Harris recorded 11 points and 10 rebounds.
0188651072e9b04e079a926bbe4ee102d3a4e5f1.headline: Cade Cunningham Leads Pistons to Third Win Over Knicks This Season

7375159bff703eabd1d86fe6696fd97b36b724d2.summary: At the Milan-Cortina Games, world champion Finley Melville Ives lost a ski during the half pipe event and is currently at the bottom of the leaderboard.
7375159bff703eabd1d86fe6696fd97b36b724d2.headline: Finley Melville Ives Falls to Bottom in Half Pipe at Milan Cortina

8c27a705fdf4363655f15271d1e24aa069b2c3c6.summary: The UK government reported its largest ever January budget surplus, driven by higher self-assessment and capital gains tax receipts. This improvement in public finances coincides with stronger-than-expected retail sales figures, marking a sharp turnaround from December's £11.6 billion deficit.
8c27a705fdf4363655f15271d1e24aa069b2c3c6.headline: UK Posts Record January Budget Surplus on Strong Tax Receipts

d1e299f1f252d28c6ea4d29ea92a62e2858f7d05.summary: Thomas Plamberger received a suspended prison sentence and a fine after a woman died of hypothermia during a climbing trip on Grossglockner mountain in January 2025.
d1e299f1f252d28c6ea4d29ea92a62e2858f7d05.headline: Thomas Plamberger Sentenced After Grossglockner Climbing Fatality

6532ff2ac64a1dc5ea8c83ebf5253991474dd9ef.summary: India is on track to import the highest amount of crude oil from Saudi Arabia in over six years this month, narrowing the supply gap with Russia amid ongoing US pressure to cut Russian oil purchases.
6532ff2ac64a1dc5ea8c83ebf5253991474dd9ef.headline: Indias Saudi Oil Imports Reach Six Year High Amid US Pressure

e747a9c24b9913677605b4996970d3b54b43b2a1.summary: Gold prices are set for a weekly loss as the U.S. dollar strengthens, making gold less attractive to investors.
e747a9c24b9913677605b4996970d3b54b43b2a1.headline: Gold Set for Weekly Loss as Dollar Strengthens

a8c4ab7d7f1e126d3cd1de7ce60074af7466a005.summary: The Epstein estate has agreed to pay $35 million to settle a class action lawsuit brought by victims. The settlement resolves claims related to Jeffrey Epstein's alleged misconduct.
a8c4ab7d7f1e126d3cd1de7ce60074af7466a005.headline: Epstein Estate Settles Victim Lawsuit for $35 Million

e514b772f23762a6bf02129ffa44e788618f7787.summary: Fossils of a new species of Spinosaurus, named Spinosaurus Mirabilis, were discovered during a 2022 expedition in Niger, West Africa.
e514b772f23762a6bf02129ffa44e788618f7787.headline: New Spinosaurus Species Discovered in Niger

28011111decf786b8ab8330ba4462bfca0ac32cd.summary: Images from the International Space Station show lysozyme crystals grown in orbit, which were returned to Earth in April 2024. Lysozyme, a protein found in bodily fluids such as tears, saliva, and milk, is used as a control to demonstrate well-formed crystals and plays a role in innate immunity.
28011111decf786b8ab8330ba4462bfca0ac32cd.headline: Lysozyme Crystals Grown on ISS Returned to Earth for Study

325b0cf5e209e863cadf59734d76f7d9fdfa8ac7.summary: Alysa Liu won the women's figure skating gold medal at the Milan-Cortina 2026 Olympics, becoming the first American to win a medal in the event since 2006. Her victory ended a 24-year U.S. gold medal drought in women's figure skating.
325b0cf5e209e863cadf59734d76f7d9fdfa8ac7.headline: Alysa Liu Wins Olympic Gold

55694e7fa6feeb62cbd69eb5636ce9b34991e263.summary: Brad Jacobs led Canada to the men's curling gold medal game for the first time since 2014 after a strong performance. In men's ice hockey, Canada defeated Finland 3-2 to reach the gold medal game. In women's ice hockey, Team USA won its third Olympic gold medal.
55694e7fa6feeb62cbd69eb5636ce9b34991e263.headline: Canada Reaches Mens Curling and Hockey Finals

a1ef2ea24b7dcfe52251952406f9dfcc2d28a3e0.summary: The U.S. Supreme Court ruled 6-3 to strike down major parts of President Trump's tariffs on Canada, Mexico, and other countries, finding he exceeded his authority. The decision did not address importer refunds. The ruling is expected to lower inflation risks, but its economic impact is still being assessed by the U.S., EU, and business groups.
a1ef2ea24b7dcfe52251952406f9dfcc2d28a3e0.headline: Supreme Court Strikes Down Key Trump Tariffs

dd03ed58be9c8bca7c29d13e2ee63c2392122445.summary: Charles Leclerc set the fastest time at the final Formula One pre-season test ahead of the Australian Grand Prix. Lando Norris was second fastest and Max Verstappen third. Aston Martin faced difficulties, completing only six laps due to technical problems.
dd03ed58be9c8bca7c29d13e2ee63c2392122445.headline: Leclerc Fastest in Final F1 Test

9bf9358e2936e356f4415140a73b6ee5ea7bbb6f.summary: Bayern Munich coach Vincent Kompany criticized Benfica manager Jose Mourinho for making a 'huge mistake' with his post-match comments about Real Madrid's Vinícius Júnior, following allegations that Vinícius was racially abused during a Champions League match.
9bf9358e2936e356f4415140a73b6ee5ea7bbb6f.headline: Kompany Criticizes Mourinhos Comments on Vinícius Júnior Incident

ff04ab38d6e4f8f676c3c7fbf04dba554a6603a9.summary: Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor is being investigated by police over alleged misconduct involving confidential trade information shared with Jeffrey Epstein. The government is considering legislation to remove his right to inherit the throne, pending the outcome of the police investigation.
ff04ab38d6e4f8f676c3c7fbf04dba554a6603a9.headline: Andrew Mountbatten Windsor Faces Probe

12516be61a20fd5398173a0d14dd6db949042a9f.summary: NBA Commissioner Adam Silver has informed the league's 30 general managers that new anti-tanking rule changes are planned for next season, according to sources.
12516be61a20fd5398173a0d14dd6db949042a9f.headline: NBA Plans New Anti Tanking Rule Changes for Next Season

40efc1266c9867bca18a82469ac9bc9449dfea7a.summary: The Los Angeles Rams are promoting Nate Scheelhaase to offensive coordinator after Mike LaFleur left to become head coach of the Arizona Cardinals. Scheelhaase, 35, has spent the past two seasons with the Rams and interviewed for several NFL head coaching jobs following the 2025 season.
40efc1266c9867bca18a82469ac9bc9449dfea7a.headline: Rams Promote Nate Scheelhaase to Offensive Coordinator

936d425ad019e30c9bc53681a9f9417119b8dcd1.summary: Canada's Team Rachel Homan lost 6-3 to Sweden in the women's curling semifinals at the Milano Cortina 2026 Olympics and will play the United States for bronze. Sweden will face Switzerland, who defeated the U.S. 8-5, in the gold medal match.

9e53d957ca8ad6510a65339d4f5275c53f648717.summary: SportsLine and other experts have released their NBA predictions for several games on February 20, including picks for the Hawks vs. 76ers, Celtics vs. Warriors, Pistons vs. Knicks, Clippers vs. Lakers, and more. In the Winter Olympics, the U.S. men's hockey team is set to play Slovakia in the semifinals, with expert picks also provided for that matchup.

be23cdac08672ae90f32883b4900b56086ef79b4.summary: NASA plans to launch the Artemis II mission with four astronauts on 6 March, following a successful rocket fueling test that addressed earlier hydrogen leaks. The ten-day lunar fly-by will be the first crewed mission to the moon since 1972.

5e54e5717b5121766d89458c380cd12d51844d97.summary: Sidney Crosby has been ruled out of Canada's Olympic men's hockey semifinal against Finland due to a lower-body injury sustained during the quarterfinal win over Czechia. Hockey Canada announced he will not play in Friday's game, leaving Canada without its captain as they compete for a spot in the gold-medal match.

d5c96d7827a599f62bbc4d6220cd7349b56916dc.summary: Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor was arrested at Sandringham Estate on suspicion of misconduct in public office related to his association with Jeffrey Epstein. He remains under investigation and has not been charged or exonerated. No public statements have been made by his former wife or daughters.
d5c96d7827a599f62bbc4d6220cd7349b56916dc.headline: Andrew Mountbatten Windsor Arrested and Investigated for Misconduct

a9e57a470e1930fb53f185e5300f19f742fff2a0.summary: Businesses that successfully challenged Trump-era IEEPA tariffs are set to receive refunds, but the process is expected to be lengthy as over 1,000 lawsuits are currently pending before the Court of International Trade.
a9e57a470e1930fb53f185e5300f19f742fff2a0.headline: Businesses Face Delays in Receiving Trump Tariff Refunds

fb293ba4b99789b3cfef3111f4f0c46bdf7107ca.summary: Donald Trump pledged $10 billion for a Board of Peace aimed at stabilizing Gaza during its inaugural meeting, though detailed plans have not been outlined.
fb293ba4b99789b3cfef3111f4f0c46bdf7107ca.headline: Trump Commits $10 Billion to Board of Peace for Gaza Stabilization

668e5c905d20207ae2f35cc570fbb95d45d239f8.summary: Mountbatten-Windsor, a former UK trade envoy, was arrested on February 19 on suspicion of misconduct in public office. The arrest follows the release of documents showing communication between him and the late Jeffrey Epstein. He was taken to a Norfolk police station for questioning.
668e5c905d20207ae2f35cc570fbb95d45d239f8.headline: Mountbatten Windsor Arrested Over Misconduct Allegations

593edb03158cb44e0a574a980d07b844e4841408.summary: Argentina's lower house has approved a labor reform bill backed by President Javier Milei, despite opposition from unions who argue the changes will reduce worker protections.
593edb03158cb44e0a574a980d07b844e4841408.headline: Argentinas Lower House Approves Labor Reform Backed by Milei

454cd9437734726218370b143483bad35e5effc9.summary: Following Nicolás Maduro's capture by the United States, Venezuela's new government has released hundreds of political prisoners and approved an amnesty law. However, restrictions on those released have led to questions about the extent of political change.
454cd9437734726218370b143483bad35e5effc9.headline: Venezuela Releases Political Prisoners After Maduros Capture

86771d83b64e6387727a9ccf136b234a3d1df3d8.summary: The Trump administration announced plans to roll back regulations that limit mercury and hazardous air toxic emissions from power plants. Environmental groups warn the move could increase health-related costs, while the administration says the changes will benefit the industry.
86771d83b64e6387727a9ccf136b234a3d1df3d8.headline: Trump Administration Moves to Weaken Mercury Emissions Rules for

7b75ea982f4bd7235d924045c0f79465c7578025.summary: Municipal police in Catania, Sicily, report that a man trained his dog to dump rubbish bags by the roadside to avoid CCTV cameras installed to prevent fly-tipping. City officials condemned the act, calling it both cunning and wrong.
7b75ea982f4bd7235d924045c0f79465c7578025.headline: Catania Man Used Dog to Evade CCTV in Rubbish Dumping Scheme

ac5e96aa122847e21b88b9c01ab15c9ce8ffe13d.summary: Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor continues to face legal issues related to his connections with Jeffrey Epstein, raising concerns about potential harm to the reputation of the royal family.

3ca60fce778566a410ee56eb9aa2704ab5bd8fd4.summary: The International Paralympic Committee has granted 10 combined slots to Russian and Belarusian athletes, allowing them to compete. The decision has led to criticism in Ukraine and Europe, especially after a Ukrainian skeleton athlete was disqualified last week.
3ca60fce778566a410ee56eb9aa2704ab5bd8fd4.headline: Paralympic Committee Allows Russian and Belarusian Athletes to Compete

717b7b9e6c1d146a101c13909d1cefd85612723e.summary: The Board of Peace, associated with Trump, has been established in Washington. The initial members have been announced, while speculation continues about possible future additions.
717b7b9e6c1d146a101c13909d1cefd85612723e.headline: Trump Linked Board of Peace Launches in Washington

c3e90ffe171e01512956a8e59d956bfed332de0f.summary: A federal judge in Miami has upheld a $243 million jury verdict against Tesla in a lawsuit over a fatal Autopilot crash, denying the company's request to overturn the decision.
c3e90ffe171e01512956a8e59d956bfed332de0f.headline: Judge Upholds $243 Million Verdict Against Tesla Over Autopilot Crash

c800e1ad109109869524e1f455bc9bc4fa439abd.summary: The Supreme Court has ruled against Trump's proposed tariffs, impacting his economic agenda. The decision is expected to ease financial concerns for couples, as it affects how tariffs influence household expenses.
c800e1ad109109869524e1f455bc9bc4fa439abd.headline: Supreme Court Blocks Trumps Tariffs

79fee1eb187043d58e2e3134065655974b0f23c3.summary: President Trump has warned Iran that any attack would be more severe than last June's U.S. airstrikes on Iranian nuclear facilities. U.S. and Israeli forces have a military advantage, but officials note that Iran could still retaliate in ways that would cause significant challenges.
79fee1eb187043d58e2e3134065655974b0f23c3.headline: Trump Warns Iran of Harsher Response Than June Airstrikes

Mayweather, who has not fought professionally since 2017, plans to resume his undefeated career with a new bout this summer.
