Foreign Minister Peter Szijjarto stated Hungary would not yield to pressure, linking the loan to the resumption of oil deliveries via the Druzhba pipeline.
4d8bc02e42ddb210e8df0042fde69a5a64ae96c5.headline: Hungary Blocks €90 Billion EU Loan to Ukraine Over Halted Oil Flows

2a8c3058576d36e2aed978fae565ec6f0e14b1d6.summary: UK authorities are considering removing Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor from the royal line of succession as police investigate his alleged sharing of confidential trade information with Jeffrey Epstein. The Metropolitan Police have expanded their inquiry, including questioning Andrew's protection teams.
2a8c3058576d36e2aed978fae565ec6f0e14b1d6.headline: UK Considers Removing Andrew from Royal Succession Amid Police Probe

5b5694a5011c489294ada0bf2b68bf7829bba9e7.summary: Trump will visit China next month for a three-day trip at Beijing's invitation, with US tariffs expected to be a key topic. The visit comes more than eight years after his previous trip to China.
5b5694a5011c489294ada0bf2b68bf7829bba9e7.headline: Trump to Visit China Next Month for Talks on US Tariffs

cec14f523b51c5b5ebc4def9edbe2ca0d8780673.summary: Israeli settlers shot and killed Nasrallah Abu Siyam, a Palestinian American man, during an attack on a village in the occupied West Bank, according to the Palestinian health ministry and a witness. The UN human rights office has accused Israel of war crimes in the region.
cec14f523b51c5b5ebc4def9edbe2ca0d8780673.headline: Palestinian American Killed by Israeli Settlers in West Bank Attack

f30165df359f8f63bb603a6ed21f354cdccbd0df.summary: Police searched Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor’s home a day after his arrest on suspicions of misconduct in public office. He was detained for several hours. The investigation follows longstanding allegations about his connections to Jeffrey Epstein.
f30165df359f8f63bb603a6ed21f354cdccbd0df.headline: Police Search Andrew Mountbatten Windsors Home After Arrest

3be21dcdaa1c70450958f199bbfeac1d0a36a889.summary: Dr. Joss Reimer has been appointed as Canada's next chief public health officer. Reimer's stated priorities include addressing health misinformation and working to rebuild public trust.
3be21dcdaa1c70450958f199bbfeac1d0a36a889.headline: Joss Reimer Appointed as Canadas Chief Public Health Officer

e76fe2b82419c27c9cbce5cfbc7a2d6fcc182a5a.summary: The T20 World Cup has begun, with England starting their campaign after weather in Kandy improved and covers were removed from the pitch. England is seen as having a favorable draw and a chance to reach the semifinals.
e76fe2b82419c27c9cbce5cfbc7a2d6fcc182a5a.headline: T20 World Cup Begins as England Start Campaign After Weather Delay

40ad53a82f787bf526d3df89e290dc9ddd80814d.summary: The US military reported it struck a vessel in the eastern Pacific Ocean suspected of drug trafficking, resulting in the deaths of three men. The US Southern Command stated the vessel was involved in drug trafficking but did not provide evidence.
40ad53a82f787bf526d3df89e290dc9ddd80814d.headline: US Military Strike on Pacific Vessel Kills Three Suspected Traffickers

a5de4d5f762d090e32d44054c498aa98a5a37095.summary: Trump stated he is considering a limited military strike on Iran as nuclear negotiations between the U.S. and Iran continue. He recently gave Iran about 10 days to agree to a deal to curb its nuclear program. The situation has raised concerns about potential disruptions to oil flows through the Strait of Hormuz.
a5de4d5f762d090e32d44054c498aa98a5a37095.headline: Trump Considers Limited Military Strike on Iran Amid Nuclear Talks

e49b41c16231bd08e86e9ca62b7f7298accbee23.summary: England white-ball captain Harry Brook has urged teams in The Hundred to include Pakistan players, following reports that four Indian-owned franchises may exclude them. Brook also confirmed he will not captain Sunrisers Leeds in this year's tournament.
e49b41c16231bd08e86e9ca62b7f7298accbee23.headline: Harry Brook Urges The Hundred Teams to Include Pakistan Players

7336acb9c09ec1b928d92c539ba4cbcd2ef7d1d3.summary: Pete Alonso homered in his spring training debut for the Baltimore Orioles, driving in the only runs in a 2-0 exhibition win over the New York Yankees. Alonso hit the home run in the sixth inning, marking his first game appearance for the Orioles after previously playing for the New York Mets.
7336acb9c09ec1b928d92c539ba4cbcd2ef7d1d3.headline: Pete Alonso Homers in Orioles Spring Training Debut Against Yankees

ace6fdbf768612a0d9aceaa553c140c8d531076d.summary: The Supreme Court has limited Trump's interpretation of executive power, delivering a setback to his main economic policy. In response, Trump criticized the justices, calling them 'disloyal.'
ace6fdbf768612a0d9aceaa553c140c8d531076d.headline: Supreme Court Limits Trumps Executive Power on Economic Policy

a0047bfc6339215916840b5e2b9181468e133cab.summary: Brazil's President Lula stated that Venezuelan President Maduro should be tried in Venezuela and that decisions about his fate should be made by the people of Venezuela, not by foreign countries.
a0047bfc6339215916840b5e2b9181468e133cab.headline: Lula Says Maduro Should Be Tried in Venezuela

7ffea3e5aa89e3aaba2223aab0a8e1ab819ce001.summary: Jaxon Smith-Njigba stated he is not worried about negotiating a new contract with the Super Bowl champion Seahawks, but believes he deserves to be the NFL's highest-paid wide receiver after winning the 2025 AP Offensive Player of the Year award.
7ffea3e5aa89e3aaba2223aab0a8e1ab819ce001.headline: Smith Njigba Seeks Top Receiver Pay After Award Winning Season

4dcd3c20e286f013792f4915df8edb59927c293f.summary: OpenAI identified and banned the suspect in a major Canadian mass shooting for violating ChatGPT's usage policy eight months before the incident but did not report her to authorities.
4dcd3c20e286f013792f4915df8edb59927c293f.headline: OpenAI Banned Canada Shooting Suspect Months Before Attack

627341357207a9be17469a36e6a4fdd36b644ecc.summary: The Cowboys have waived linebacker Logan Wilson, a move that will save the team $6.5 million against the salary cap.
627341357207a9be17469a36e6a4fdd36b644ecc.headline: Cowboys Waive Linebacker Logan Wilson

38d6a2e974074660e25528728a93012bce05b7c3.summary: The 2026 Winter Olympics are set to take place in Milan-Cortina, featuring athletes from around the world competing in various winter sports. The event will highlight new venues and is expected to attract significant international attention.
38d6a2e974074660e25528728a93012bce05b7c3.headline: Milan Cortina Prepares to Host 2026 Winter Olympics

713b95c982fbf674d35fc640d07ebe75ede59539.summary: Nike has updated the Los Angeles Dodgers’ jersey design for the 2026 MLB season, bringing back the classic script logo, enlarging the font, and using upgraded fabric in response to widespread complaints about the previous uniforms.
713b95c982fbf674d35fc640d07ebe75ede59539.headline: Nike Restores Classic Dodgers Jersey Design for 2026 Season

80f87a6af5d3abfbe9fb7fe6a2ad31a59f5592c6.summary: Mike Huckabee told Tucker Carlson that Israel has a biblical right to land from the Nile to the Euphrates and said he would be fine if Israel expanded to cover the entire area.
80f87a6af5d3abfbe9fb7fe6a2ad31a59f5592c6.headline: Mike Huckabee Supports Israels Expansion From Nile to Euphrates

8a39ed178b8e659ec732874f7ae435eb17bf6e32.summary: Poland has officially withdrawn from an international treaty banning anti-personnel mines. The deputy defence minister announced Poland will deploy both anti-personnel and anti-tank landmines on its eastern border to counter the threat from Russia.
8a39ed178b8e659ec732874f7ae435eb17bf6e32.headline: Poland Withdraws From Landmine Ban

d4e8a2f47ef8aca4c8e3337f6caac251ec78c864.summary: A court has allowed a Louisiana law requiring the display of the Ten Commandments in public school classrooms to take effect.
d4e8a2f47ef8aca4c8e3337f6caac251ec78c864.headline: Court Allows Louisiana Ten Commandments School Display Law

a88b0648bccbaa5aade73d01a3075b506efea6f5.summary: Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor was arrested on suspicion of misconduct in public office and taken to a Norfolk police station for questioning on 19 February 2026.
a88b0648bccbaa5aade73d01a3075b506efea6f5.headline: Andrew Mountbatten Windsor Arrested on Suspicion of Misconduct

dfc316ab1ddb4f4e05e8242de0bb1879854346bb.summary: Azerbaijani President Ilham Aliyev's security guards punched, kicked, and chased protesters outside a Washington hotel during his visit for the inaugural meeting of Donald Trump's Board of Peace. Police have referred the incident involving the Azerbaijani security guards to the State Department.
dfc316ab1ddb4f4e05e8242de0bb1879854346bb.headline: Azerbaijani Security Guards Clash With Protesters in Washington

cb1c71f3a7d2a177da68f403824fe53341e7f187.summary: Israeli airstrikes in Lebanon's Bekaa valley killed at least 10 people, including a senior Hezbollah official, and wounded 24 others, according to the Lebanese health ministry. Israel stated it targeted militant command centres.
cb1c71f3a7d2a177da68f403824fe53341e7f187.headline: Israeli Strikes in Lebanon Kill Senior Hezbollah Official and 9 Others

eda31d8a15b1d82bea86a3038c08e1055f8ef38f.summary: The US Supreme Court has struck down many tariffs imposed by Donald Trump, granting Mexico and Canada exemptions from a 10% US levy. However, uncertainties remain over the future of the US-Mexico-Canada Agreement (USMCA), which continues to pose potential risks to the trade relationship among the three countries.
eda31d8a15b1d82bea86a3038c08e1055f8ef38f.headline: US Supreme Court Strikes Down Tariffs

ce160286a3b01e6512b93b75432c54e8bbeea181.summary: Illinois Gov. Pritzker is calling for refunds of over $130 billion in tariffs imposed on imports during Trump's administration, as discussions begin over how these funds should be recovered.
ce160286a3b01e6512b93b75432c54e8bbeea181.headline: Gov. Pritzker Calls for Refunds of Tariffs Imposed Under Trump

555081b18df27b9f60dffde60f69a8508513e064.summary: President Trump criticized the Supreme Court after it struck down most of his global tariffs as illegal. He expressed disappointment in the ruling and announced a new plan to impose tariffs.
555081b18df27b9f60dffde60f69a8508513e064.headline: Trump Criticizes Supreme Court for Striking Down Most Tariffs

abc4225421b88b1465d16ab2e8ab7557075c5b41.summary: Phil Spencer is retiring as Microsoft Gaming head after 38 years with the company. Asha Sharma, who previously served as Instacart's COO, will take over the role.
abc4225421b88b1465d16ab2e8ab7557075c5b41.headline: Asha Sharma Replaces Phil Spencer as Microsoft Gaming Head

2b8f946f5aff6f5e0253f195b8d68a26ae3ead80.summary: A clinical trial of puberty blockers for children has been paused after the medicines regulator advised that participants should be at least 14 years old, citing unquantified risks. Recruitment for the study is delayed as a result.
2b8f946f5aff6f5e0253f195b8d68a26ae3ead80.headline: Puberty Blocker Trial Paused After Regulator Raises Age Limit to 14

2a0223da1e66337080708903e2668ab5f6a02eb0.summary: Bill Mazeroski, Hall of Fame second baseman known for his eight Gold Glove awards and his walk-off home run in Game 7 of the 1960 World Series, has died at the age of 89.
2a0223da1e66337080708903e2668ab5f6a02eb0.headline: Hall of Famer Bill Mazeroski Dies at 89

fe1e4a4f69c8c987719efc99a4ddfb613729a2ba.summary: Israeli airstrikes in eastern Lebanon on Friday killed at least 12 people, including eight Hezbollah members and several local officials, according to Lebanese sources. The Lebanese health ministry reported at least 24 wounded. The strikes targeted what Israel described as Hezbollah command centres.
fe1e4a4f69c8c987719efc99a4ddfb613729a2ba.headline: Israeli Airstrikes in Eastern Lebanon Kill at Least 12

32519d7b51cb5611c5e3faba5bee1fc8bdd19f4d.summary: Scotland defeated Wales 26-23 in Cardiff after overcoming a 20-5 deficit, with Finn Russell scoring 11 points in the second half. The win marks Scotland's second consecutive Six Nations victory, while Wales remains without a Six Nations win for two years.
32519d7b51cb5611c5e3faba5bee1fc8bdd19f4d.headline: Scotland Defeats Wales 26 23 After Comeback in Six Nations Match

0d69ff93197c960aee52084374c29d638d1ccd9d.summary: Chelsea drew 1-1 with Burnley after conceding a stoppage-time goal at home. Manager Liam Rosenior described the result as frustrating and noted Chelsea now have more red cards than any other Premier League team this season.
0d69ff93197c960aee52084374c29d638d1ccd9d.headline: Chelsea Draws 1 1 With Burnley

775fffb7ea959efab7c2e22b13c6c0af970a505e.summary: Johannes Hoesflot Klaebo won his sixth gold medal at the 2026 Winter Olympics in the men's 50km mass start, setting a new record for the most golds won by an athlete at a single Winter Olympics. This surpasses the previous record of five set in 1980, and brings Klaebo's career total to 11 Olympic gold medals.
775fffb7ea959efab7c2e22b13c6c0af970a505e.headline: Klaebo Sets Record With Sixth Gold at 2026 Winter Olympics

0e0949f1b628e598c397f43a4ec5e6ed853b85df.summary: Canada defeated the United States 10-7 to win the bronze medal in women's curling at the Milan Cortina 2026 Olympics. The team, led by Rachel Homan, secured the victory by scoring three points in the eighth end against Team Tabitha Peterson, earning their first Olympic medal.
0e0949f1b628e598c397f43a4ec5e6ed853b85df.headline: Canada Wins Bronze in Womens Curling at Milan Cortina 2026 Olympics

9a3ce7fcb22beb24c539e3a134b245355d6514a3.summary: The Supreme Court has ruled against Trump's tariffs, which may lead to lower prices for pre-owned Swiss watches. Analysts suggest the decision reduces the likelihood of countries reversing existing trade deals.
9a3ce7fcb22beb24c539e3a134b245355d6514a3.headline: Supreme Court Ruling Against Trumps Tariffs May Lower Swiss Watch

6050faf02d26ed02c838bc9e99e70f6c9153ff9c.summary: Sean Strickland and Anthony Hernandez are set to headline UFC Fight Night in Houston on Saturday, featuring a key middleweight matchup. Strickland, ranked No. 3 in the division, faces rising contender Hernandez. The event will be broadcast live, with full schedule and viewing details available.
6050faf02d26ed02c838bc9e99e70f6c9153ff9c.headline: Sean Strickland Faces Anthony Hernandez in UFC Houston Main Event

a2be91eff3c4042b7c2b727862259b7c7ad3e633.summary: The U.S. team secured its 11th gold medal at the Milan-Cortina Winter Olympics, setting a new national record, as Kaila Kuhn, Connor Curran, and Chris Lillis won the mixed aerials event. The men's hockey gold medal game between the U.S. and Canada is scheduled for Sunday.
a2be91eff3c4042b7c2b727862259b7c7ad3e633.headline: U.S. Sets Gold Medal Record at Milan Cortina

35b5032e01d463c0fb71df30dd9ae88197ea2928.summary: Ecuador's environment ministry announced that 158 juvenile giant tortoises have been reintroduced to Floreana Island in the Galapagos, where the native species was driven to extinction over a century ago. The reintroduction follows a breeding program using partial descendants of the original tortoises.
35b5032e01d463c0fb71df30dd9ae88197ea2928.headline: Giant Tortoises Reintroduced to Galapagos Floreana Island After 180

0d8899f77e5758ae262aa9b26852a437a4a9044f.summary: The opening Super Eights match of the T20 World Cup between Pakistan and New Zealand in Colombo was abandoned due to persistent rain without a ball being bowled. Both teams were awarded one point each.
0d8899f77e5758ae262aa9b26852a437a4a9044f.headline: Rain Washes Out Pakistan vs New Zealand T20 World Cup Super Eights

f75abbcfa379a2884557373057a6018e067f7075.summary: NASA's new moon rocket experienced another setback on Saturday, making it likely that the planned astronaut launch next month will be delayed until spring.
f75abbcfa379a2884557373057a6018e067f7075.headline: NASA Moon Rocket Setback Likely Delays Astronaut Launch Until Spring

11be61fba9bccce6265f02a9a60c7f5de90a8da5.summary: The 5th U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals has allowed a Louisiana law mandating the display of the Ten Commandments in public school classrooms to take effect.
11be61fba9bccce6265f02a9a60c7f5de90a8da5.headline: Court Allows Louisiana Ten Commandments School Display Law

03c8870be7d246b087596cd906935490c1c3dac3.summary: Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor was arrested on February 19, 2026, on suspicion of misconduct in public office, drawing attention to his former role as the UK's special representative for international trade and investment.
03c8870be7d246b087596cd906935490c1c3dac3.headline: Andrew Mountbatten Windsor Arrested on Suspicion of Misconduct

496da0cb88ffefcdf3ab258ae1eee4c9b4187a8e.summary: Minnesota pitcher Pablo Lopez will miss the rest of the season after the Twins announced he needs Tommy John surgery for a torn elbow ligament. In the NBA, the Kings' recent trade acquisition, Hunter, was injured in his second game with the team.
496da0cb88ffefcdf3ab258ae1eee4c9b4187a8e.headline: Twins Pablo Lopez Out for Season

32f40f91c257b05de1480af9ecd17c5d697ced63.summary: Following Nicolás Maduro's capture by the United States, Venezuela has released hundreds of political prisoners and approved a new amnesty law. However, restrictions on those released have led to questions about the extent of political change.
32f40f91c257b05de1480af9ecd17c5d697ced63.headline: Venezuela Releases Political Prisoners After Maduros Capture

728a44ef8b7fc8727c63d12fe0acf0997860f3ec.summary: Scottie Scheffler recovered from a slow start to make the cut at the Genesis Invitational, extending his PGA Tour made-cut streak to 68 consecutive events.
728a44ef8b7fc8727c63d12fe0acf0997860f3ec.headline: Scheffler Extends PGA Tour Made Cut Streak to 68 at Genesis

80bfe209da21c7c262e9615dafff2f7c3802ff5d.summary: The Pakistan army reports that two soldiers and five militants were killed after an explosive-laden motorcycle struck a security forces convoy in Bannu.
80bfe209da21c7c262e9615dafff2f7c3802ff5d.headline: Two Soldiers Five Militants Killed in Bannu Attack Army Reports

9025eef866f31ac3f03830c71831713927d2cb9e.summary: Toronto Blue Jays manager John Schneider has not yet signed a new contract with the team, following recent extensions for president and CEO Mark Shapiro. Discussions about Schneider's new deal are expected to be the team's next priority.
9025eef866f31ac3f03830c71831713927d2cb9e.headline: Blue Jays Prioritize New Contract Talks for Manager John Schneider

0b0a739803bad473474ec725a4ddabe68570f2d1.summary: NASA announced it may return the Artemis II rocket to the assembly site due to an interrupted helium flow, which could affect the planned March launch window for the mission to circle the moon.
0b0a739803bad473474ec725a4ddabe68570f2d1.headline: NASA Considers Artemis II Rocket Rollback

67e71fadbcd672e7259f10dd718808cd93b5661c.summary: The Supreme Court has ruled against Donald Trump's use of tariffs, limiting his ability to use them as a negotiating tool with other countries.
67e71fadbcd672e7259f10dd718808cd93b5661c.headline: Supreme Court Limits Trumps Use of Tariffs as Negotiating Tool

8c6857944a26e91855b68f2426858cc45e8ed678.summary: Donald Trump stated he is considering limited strikes against Iran, while an Iranian diplomat said a proposed deal is imminent. Concerns persist over possible disruptions to oil flows through the Strait of Hormuz if conflict escalates.
8c6857944a26e91855b68f2426858cc45e8ed678.headline: Trump Weighs Limited Strikes as Iran Signals Imminent Deal

f89dddf12ff582947bf169660963c36c42e7841f.summary: At least five people have died and several others have been rescued after a series of avalanches struck Tirol, Austria, following prolonged snowfall and severe weather warnings, according to regional authorities.
f89dddf12ff582947bf169660963c36c42e7841f.headline: Avalanches in Tirol Austria Kill at Least Five Amid Heavy Snow

0dae20466beb5660f064690e3faf5b04ae7e81f9.summary: Team Jacobs of Canada will face Great Britain's top-ranked Team Mouat in the men's curling final at the Games. Meanwhile, Blondin has secured a silver medal for Canada in the women's mass start speed skating event.
0dae20466beb5660f064690e3faf5b04ae7e81f9.headline: Team Jacobs to Face Team Mouat for Mens Curling Gold at Games

06f82e162110bdfb852cc8ef7684b12d783ef351.summary: Harry Kane scored twice as Bayern Munich defeated Eintracht Frankfurt 3-2, extending their Bundesliga lead to eight points. Borussia Dortmund drew 2-2 with RB Leipzig, while Hoffenheim also dropped points in a 2-2 draw.
06f82e162110bdfb852cc8ef7684b12d783ef351.headline: Bayern Munich Extend Bundesliga Lead After 3 2 Win Over Frankfurt
